h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ catukkanipātassa ^a^V2.0241^ea^ ^a^M2.0249^ea^ ^a^P3.0001^ea^ paṭhame ^b^ananubodhā^eb^ti abujjhanena ajānanena. ^b^appaṭivedhā^eb^ti appaṭivijjhanena apaccakkhakiriyāya. ^b^dīghamaddhāna^eb^nti cirakālaṃ. ^b^sandhāvita^eb^nti bhavato bhavaṃ gamanavasena sandhāvitaṃ. ^b^saṃsarita^eb^nti punappunaṃ gamanāgamanavasena saṃsaritaṃ. ^b^mamañceva tumhākañcā^eb^ti mayā ca tumhehi ca. atha vā ^b^sandhāvitaṃ saṃsarita^eb^nti sandhāvanaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ mamañceva ^a^V2.0242^ea^ tumhākañca ahosīti evamettha attho veditabbo. ^b^ariyassā^eb^ti niddosassa. sīlaṃ samādhi paññāti ime pana tayo dhammā maggaphalasampayuttāva veditabbā, vimuttināmena phalameva niddiṭṭhaṃ. ^b^bhavataṇhā^eb^ti bhavesu taṇhā. ^b^bhavanettī^eb^ti ^a^P3.0002^ea^ bhavarajju. taṇhāya eva etaṃ nāmaṃ. tāya hi sattā goṇā viya gīvāya bandhitvā taṃ taṃ bhavaṃ nīyanti, tasmā bhavanettīti vuccati.

[03] ^b^anuttarā^eb^ti lokuttarā. ^b^dukkhassantakaro^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhassa antakaro. ^b^cakkhumā^eb^ti pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā. ^b^parinibbuto^eb^ti kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto. idamassa bodhimaṇḍe paṭhamaparinibbānaṃ, pacchā pana yamakasālānamantare anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutoti yathānusandhinā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^papatito^eb^ti patito cuto. ^b^appapatito^eb^ti apatito patiṭṭhito. tattha lokiyamahājano patitoyeva nāma, sotāpannādayo kilesuppattikkhaṇe patitā nāma, khīṇāsavo ekantapatiṭṭhito nāma.

[03] ^b^cutā^eb^ ^a^M2.0250^ea^ ^b^patantī^eb^ti ye cutā, te patanti nāma. ^b^patitā^eb^ti ye patitā, te cutā nāma. cutattā patitā, patitattā cutāti attho. ^b^giddhā^eb^ti rāgarattā. ^b^punarāgatā^eb^ti puna jātiṃ puna jaraṃ puna byādhiṃ puna maraṇaṃ āgatā nāma honti. ^b^kataṃ kicca^eb^nti catūhi maggehi kattabbakiccaṃ kataṃ. ^b^rataṃ ramma^eb^nti ramitabbayuttake guṇajāte ramitaṃ. ^b^sukhenānvāgataṃ sukha^eb^nti sukhena sukhaṃ anuāgataṃ sampattaṃ. mānusakasukhena dibbasukhaṃ, jhānasukhena vipassanāsukhaṃ, vipassanāsukhena maggasukhaṃ, maggasukhena ^a^P3.0003^ea^ phalasukhaṃ, phalasukhena nibbānasukhaṃ sampattaṃ adhigatanti attho.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ tatiyaṃ dukanipātavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttameva. gāthāsu pana ^b^nindiya^eb^nti ninditabbayuttakaṃ. ^b^nindatī^eb^ti garahati. ^b^pasaṃsiyo^eb^ti pasaṃsitabbayutto. ^b^vicināti mukhena so kali^eb^nti yo evaṃ pavatto ^a^V2.0243^ea^, tena mukhena kaliṃ vicināti nāma. ^b^kalinā tena sukhaṃ na vindatī^eb^ti tena ca kalinā sukhaṃ na paṭilabhati. ^b^sabbassāpi sahāpi attanā^eb^ti sabbenapi sakena dhanena ceva attanā ca saddhiṃ yo parājayo, so appamattakova kalīti attho. ^b^yo sugatesū^eb^ti yo pana sammaggatesu puggalesu cittaṃ padusseyya, ayaṃ cittapadosova tato kalito mahantataro kali. idāni tassa mahantatarabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^sataṃ sahassāna^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^sataṃ sahassāna^eb^nti nirabbudagaṇanāya satasahassaṃ. ^b^chattiṃsatī^eb^ti aparāni ca chattiṃsati nirabbudāni. ^b^pañca cā^eb^ti abbudagaṇanāya ca pañca abbudāni. ^b^yamariyagarahī^eb^ti yaṃ ariye garahanto nirayaṃ upapajjati, tattha ettakaṃ āyuppamāṇanti.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^P3.0004^ea^ ^b^mātari pitari cā^eb^tiādīsu mittavindako mātari micchāpaṭipanno nāma, ajātasattu pitari micchāpaṭipanno nāma, devadatto tathāgate micchāpaṭipanno nāma, kokāliko tathāgatasāvake micchāpaṭipanno nāma. ^b^bahuñcā^eb^ti bahukameva. ^b^pasavatī^eb^ti paṭilabhati. ^b^tāyā^eb^ti tāya micchāpaṭipattisaṅkhātāya adhammacariyāya. ^b^peccā^eb^ti ito gantvā. ^b^apāyaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti nirayādīsu aññatarasmiṃ nibbattati. sukkapakkhepi eseva nayo.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^M2.0251^ea^ anusotaṃ gacchatīti ^b^anusotagāmī^eb^. kilesasotassa paccanīkapaṭipattiyā paṭisotaṃ gacchatīti ^b^paṭisotagāmī^eb^. ^b^ṭhitatto^eb^ti ṭhitasabhāvo. ^b^tiṇṇo^eb^ti oghaṃ taritvā ṭhito. ^b^pāraṅgato^eb^ti paratīraṃ gato. ^b^thale tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti nibbānathale tiṭṭhati. ^b^brāhmaṇo^eb^ti seṭṭho niddoso. ^b^idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ loke. ^b^kāme ca paṭisevatī^eb^ti kilesakāmehi vatthukāme paṭisevati. ^b^pāpañca kammaṃ karotī^eb^ti pāpañca pāṇātipātādikammaṃ karoti. ^b^pāpañca kammaṃ na karotī^eb^ti pañcaverakammaṃ na karoti. ^b^ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ṭhitatto^eb^ti ayaṃ anāgāmī puggalo tasmā lokā puna paṭisandhivasena anāgamanato ṭhitatto nāma.

[03] ^b^taṇhādhipannā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0005^ea^ taṇhāya adhipannā ajjhotthaṭā, taṇhaṃ vā adhipannā ajjhogāḷhā. ^b^paripuṇṇasekho^eb^ti ^a^V2.0244^ea^ sikkhāpāripūriyā ṭhito. ^b^aparihānadhammo^eb^ti aparihīnasabhāvo. ^b^cetovasippatto^eb^ti cittavasībhāvaṃ patto. evarūpo khīṇāsavo hoti, idha pana anāgāmī kathito. ^b^samāhitindriyo^eb^ti samāhitachaḷindriyo. ^b^paroparā^eb^ti parovarā uttamalāmakā, kusalākusalāti attho. ^b^sameccā^eb^ti ñāṇena samāgantvā. ^b^vidhūpitā^eb^ti viddhaṃsitā jhāpitā vā. ^b^vusitabrahmacariyo^eb^ti maggabrahmacariyaṃ vasitvā ṭhito. ^b^lokantagū^eb^ti tividhassāpi lokassa antaṃ gato. ^b^pāragato^eb^ti chahākārehi pāragato. idha khīṇāsavova kathito. iti suttepi gāthāsupi vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^anupapanno^eb^ti anupāgato. ^b^sutta^eb^ntiādīsu ubhatovibhaṅganiddesakhandhakaparivārasuttanipātamaṅgalasuttaratanasutta- nāḷakasuttatuvaṭakasuttāni, aññampi ca suttanāmakaṃ tathāgatavacanaṃ ^b^sutta^eb^nti veditabbaṃ. sabbampi sagāthakaṃ suttaṃ ^b^geyya^eb^nti veditabbaṃ, visesena saṃyuttake sakalopi sagāthāvaggo. sakalampi abhidhammapiṭakaṃ, niggāthakasuttaṃ, yañca aññampi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi asaṅgahitaṃ ^a^P3.0006^ea^ buddhavacanaṃ, taṃ ^b^veyyākaraṇa^eb^nti veditabbaṃ. dhammapada-theragāthā-therigāthā suttanipāte nosuttanāmikā suddhikagāthā ^a^M2.0252^ea^ ca ^b^gāthā^eb^ti veditabbā. somanassañāṇamayikagāthāpaṭisaṃyuttā dveasīti suttantā ^b^udāna^eb^nti veditabbā. ``vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā''tiādinayappavattā dasuttarasatasuttantā ^b^itivuttaka^eb^nti veditabbā. apaṇṇakajātakādīni paññāsādhikāni pañca jātakasatāni ^b^jātaka^eb^nti veditabbāni. ``cattārome, bhikkhave, acchariyā abbhutā dhammā ānande''tiādinayappavattā sabbepi acchariyābbhutadhammapaṭisaṃyuttā suttantā ^b^abbhutadhamma^eb^nti veditabbā. cūḷavedallamahāvedallasammādiṭṭhisakkapañhasaṅkhārabhājaniyamahāpuṇṇamasuttādayo sabbepi vedañca tuṭṭhiñca laddhā laddhā pucchitā suttantā ^b^vedalla^eb^nti veditabbā. ^b^na atthamaññāya na dhammamaññāyā^eb^ti aṭṭhakathañca pāḷiñca ajānitvā. ^b^dhammānudhammappaṭipanno^eb^ti navalokuttaradhammassa anurūpadhammaṃ sahasīlaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ na paṭipanno hoti. iminā upāyena sabbavāresu attho veditabbo. paṭhamavāre panettha appassutadussīlo kathito, dutiye appassutakhīṇāsavo, tatiye bahussutadussīlo, catutthe bahussutakhīṇāsavo.

[03] ^b^sīlesu^eb^ ^a^P3.0007^ea^ ^b^asamāhito^eb^ti sīlesu aparipūrakārī. ^b^sīlato ca sutena cā^eb^ti sīlabhāgena ca ^a^V2.0245^ea^ sutabhāgena ca ``ayaṃ dussīlo appassuto''ti evaṃ taṃ garahantīti attho. ^b^tassa sampajjate suta^eb^nti tassa puggalassa yasmā tena sutena sutakiccaṃ kataṃ, tasmā tassa sutaṃ sampajjati nāma. ^b^nāssa sampajjate^eb^ti sutakiccassa akatattā na sampajjati. ^b^dhammadhara^eb^nti sutadhammānaṃ ādhārabhūtaṃ. ^b^sappañña^eb^nti supaññaṃ. ^b^nekkhaṃ jambonadassevā^eb^ti jambunadaṃ vuccati jātisuvaṇṇaṃ, tassa jambunadassa nekkhaṃ viya, pañcasuvaṇṇaparimāṇaṃ suvaṇṇaghaṭikaṃ viyāti attho.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^viyattā^eb^ti paññāveyyattiyena samannāgatā. ^b^vinītā^eb^ti vinayaṃ upetā suvinītā. ^b^visāradā^eb^ti vesārajjena somanassasahagatena ñāṇena samannāgatā. ^b^dhammadharā^eb^ti sutadhammānaṃ ādhārabhūtā. ^b^bhikkhu ca sīlasampanno^eb^ti gāthāya kiñcāpi ekekasseva ekeko guṇo kathito, sabbesaṃ pana sabbepi vaṭṭantīti.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^M2.0253^ea^ ^b^vesārajjānī^eb^ti ettha sārajjapaṭipakkho vesārajjaṃ, catūsu ṭhānesu sārajjābhāvaṃ paccavekkhantassa uppannasomanassamayañāṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ. ^b^āsabhaṃ ṭhāna^eb^nti seṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ uttamaṭṭhānaṃ. āsabhā vā pubbabuddhā, tesaṃ ṭhānanti attho. apica gavasatajeṭṭhako usabho, gavasahassajeṭṭhako vasabho. vajasatajeṭṭhako vā usabho, vajasahassajeṭṭhako vasabho ^a^P3.0008^ea^, sabbagavaseṭṭho sabbaparissayasaho seto pāsādiko mahābhāravaho asanisatasaddehipi asampakampiyo nisabho, so idha usabhoti adhippeto. idampi hi tassa pariyāyavacanaṃ. usabhassa idanti ^b^āsabhaṃ. ṭhāna^eb^nti catūhi pādehi pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā vavatthānaṃ. idaṃ pana āsabhaṃ viyāti āsabhaṃ. yatheva hi nisabhasaṅkhāto usabho catūhi pādehi pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati, evaṃ tathāgatopi catūhi vesārajjapādehi aṭṭhaparisapathaviṃ uppīḷetvā sadevake loke kenaci paccatthikena paccāmittena akampiyo acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati. evaṃ tiṭṭhamānova taṃ āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti upagacchati na paccakkhāti, attani āropeti. tena vuttaṃ ``āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānātī''ti.

[03] ^b^parisāsū^eb^ti ^a^V2.0246^ea^ aṭṭhasu parisāsu. ^b^sīhanādaṃ nadatī^eb^ti seṭṭhanādaṃ abhītanādaṃ nadati, sīhanādasadisaṃ vā nādaṃ nadati. ayamattho sīhanādasuttena dassetabbo. yathā vā sīho sahanato ca hananato ca sīhoti vuccati, evaṃ tathāgato lokadhammānaṃ sahanato parappavādānañca hananato sīhoti vuccati. evaṃ vuttassa sīhassa nādaṃ sīhanādaṃ. tattha yathā sīho sīhabalena samannāgato sabbattha visārado vigatalomahaṃso sīhanādaṃ nadati, evaṃ tathāgatasīhopi tathāgatabalehi samannāgato aṭṭhasu parisāsu visārado vigatalomahaṃso ``iti rūpa''ntiādinā nayena nānāvidhadesanāvilāsasampannaṃ ^a^P3.0009^ea^ sīhanādaṃ nadati. tena vuttaṃ ``parisāsu sīhanādaṃ nadatī''ti.
[03] ^b^brahmacakkaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0254^ea^ ^b^pavattetī^eb^ti ettha ^b^brahma^eb^nti seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ visuddhaṃ. cakkasaddo panāyaṃ --
[21] ``sampattiyaṃ lakkhaṇe ca, rathaṅge iriyāpathe.
[27] dāne ratanadhammūra-cakkādīsu ca dissati.
[22] dhammacakke idha mato, tañca dvedhā vibhāvaye''..

[03] ``cattārimāni, bhikkhave, cakkāni, yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussāna''ntiādīsu (a0 ni0 4.31) hi ayaṃ sampattiyaṃ dissati. ``pādatalesu cakkāni jātānī''ti (dī0 ni0 2.35) ettha lakkhaṇe. ``cakkaṃva vahato pada''nti (dha0 pa0 1) ettha rathaṅge. ``catucakkaṃ navadvāra''nti (saṃ0 ni0 1.29) ettha iriyāpathe. ``dadaṃ bhuñja mā ca pamādo, cakkaṃ vattaya sabbapāṇina''nti (jā0 1.7.149) ettha dāne. ``dibbaṃ cakkaratanaṃ pāturahosī''ti (dī0 ni0 2.243; ma0 ni0 3.256) ettha ratanacakke. ``mayā pavattitaṃ cakka''nti (su0 ni0 562) ettha dhammacakke. ``icchāhatassa posassa, cakkaṃ bhamati matthake''ti (jā0 1.1.104; 1.5.103) ettha uracakke. ``khurapariyantena cepi cakkenā''ti (dī0 ni0 1.166) ettha paharaṇacakke. ``asanivicakka''nti (dī0 ni0 3.61; saṃ0 ni0 2.162) ettha asanimaṇḍale. idha ^a^P3.0010^ea^ panāyaṃ dhammacakke mato.

[03] taṃ panetaṃ dhammacakkaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti paṭivedhañāṇañca desanāñāṇañca. tattha paññāpabhāvitaṃ attano ariyaphalāvahaṃ paṭivedhañāṇaṃ, karuṇāpabhāvitaṃ sāvakānaṃ ariyaphalāvahaṃ desanāñāṇaṃ. tattha ^a^V2.0247^ea^ paṭivedhañāṇaṃ uppajjamānaṃ uppannanti duvidhaṃ. tañhi abhinikkhamanato yāva arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ, phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāma. tusitabhavanato vā yāva mahābodhipallaṅke arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ, phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāma. dīpaṅkarato paṭṭhāya vā yāva bodhipallaṅke arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ, phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāma. desanāñāṇampi pavattamānaṃ pavattanti duvidhaṃ. tañhi yāva aññāsikoṇḍaññassa sotāpattimaggā pavattamānaṃ, phalakkhaṇe pavattaṃ nāma. tesu paṭivedhañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ, desanāñāṇaṃ lokiyaṃ. ubhayampi panetaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ, buddhānaṃyeva orasañāṇaṃ.

[03] ^b^sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato^eb^ti ``ahaṃ sammāsambuddho, sabbe dhammā mayā abhisambuddhā''ti evaṃ paṭijānato tava. ^b^anabhisambuddhā^eb^ti ime nāma ^a^M2.0255^ea^ dhammā tayā anabhisambuddhā. ^b^tatra vatā^eb^ti tesu ``anabhisambuddhā''ti evaṃ dassitadhammesu. ^b^sahadhammenā^eb^ti sahetunā sakāraṇena vacanena. ^b^nimittameta^eb^nti ettha puggalopi dhammopi nimittanti adhippeto ^a^P3.0011^ea^. taṃ puggalaṃ na passāmi, yo maṃ paṭicodessati. taṃ dhammaṃ na passāmi, yaṃ dassetvā ``ayaṃ nāma dhammo tayā anabhisambuddho''ti maṃ paṭicodessatīti ayamettha attho. ^b^khemappatto^eb^ti khemaṃ patto. sesapadadvayaṃ imasseva vevacanaṃ. sabbampetaṃ vesārajjañāṇameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. dasabalassa hi ``ayaṃ nāma dhammo tayā anabhisambuddho''ti codakaṃ puggalaṃ vā codanākāraṇaṃ anabhisambuddhadhammaṃ vā apassato ``sabhāvabuddhoyeva vata samāno ahaṃ buddhosmīti vadāmī''ti paccavekkhantassa balavataraṃ somanassaṃ uppajjati, tena sampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ vesārajjaṃ nāma. taṃ sandhāya ``khemappatto''tiādimāha. evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^antarāyikā dhammā^eb^ti ettha pana antarāyaṃ karontīti ^b^antarāyikā^eb^. te atthato sañcicca vītikkantā satta āpattikkhandhā. sañcicca vītikkantaṃ hi antamaso dukkaṭadubbhāsitampi maggaphalānaṃ antarāyaṃ karoti. idha pana methunadhammo adhippeto. methunaṃ sevato hi yassa kassaci nissaṃsayameva maggaphalānaṃ antarāyo hoti.

[03] ^b^yassa kho pana te atthāyā^eb^ti rāgakkhayādīsu yassa atthāya. ^b^dhammo desito^eb^ti asubhabhāvanādidhammo kathito. ^b^tatra vata ma^eb^nti tasmiṃ aniyyānikadhamme maṃ. sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^vādapathā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0248^ea^ vādāyeva. ^b^puthū^eb^ti bahū. ^b^sitā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0012^ea^ upanibaddhā abhisaṅkhatā. atha vā ^b^puthussitā^eb^ti puthubhāvaṃ sitā upagatā, puthūhi vā sitātipi puthussitā. ^b^yaṃ nissitā^eb^ti etarahipi yaṃ vādapathaṃ nissitā. ^b^na te bhavantī^eb^ti te vādapathā na bhavanti bhijjanti vinassanti. ^b^dhammacakka^eb^nti desanāñāṇassapi paṭivedhañāṇassapi etaṃ nāmaṃ. tesu desanāñāṇaṃ lokiyaṃ, paṭivedhañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ. ^b^kevalī^eb^ti sakalaguṇasamannāgato. ^b^tādisa^eb^nti tathāvidhaṃ.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^M2.0256^ea^ uppajjati etesūti ^b^uppādā^eb^. kā uppajjati? taṇhā. taṇhāya uppādā ^b^taṇhuppādā,^eb^ taṇhāvatthūni taṇhākāraṇānīti attho. ^b^cīvarahetū^eb^ti ``kattha manāpaṃ cīvaraṃ labhissāmī''ti cīvarakāraṇā uppajjati. ^b^itibhavābhavahetū^eb^ti ettha ^b^itī^eb^ti nidassanatthe nipāto. yathā cīvarādihetu, evaṃ bhavābhavahetupīti attho. ^b^bhavābhavo^eb^ti cettha paṇītatarāni sappinavanītādīni adhippetāni. sampattibhavesu paṇītatarapaṇītatamabhavotipi vadantiyeva.

[03] ^b^taṇhādutiyo^eb^ti ayañhi satto anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe saṃsaranto na ekakova saṃsarati, taṇhaṃ pana dutiyikaṃ labhantova saṃsarati. tena vuttaṃ ``taṇhādutiyo''ti. ^b^itthabhāvaññathābhāva^eb^nti ^a^P3.0013^ea^ ettha itthabhāvo nāma ayaṃ attabhāvo, aññathābhāvo nāma anāgatattabhāvo. evarūpo vā aññopi attabhāvo itthabhāvo nāma, na evarūpo aññathābhāvo nāma. taṃ itthabhāvaññathābhāvaṃ. ^b^saṃsāra^eb^nti khandhadhātuāyatanānaṃ paṭipāṭiṃ. ^b^nātivattatī^eb^ti nātikkamati. ^b^evamādīnavaṃ ñatvā^eb^ti evaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannesu khandhesu ādīnavaṃ jānitvā. ^b^taṇhaṃ dukkhassa sambhava^eb^nti taṇhaṃ ca ``ayaṃ vaṭṭadukkhasambhūto sabhāvo kāraṇa''nti evaṃ jānitvā. ettāvatā imassa bhikkhuno vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pattabhāvo dassito. idāni taṃ khīṇāsavaṃ thomento ^b^vītataṇho^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^anādāno^eb^ti niggahaṇo. ^b^sato bhikkhu paribbaje^eb^ti satisampajaññe vepullappatto khīṇāsavo bhikkhu sato sampajāno careyya vihareyyāti attho. iti suttante vaṭṭaṃ kathetvā gāthāsu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^V2.0249^ea^ vaṭṭasmiṃ yojentīti ^b^yogā. kāmayogo^eb^tiādīsu pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo kāmayogo. rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo ^b^bhavayogo,^eb^ tathā jhānanikanti. sassatadiṭṭhisahagato ca rāgo dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo ca ^b^diṭṭhiyogo^eb^. catūsu saccesu aññāṇaṃ ^b^avijjāyogo^eb^. kāmesu vā yojetīti kāmayogo. bhavesu yojetīti ^a^M2.0257^ea^ bhavayogo. diṭṭhīsu yojetīti diṭṭhiyogo. avijjāya yojetīti avijjāyogoti heṭṭhā vuttadhammānaṃyevetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.

[03] idāni ^a^P3.0014^ea^ te vitthāretvā dassento ^b^katamo ca, bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^samudaya^eb^nti uppattiṃ. ^b^atthaṅgama^eb^nti bhedaṃ. ^b^assāda^eb^nti madhurabhāvaṃ. ^b^ādīnava^eb^nti amadhurabhāvaṃ dosaṃ. ^b^nissaraṇa^eb^nti nissaṭabhāvaṃ. ^b^kāmesū^eb^ti vatthukāmesu. ^b^kāmarāgo^eb^ti kāme ārabbha uppannarāgo. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^anusetī^eb^ti nibbattati. ^b^ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, kāmayogo^eb^ti, bhikkhave, idaṃ kāmesu yojanakāraṇaṃ bandhanakāraṇaṃ vuccatīti evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^phassāyatanāna^eb^nti cakkhādīnaṃ cakkhusamphassādikāraṇānaṃ. ^b^avijjā aññāṇa^eb^nti ñāṇapaṭipakkhabhāvena aññāṇasaṅkhātā avijjā. ^b^iti kāmayogo^eb^ti ettha iti saddo catūhipi yogehi saddhiṃ yojetabbo ``evaṃ kāmayogo, evaṃ bhavayogo''ti. ^b^saṃyutto^eb^ti parivārito. ^b^pāpakehī^eb^ti lāmakehi. ^b^akusalehī^eb^ti akosallasambhūtehi. ^b^saṃkilesikehī^eb^ti saṃkilesanakehi, pasannassa cittassa pasannabhāvadūsakehīti attho. ^b^ponobbhavikehī^eb^ti punabbhavanibbattakehi. ^b^sadarehī^eb^ti sadarathehi. ^b^dukkhavipākehī^eb^ti vipākakāle dukkhuppādakehi. ^b^āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇikehī^eb^ti anāgate punappunaṃ jātijarāmaraṇanibbattakehi. ^b^tasmā^eb^ ^a^P3.0015^ea^ ^b^ayogakkhemīti vuccatī^eb^ti yasmā appahīnayogo puggalo etehi dhammehi sampayutto hoti, tasmā catūhi yogehi khemaṃ nibbānaṃ anadhigatattā na yogakkhemīti vuccati.

[03] ^b^visaṃyogo^eb^ti visaṃyojanakāraṇāni. ^b^kāmayogavisaṃyogo^eb^ti kāmayogato visaṃyojanakāraṇaṃ. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. tattha asubhajjhānaṃ kāmayogavisaṃyogo, taṃ pādakaṃ katvā adhigato anāgāmimaggo ekanteneva kāmayogavisaṃyogo nāma. arahattamaggo bhavayogavisaṃyogo nāma, sotāpattimaggo diṭṭhiyogavisaṃyogo ^a^M2.0258^ea^ nāma, arahattamaggo avijjāyogavisaṃyogo ^a^V2.0250^ea^ nāma. idāni te vitthāravasena dassento ^b^katamo ca, bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha. tassattho vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03] ^b^bhavayogena cūbhaya^eb^nti bhavayogena ca saṃyuttā, kiñci bhiyyo ubhayenāpi sampayuttā, yena kenaci yogena samannāgatāti attho. ^b^purakkhatā^eb^ti purato katā, parivāritā vā. ^b^kāme pariññāyā^eb^ti duvidhepi kāme parijānitvā. ^b^bhavayogañca sabbaso^eb^ti bhavayogañca sabbameva parijānitvā. ^b^samūhaccā^eb^ti samūhanitvā. ^b^virājaya^eb^nti virājento, virājetvā vā. ``virājento''ti hi vutte maggo kathito hoti, ``virājetvā''ti vutte phalaṃ. ^b^munī^eb^ti khīṇāsavamuni. iti imasmiṃ suttepi gāthāsupi vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitanti.
[06] bhaṇḍagāmavaggo paṭhamo.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ dutiyassa ^a^V2.0251^ea^ ^a^P3.0016^ea^ paṭhame ^b^adhivāsetī^eb^ti cittaṃ adhiropetvā vāseti. ^b^nappajahatī^eb^ti na pariccajati. ^b^na vinodetī^eb^ti na nīharati. ^b^na byantīkarotī^eb^ti na vigatantaṃ paricchinnaparivaṭumaṃ karoti. ^b^na anabhāvaṃ gametī^eb^ti na anuabhāvaṃ avaḍḍhiṃ vināsaṃ gameti. ^b^carampī^eb^ti carantopi. ^b^anātāpī^eb^ti nibbīriyo. ^b^anottāpī^eb^ti upavādabhayarahito. ^b^satata^eb^nti niccaṃ. ^b^samita^eb^nti nirantaraṃ. evaṃ sabbattha atthaṃ ñatvā sukkapakkhe vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^gehanissita^eb^nti kilesanissitaṃ. ^b^mohaneyyesū^eb^ti mohajanakesu ārammaṇesu. ^b^abhabbo^eb^ti abhājanabhūto. ^b^phuṭṭhuṃ sambodhimuttama^eb^nti arahattamaggasaṅkhātaṃ uttamañāṇaṃ phusituṃ.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^M2.0259^ea^ ^b^sampannasīlā^eb^ti paripuṇṇasīlā. ^b^sampannapātimokkhā^eb^ti paripuṇṇapātimokkhā. ^b^pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0017^ea^ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlena saṃvutā pihitā upetā hutvā viharatha. ^b^ācāragocarasampannā^eb^ti ācārena ca gocarena ca sampannā samupāgatā bhavatha. ^b^aṇumattesu vajjesū^eb^ti aṇuppamāṇesu dosesu. ^b^bhayadassāvino^eb^ti tāni aṇumattāni vajjāni bhayato dassanasīlā. ^b^samādāya sikkhatha sikkhāpadesū^eb^ti sabbasikkhākoṭṭhāsesu samādātabbaṃ samādāya gahetvā sikkhatha. ``sampannasīlānaṃ...pe0... sikkhāpadesū''ti ettakena dhammakkhānena sikkhattaye samādāpetvā ceva paṭiladdhaguṇesu ca vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā idāni uttari kātabbaṃ dassento ^b^kimassā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^kimassā^eb^ti kiṃ bhaveyya.

[03] ^b^yataṃ care^eb^ti yathā caranto yato hoti saṃyato, evaṃ careyya. esa nayo sabbattha. ^b^acche^eb^ti ^a^V2.0252^ea^ nisīdeyya. ^b^yatamenaṃ pasāraye^eb^ti yaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ pasāreyya, taṃ yataṃ saṃyatameva katvā pasāreyya. ^b^uddha^eb^nti upari. ^b^tiriya^eb^nti majjhaṃ. ^b^apācīna^eb^nti adho. ettāvatā atītā paccuppannā anāgatā ca pañcakkhandhā kathitā. ^b^yāvatā^eb^ti paricchedavacanaṃ. ^b^jagato^eb^ ^a^P3.0018^ea^ ^b^gatī^eb^ti lokassa nipphatti. ^b^samavekkhitā ca dhammānaṃ, khandhānaṃ udayabbaya^eb^nti etesaṃ sabbaloke atītādibhedānaṃ pañcakkhandhadhammānaṃ udayañca vayañca samavekkhitā. ``pañcakkhandhānaṃ udayaṃ passanto pañcavīsati lakkhaṇāni passati, vayaṃ passanto pañcavīsati lakkhaṇāni passatī''ti vuttehi samapaññāsāya lakkhaṇehi sammā avekkhitā hoti. ^b^cetosamathasāmīci^eb^nti cittasamathassa anucchavikaṃ paṭipadaṃ. ^b^sikkhamāna^eb^nti paṭipajjamānaṃ, pūrayamānanti attho. ^b^pahitatto^eb^ti pesitatto. ^b^āhū^eb^ti kathayanti. sesamettha uttānameva. imasmiṃ pana sutte sīlaṃ missakaṃ kathetvā gāthāsu khīṇāsavo kathito.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^M2.0260^ea^ ^b^sammappadhānānī^eb^ti sundarapadhānāni uttamavīriyāni. ^b^sammappadhānā^eb^ti paripuṇṇavīriyā. ^b^māradheyyābhibhūtā^eb^ti tebhūmakavaṭṭasaṅkhātaṃ māradheyyaṃ abhibhavitvā samatikkamitvā ṭhitā. ^b^te asitā^eb^ti te khīṇāsavā anissitā nāma. ^b^jātimaraṇabhayassā^eb^ti jātiñca maraṇañca paṭicca uppajjanakabhayassa, jātimaraṇasaṅkhātasseva vā bhayassa. ^b^pāragū^eb^ti pāraṅgatā. ^b^te tusitā^eb^ti te khīṇāsavā tuṭṭhā nāma. ^b^jetvā māraṃ savāhini^eb^nti sasenakaṃ māraṃ jinitvā ṭhitā. ^b^te^eb^ ^a^P3.0019^ea^ ^b^anejā^eb^ti te khīṇāsavā taṇhāsaṅkhātāya ejāya anejā niccalā nāma. ^b^namucibala^eb^nti mārabalaṃ. ^b^upātivattā^eb^ti atikkantā. ^b^te sukhitā^eb^ti te khīṇāsavā lokuttarasukhena sukhitā nāma. tenevāha --
[21] ``sukhitā vata arahanto, taṇhā nesaṃ na vijjati.
[22] asmimāno samucchinno, mohajālaṃ padālita''nti.. (saṃ0 ni0 3.76).

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^padhānānī^eb^ti vīriyāni. ^b^saṃvarappadhāna^eb^nti cakkhādīni saṃvarantassa uppannavīriyaṃ ^a^V2.0253^ea^. ^b^pahānappadhāna^eb^nti kāmavitakkādayo pajahantassa uppannavīriyaṃ. ^b^bhāvanāppadhāna^eb^nti sambojjhaṅge bhāventassa uppannavīriyaṃ. ^b^anurakkhaṇāppadhāna^eb^nti samādhinimittaṃ anurakkhantassa uppannavīriyaṃ.

[03] ^b^vivekanissita^eb^ntiādīsu viveko, virāgo, nirodhoti tīṇipi nibbānassa nāmāni. nibbānaṃ hi upadhivivekattā ^b^viveko,^eb^ taṃ āgamma rāgādayo virajjantīti ^b^virāgo,^eb^ nirujjhantīti ^b^nirodho^eb^. tasmā vivekanissitantiādīsu ārammaṇavasena vā adhigantabbavasena vā nibbānanissitanti attho.

[03] ^b^vossaggapariṇāmi^eb^nti ettha dve vossaggā -- pariccāgavossaggo ca pakkhandanavossaggo ca. tattha vipassanā tadaṅgavasena kilese ca khandhe ca rāgaṃ pariccajatīti ^b^pariccāgavossaggo^eb^. maggo ārammaṇavasena nibbānaṃ pakkhandatīti ^b^pakkhandanavossaggo^eb^. tasmā vossaggapariṇāminti yathā bhāviyamāno ^a^M2.0261^ea^ satisambojjhaṅgo vossaggatthāya pariṇamati, vipassanābhāvañca maggabhāvañca pāpuṇāti, evaṃ taṃ bhāvetīti ayamettha attho. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^bhaddaka^eb^nti ^a^P3.0020^ea^ laddhakaṃ. ^b^samādhinimittaṃ^eb^ vuccati aṭṭhikasaññādivasena adhigato samādhiyeva. ^b^anurakkhatī^eb^ti samādhipāripanthikadhamme rāgadosamohe sodhento rakkhati. ettha ca aṭṭhikasaññādikā pañceva saññā vuttā, imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne dasapi asubhāni vitthāretvā kathetabbāni. tesaṃ vitthāro visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.102 ādayo) vuttoyeva. gāthāya saṃvarādinipphādakaṃ vīriyameva vuttaṃ. ^b^khayaṃ dukkhassa pāpuṇe^eb^ti dukkhakkhayasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇeyyāti.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^aggapaññattiyo^eb^ti uttamapaññattiyo. ^b^attabhāvīna^eb^nti attabhāvavantānaṃ. ^b^yadidaṃ rāhu asurindo^eb^ti yo esa rāhu asurindo ayaṃ aggoti. ettha rāhu kira asurindo cattāri yojanasahassāni aṭṭha ca yojanasatāni ucco, bāhantaramassa dvādasayojanasatāni, hatthatalapādatalānaṃ puthulatā tīṇi yojanasatāni. aṅgulipabbāni paṇṇāsa yojanāni, bhamukantaraṃ paṇṇāsayojanaṃ, nalāṭaṃ tiyojanasataṃ, sīsaṃ navayojanasataṃ. ^b^kāmabhogīnaṃ yadidaṃ rājā mandhātā^eb^ti yo esa rājā mandhātā nāma, ayaṃ dibbepi mānusakepi kāme paribhuñjanakānaṃ ^a^V2.0254^ea^ sattānaṃ aggo nāma. esa hi asaṅkheyyāyukesu manussesu nibbattitvā icchiticchitakkhaṇe hiraññavassaṃ vassāpento mānusake kāme dīgharattaṃ paribhuñji. devaloke ^a^P3.0021^ea^ pana yāva chattiṃsāya indānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ, tāva paṇīte kāme paribhuñjīti kāmabhogīnaṃ aggo nāma jāto. ^b^ādhipateyyāna^eb^nti adhipatiṭṭhānaṃ jeṭṭhakaṭṭhānaṃ karontānaṃ. ^b^tathāgato aggamakkhāyatī^eb^ti lokiyalokuttarehi guṇehi tathāgato aggo seṭṭho uttamo akkhāyati.

[03] ^b^iddhiyā yasasā jala^eb^nti dibbasampattisamiddhiyā ca parivārasaṅkhātena yasasā ca jalantānaṃ. ^b^uddhaṃ tiriyaṃ apācīna^eb^nti upari ca majjhe ca heṭṭhā ca. ^b^yāvatā jagato gatī^eb^ti yattakā lokanipphatti.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^M2.0262^ea^ ^b^sokhummānī^eb^ti sukhumalakkhaṇapaṭivijjhanakāni ñāṇāni. ^b^rūpasokhummena samannāgato hotī^eb^ti rūpe saṇhasukhumalakkhaṇapariggāhakena ñāṇena samannāgato hoti. ^b^paramenā^eb^ti uttamena. ^b^tena ca rūpasokhummenā^eb^ti tena yāva anulomabhāvaṃ pattena sukhumalakkhaṇapariggāhakañāṇena. ^b^na samanupassatī^eb^ti natthibhāveneva na passati. ^b^na patthetī^eb^ti natthibhāveneva na pattheti. ^b^vedanāsokhummā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^rūpasokhummataṃ ñatvā^eb^ti rūpakkhandhassa saṇhasukhumalakkhaṇapariggāhakena ñāṇena sukhumataṃ jānitvā. ^b^vedanānañca sambhava^eb^nti vedanākkhandhassa ca pabhavaṃ jānitvā. ^b^saññā yato samudetī^eb^ti yasmā kāraṇā saññākkhandho samudeti nibbattati, tañca jānitvā. ^b^atthaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0022^ea^ ^b^gacchati yattha cā^eb^ti yasmiṃ ṭhāne nirujjhati, tañca jānitvā. ^b^saṅkhāre parato ñatvā^eb^ti saṅkhārakkhandhaṃ aniccatāya lujjanabhāvena parato jānitvā. iminā hi padena aniccānupassanā kathitā. ^b^dukkhato no ca attato^eb^ti iminā dukkhānattānupassanā. ^b^santo^eb^ti kilesasantatāya santo. ^b^santipade rato^eb^ti nibbāne rato. iti suttante catūsu ṭhānesu vipassanāva kathitā, gāthāsu lokuttaradhammopīti.

[03] 17-19^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^V2.0255^ea^ ^b^agatigamanānī^eb^ti nagatigamanāni. ^b^chandāgatiṃ gacchatī^eb^ti chandena agatiṃ gacchati, akattabbaṃ karoti. sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^chandā dosā bhayā mohā^eb^ti chandena, dosena, bhayena, mohena. ^b^ativattatī^eb^ti atikkamati. aṭṭhamaṃ uttānameva. navame tathābujjhanakānaṃ vasena dvīhipi nayehi kathitaṃ.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^bhattuddesako^eb^ti salākabhattādīnaṃ uddesako. ^b^kāmesu asaṃyatā^eb^ti vatthukāmesu kilesakāmehi asaṃyatā. ^b^parisākasaṭo^eb^ ^a^M2.0263^ea^ ^b^ca panesa vuccatī^eb^ti ayañca pana so evarūpā parisākacavaro nāma vuccatīti attho. ^b^samaṇenā^eb^ti buddhasamaṇena. ^b^parisāya maṇḍo ca panesa vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ evarūpā parisā vippasannena parisāmaṇḍoti vuccatīti.
[06] caravaggo dutiyo.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ tatiyassa ^a^V2.0256^ea^ ^a^P3.0023^ea^ paṭhame ^b^uruvelāya^eb^nti ettha ^b^uruvelā^eb^ti mahāvelā, mahāvālikarāsīti attho. atha vā ^b^urū^eb^ti vālukā vuccati, ^b^velā^eb^ti mariyādā. velātikkamanahetu āhaṭā uru uruvelāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. atīte kira anuppanne buddhe dasasahassā kulaputtā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tasmiṃ padese viharantā ekadivasaṃ sannipatitvā katikavattaṃ akaṃsu -- ``kāyakammavacīkammāni nāma paresampi pākaṭāni honti, manokammaṃ pana apākaṭaṃ. tasmā yo kāmavitakkaṃ vā byāpādavitakkaṃ vā vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ vā vitakketi, tassa añño codako nāma natthi. so attanāva attānaṃ codetvā pattapuṭena vālukaṃ āharitvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne ākiratu, idamassa daṇḍakamma''nti. tato paṭṭhāya yo tādisaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakketi, so tattha pattapuṭena vālukaṃ ākirati, evaṃ tattha anukkamena mahāvālukarāsi jāto. tato naṃ pacchimā janatā parikkhipitvā cetiyaṭṭhānamakāsi, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ -- ``uruvelāti mahāvelā, mahāvālikarāsīti attho''ti. tameva sandhāya vuttaṃ -- ``atha vā urūti vālukā vuccati, velāti mariyādā, velātikkamanahetu āhaṭā uru uruvelāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo''ti.

[03] ^b^najjā nerañjarāya tīre^eb^ti uruvelagāmaṃ nissāya nerañjarānadītīre viharāmīti dasseti. ^b^ajapālanigrodhe^eb^ti ^a^P3.0024^ea^ ajapālakā tassa nigrodhassa ^a^M2.0264^ea^ chāyāya nisīdantipi tiṭṭhantipi, tasmā so ajapālanigrodhotveva saṅkhaṃ gato, tassa heṭṭhāti attho. ^b^paṭhamābhisambuddho^eb^ti sambuddho hutvā paṭhamameva. ^b^udapādī^eb^ti ayaṃ vitakko pañcame sattāhe udapādi. kasmā udapādīti? sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇattā ceva pubbāsevanatāya ca. tattha pubbāsevanāya pakāsanatthaṃ tittirajātakaṃ āharitabbaṃ. hatthivānaratittirā kira ekasmiṃ padese viharantā ``yo amhākaṃ mahallako, tasmiṃ sagāravā viharissāmā''ti nigrodhaṃ dassetvā ``ko nu kho amhākaṃ mahallako''ti vīmaṃsantā tittirassa mahallakabhāvaṃ ñatvā tassa jeṭṭhāpacāyanakammaṃ katvā aññamaññaṃ ^a^V2.0257^ea^ samaggā sammodamānā viharitvā saggaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ. taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā rukkhe adhivatthā devatā imaṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``ye vuḍḍhamapacāyanti, narā dhammassa kovidā.
[22] diṭṭheva dhamme pāsaṃsā, samparāye ca suggatī''ti.. (jā0 1.1.37).

[03] evaṃ ahetukatiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattopi tathāgato sagāravavāsaṃ rocesi, idāni kasmā na rocessatīti. ^b^agāravo^eb^ti aññasmiṃ gāravarahito, kañci garuṭṭhāne aṭṭhapetvāti attho. ^b^appatisso^eb^ti patissayarahito, kañci jeṭṭhakaṭṭhāne aṭṭhapetvāti attho. ^b^samaṇaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0025^ea^ ^b^vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā^eb^ti ettha samitapāpabāhitapāpāyeva samaṇabrāhmaṇā adhippetā. ^b^sakkatvā garuṃ katvā^eb^ti sakkārañceva katvā garukārañca upaṭṭhapetvā.

[03] ^b^sadevake loke^eb^tiādīsu saddhiṃ devehi sadevake. devaggahaṇena cettha mārabrahmesu gahitesupi māro nāma vasavattī sabbesaṃ upari vasaṃ vatteti, brahmā nāma mahānubhāvo, ekaṅguliyā ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷasahasse ālokaṃ pharati, dvīhi dvīsu, dasahi aṅgulīhi dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu ālokaṃ pharati. so iminā sīlasampannataroti vattuṃ mā labhantūti ^b^samārake sabrahmake^eb^ti visuṃ vuttaṃ. tathā samaṇā nāma ekanikāyādivasena bahussutā sīlavanto paṇḍitā, brāhmaṇāpi vatthuvijjādivasena bahussutā paṇḍitā. te iminā sampannatarāti vattuṃ ^a^M2.0265^ea^ mā labhantūti ^b^sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāyā^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^sadevamanussāyā^eb^ti idaṃ pana nippadesato dassanatthaṃ gahitameva gahetvā vuttaṃ. apicettha purimāni tīṇi padāni lokavasena vuttāni, pacchimāni dve pajāvasena. ^b^sīlasampannatara^eb^nti sīlena sampannataraṃ, adhikataranti attho. ettha ca sīlādayo cattāro dhammā lokiyalokuttarā kathitā, vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ lokiyameva. paccavekkhaṇañāṇameva hetaṃ. ^b^pāturahosī^eb^ti ``ayaṃ satthā avīcito yāva bhavaggā sīlādīhi attanā adhikataraṃ apassanto `mayā paṭividdhanavalokuttaradhammameva sakkatvā upanissāya viharissāmī'ti cinteti, kāraṇaṃ bhagavā cinteti, atthaṃ vuḍḍhiṃ visesaṃ ^a^P3.0026^ea^ cinteti, gacchāmissa ussāhaṃ janessāmī''ti cintetvā purato pākaṭo ahosi, abhimukhe aṭṭhāsīti attho.

[03] ^b^vihaṃsu^eb^ ^a^V2.0258^ea^ ^b^viharanti cā^eb^ti ettha yo vadeyya -- ``viharantīti vacanato paccuppannepi bahū buddhā''ti, so ``bhagavāpi bhante etarahi arahaṃ sammāsambuddho''ti iminā vacanena paṭibāhitabbo.
[21] ``na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati.
[22] sadevakasmiṃ lokasmiṃ, natthi me paṭipuggalo''ti.. (mahāva0 11; ma0 ni0 2.341) --

[25] ādīhi cassa suttehi aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ abhāvo dīpetabbo. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā sabbepi buddhā saddhammagaruno, tasmā. ^b^mahattamabhikaṅkhatā^eb^ti mahantabhāvaṃ patthayamānena. ^b^saraṃ buddhāna sāsana^eb^nti buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ sarantena.

[03] ^b^yato^eb^ti yasmiṃ kāle. ^b^mahattena samannāgato^eb^ti rattaññumahattaṃ vepullamahattaṃ brahmacariyamahattaṃ lābhaggamahattanti iminā catubbidhena mahattena samannāgato. ^b^atha me saṅghepi gāravo^eb^ti atha mayhaṃ saṅghepi gāravo jāto. kismiṃ pana kāle bhagavatā saṅghe gāravo katoti? mahāpajāpatiyā dussayugadānakāle. tadā hi bhagavā attano upanītaṃ dussayugaṃ ``saṅghe, gotami, dehi, saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi saṅgho cā''ti vadanto saṅghe gāravaṃ akāsi nāma.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^M2.0266^ea^ ^b^sambahulā^eb^ti bahukā. ^b^brāhmaṇā^eb^ti huhukkajātikena brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ āgatā brāhmaṇā. ^b^jiṇṇā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0027^ea^ jarājiṇṇā. ^b^vuḍḍhā^eb^ti vayovuddhā. ^b^mahallakā^eb^ti jātimahallakā. ^b^addhagatā^eb^ti tayo vaye addhe atikkantā. ^b^sutameta^eb^nti amhehi sutaṃ etaṃ. ^b^tayidaṃ bho, gotama, tathevā^eb^ti bho, gotama, etaṃ amhehi sutakāraṇaṃ tathā eva. ^b^tayidaṃ bho, gotama, na sampannamevā^eb^ti taṃ etaṃ abhivādanādiakaraṇaṃ ananucchavikameva.

[03] ^b^akālavādī^eb^tiādīsu akāle vadatīti ^b^akālavādī^eb^. asabhāvaṃ vadatīti ^b^abhūtavādī^eb^. anatthaṃ vadati, no atthanti ^b^anatthavādī^eb^. adhammaṃ vadati, no dhammanti ^b^adhammavādī^eb^. avinayaṃ vadati ^a^V2.0259^ea^, no vinayanti ^b^avinayavādī. anidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā^eb^ti na hadaye nidhetabbayuttakaṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā. ^b^akālenā^eb^ti kathetuṃ ayuttakālena. ^b^anapadesa^eb^nti apadesarahitaṃ, sāpadesaṃ sakāraṇaṃ katvā na katheti. ^b^apariyantavati^eb^nti pariyantarahitaṃ, na paricchedaṃ dassetvā katheti. ^b^anatthasaṃhita^eb^nti na lokiyalokuttarātthanissitaṃ katvā katheti. ^b^bālo therotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti andhabālo theroti saṅkhaṃ gacchati.

[03] ^b^kālavādī^eb^tiādīni vuttapaṭipakkhavasena veditabbāni. ^b^paṇḍito therotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti paṇḍiccena samannāgatattā ^a^P3.0028^ea^ paṇḍito, thirabhāvappattiyā theroti saṅkhaṃ gacchati.

[03] ^b^bahussuto hotī^eb^ti bahuṃ assa sutaṃ hoti, navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ pāḷianusandhipubbāparavasena uggahitaṃ hotīti attho. ^b^sutadharo^eb^ti sutassa ādhārabhūto. yassa hi ito gahitaṃ ito palāyati, chiddaghaṭe udakaṃ viya na tiṭṭhati, parisamajjhe ekasuttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathetuṃ vā vācetuṃ vā na sakkoti, ayaṃ na sutadharo nāma. yassa pana uggahitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahitakālasadisameva hoti, dasapi vīsatipi vassāni sajjhāyaṃ akarontassa neva nassati, ayaṃ sutadharo nāma. ^b^sutasannicayo^eb^ti sutassa sannicayabhūto. yassa hi sutaṃ hadayamañjūsāya sannicitaṃ silāya lekhā viya suvaṇṇapatte pakkhittasīhavasā viya ^a^M2.0267^ea^ ca tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ sutasannicayo nāma. ^b^dhātā^eb^ti dhātā paguṇā. ekaccassa hi uggahitabuddhavacanaṃ dhātaṃ paguṇaṃ niccalikaṃ na hoti, ``asukaṃ suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathehī''ti vutte ``sajjhāyitvā saṃsanditvā samanuggāhitvā jānissāmī''ti vadati. ekaccassa dhātaṃ paguṇaṃ bhavaṅgasotasadisaṃ hoti, ``asukaṃ suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathehī''ti vutte uddharitvā tameva katheti. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``dhātā''ti. ^b^vacasā^eb^ ^a^P3.0029^ea^ ^b^paricitā^eb^ti suttadasaka-vaggadasakapaṇṇāsadasakavasena vācāya sajjhāyitā. ^b^manasānupekkhitā^eb^ti cittena anupekkhitā. yassa vācāya sajjhāyitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ manasā cintentassa tattha tattha pākaṭaṃ hoti, mahādīpaṃ jāletvā ṭhitassa rūpagataṃ viya paññāyati, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā^eb^ti atthato ca kāraṇato ca paññāya suppaṭividdhā.

[03] ^b^ābhicetasikāna^eb^nti ^b^abhiceto^eb^ti abhikkantaṃ visuddhaṃ cittaṃ vuccati, adhicittaṃ vā, abhicetasi jātāni ābhicetasikāni, abhicetosannissitānīti vā ābhicetasikāni. ^b^diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāna^eb^nti ^a^V2.0260^ea^ diṭṭhadhamme sukhavihārānaṃ. diṭṭhadhammoti paccakkho attabhāvo vuccati, tattha sukhavihārabhūtānanti attho. rūpāvacarajjhānānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. tāni hi appetvā nisinnā jhāyino imasmiṃyeva attabhāve asaṃkiliṭṭhanekkhammasukhaṃ vindanti, tasmā ``diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānī''ti vuccati. ^b^nikāmalābhī^eb^ti nikāmena lābhī, attano icchāvasena lābhī, icchiticchitakkhaṇe samāpajjituṃ samatthoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^akicchalābhī^eb^ti sukheneva paccanīkadhamme vikkhambhetvā samāpajjituṃ samatthoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^akasiralābhī^eb^ti akasirānaṃ lābhī vipulānaṃ, yathāparicchedena vuṭṭhātuṃ samatthoti vuttaṃ hoti. ekacco hi lābhīyeva hoti, na pana icchiticchitakkhaṇe sakkoti samāpajjituṃ. ekacco sakkoti tathāsamāpajjituṃ, pāripanthike ^a^P3.0030^ea^ ca pana kicchena vikkhambheti. ekacco tathā ca samāpajjati, pāripanthike ca akiccheneva vikkhambheti, na sakkoti nāḷikayantaṃ viya yathāparicchedeyeva vuṭṭhātuṃ. yassa pana ayaṃ tividhāpi sampadā atthi, so ``akicchalābhī akasiralābhī''ti vuccati. ^b^āsavānaṃ khayā^eb^tiādīni vuttatthāneva. evamidha sīlampi bāhusaccampi khīṇāsavasseva sīlaṃ bāhusaccañca, jhānānipi khīṇāsavasseva vaḷañjanakajjhānāni kathitāni. ``āsavānaṃ khayā''tiādīhi ^a^M2.0268^ea^ pana arahattaṃ kathitaṃ. phalena cettha maggakiccaṃ pakāsitanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^uddhatenā^eb^ti uddhaccasahagatena. ^b^sampha^eb^nti palāpakathaṃ. ^b^asamāhitasaṅkappo^eb^ti aṭṭhapitasaṅkappo. ^b^mago^eb^ti magasadiso. ^b^ārā^eb^ti dūre. ^b^thāvareyyamhā^eb^ti thāvarabhāvato. ^b^pāpadiṭṭhī^eb^ti lāmakadiṭṭhi. ^b^anādaro^eb^ti ādararahito. ^b^sutavā^eb^ti sutena upagato. ^b^paṭibhānavā^eb^ti duvidhena paṭibhānena samannāgato. ^b^paññāyatthaṃ vipassatī^eb^ti sahavipassanāya maggapaññāya catunnaṃ saccānaṃ atthaṃ vinivijjhitvā passati. ^b^pāragū sabbadhammāna^eb^nti sabbesaṃ khandhādidhammānaṃ ^a^P3.0031^ea^ pāraṃ gato, abhiññāpāragū, pariññāpāragū, pahānapāragū, bhāvanāpāragū, sacchikiriyāpāragū, samāpattipāragūti evaṃ chabbidhena pāragamanena sabbadhammānaṃ pāraṃ pariyosānaṃ gato. ^b^akhilo^eb^ti rāgakhilādivirahito. ^b^paṭibhānavā^eb^ti duvidheneva paṭibhānena samannāgato. ^b^brahmacariyassa kevalī^eb^ti sakalabrahmacariyo. sesamettha uttānamevāti.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^loko^eb^ti dukkhasaccaṃ. ^b^abhisambuddho^eb^ti ñāto paccakkho kato. ^b^lokasmā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0261^ea^ dukkhasaccato. ^b^pahīno^eb^ti mahābodhimaṇḍe arahattamaggañāṇena pahīno. ^b^tathāgatassa bhāvitā^eb^ti tathāgatena bhāvitā.

[03] evaṃ ettakena ṭhānena catūhi saccehi attano buddhabhāvaṃ kathetvā idāni tathāgatabhāvaṃ kathetuṃ ^b^yaṃ, bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^diṭṭha^eb^nti rūpāyatanaṃ. ^b^suta^eb^nti saddāyatanaṃ. ^b^muta^eb^nti patvā gahetabbato gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ. ^b^viññāta^eb^nti sukhadukkhādi dhammārammaṇaṃ. ^b^patta^eb^nti pariyesitvā vā apariyesitvā vā pattaṃ. ^b^pariyesita^eb^nti pattaṃ vā appattaṃ vā pariyesitaṃ. ^b^anuvicaritaṃ manasā^eb^ti cittena anusañcaritaṃ.

[03] ^b^tathāgatena^eb^ ^a^M2.0269^ea^ ^b^abhisambuddha^eb^nti iminā etaṃ dasseti -- yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu imassa sadevakassa lokassa nīlaṃ pītakantiādi rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati, ``ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma rūpārammaṇaṃ ^a^P3.0032^ea^ disvā sumano vā dummano vā majjhatto vā jāto''ti sabbaṃ tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ. tathā yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu imassa sadevakassa lokassa bherisaddo mudiṅgasaddotiādi saddārammaṇaṃ sotadvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati, mūlagandho tacagandhotiādi gandhārammaṇaṃ ghānadvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati, mūlaraso khandharasotiādi rasārammaṇaṃ jivhādvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati, kakkhaḷaṃ mudukantiādi pathavīdhātutejodhātuvāyodhātubhedaṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ kāyadvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati, ``ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ phusitvā sumano vā dummano vā majjhatto vā jāto''ti sabbaṃ tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ. tathā yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu imassa sadevakassa lokassa sukhadukkhādibhedaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ manodvārassa āpāthaṃ āgacchati, ``ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma dhammārammaṇaṃ vijānitvā sumano vā dummano vā majjhatto vā jāto''ti sabbaṃ tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ. yañhi, bhikkhave, imesaṃ sabbasattānaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ, tattha tathāgatena adiṭṭhaṃ vā asutaṃ vā amutaṃ vā aviññātaṃ vā natthi, imassa pana mahājanassa pariyesitvā appattampi atthi, apariyesitvā appattampi atthi, pariyesitvā pattampi atthi, apariyesitvā pattampi atthi, sabbampi tathāgatassa appattaṃ nāma natthi ñāṇena asacchikataṃ.

[03] ^b^tasmā tathāgatoti vuccatī^eb^ti yaṃ yathā lokena gataṃ, tassa tatheva ^a^P3.0033^ea^ gatattā tathāgatoti vuccati ^a^V2.0262^ea^. pāḷiyaṃ pana ``abhisambuddha''nti vuttaṃ, taṃ gatasaddena ekatthaṃ. iminā nayena sabbavāresu tathāgatoti nigamassa attho veditabbo. tassa yutti ekapuggalavaṇṇanāyaṃ tathāgatasaddavitthāre vuttāyeva. apicettha ^b^aññadatthū^eb^ti ekaṃsatthe nipāto. dakkhatīti ^b^daso^eb^. vasaṃ vattetīti ^b^vasavattī^eb^.

[03] ^b^sabbaṃ lokaṃ abhiññā^eb^ti tedhātukaṃ lokasannivāsaṃ jānitvā. ^b^sabbaṃ loke yathātatha^eb^nti tasmiṃ tedhātukalokasannivāse yaṃkiñci neyyaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ yathātathaṃ aviparītaṃ jānitvā. ^b^visaṃyutto^eb^ti catunnaṃ ^a^M2.0270^ea^ yogānaṃ pahānena visaṃyutto. ^b^anūpayo^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhiupayehi virahito. ^b^sabbābhibhū^eb^ti rūpādīni sabbārammaṇāni abhibhavitvā ṭhito. ^b^dhīro^eb^ti dhitisampanno. ^b^sabbaganthappamocano^eb^ti sabbe cattāropi ganthe mocetvā ṭhito. ^b^phuṭṭhassā^eb^ti phuṭṭhā assa. idañca karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^paramā santī^eb^ti nibbānaṃ. tañhi tena ñāṇaphusanena phuṭṭhaṃ. tenevāha -- ^b^nibbānaṃ akutobhaya^eb^nti. atha ^a^P3.0034^ea^ vā ^b^paramāsantī^eb^ti uttamā santi. katarā sāti? nibbānaṃ. yasmā pana nibbāne kutoci bhayaṃ natthi, tasmā taṃ ^b^akutobhaya^eb^nti vuccati. ^b^vimutto upadhisaṅkhaye^eb^ti upadhisaṅkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne tadārammaṇāya phalavimuttiyā vimutto. ^b^sīho anuttaro^eb^ti parissayānaṃ sahanaṭṭhena kilesānañca hiṃsanaṭṭhena tathāgato anuttaro sīho nāma. ^b^brahma^eb^nti seṭṭhaṃ. ^b^itī^eb^ti evaṃ tathāgatassa guṇe jānitvā. ^b^saṅgammā^eb^ti samāgantvā. ^b^taṃ namassantī^eb^ti taṃ tathāgataṃ te saraṇaṃ gatā namassanti. idāni yaṃ vadantā te namassanti, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^danto^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. taṃ uttānatthamevāti.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ catutthaṃ atthuppattiyaṃ nikkhittaṃ. katarāya atthuppattiyanti? dasabalaguṇakathāya. anāthapiṇḍikassa kira dhītā cūḷasubhaddā ``sāketanagare kāḷakaseṭṭhiputtassa gehaṃ gacchissāmī''ti satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, ``bhante, ahaṃ micchādiṭṭhikakulaṃ gacchāmi. sace tattha sakkāraṃ labhissāmi, ekasmiṃ purise pesiyamāne papañco bhavissati, maṃ āvajjeyyātha bhagavā''ti paṭiññaṃ gahetvā agamāsi. seṭṭhi ``suṇisā me āgatā''ti maṅgalaṃ karontova bahuṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādetvā pañca acelakasatāni nimantesi. so tesu nisinnesu ``dhītā ^a^P3.0035^ea^ me āgantvā arahante vandatū''ti cūḷasubhaddāya pesesi. āgataphalā ariyasāvikā arahanteti ^a^V2.0263^ea^ vuttamatteyeva ``lābhā vata me''ti uṭṭhahitvā gatā te nissirikadassane acelake disvāva ``samaṇā nāma na evarūpā honti, tāta, yesaṃ neva ajjhattaṃ hirī, na bahiddhā ottappaṃ atthī''ti vatvā ``na ime samaṇā, dhīdhī''ti kheḷaṃ pātetvā nivattitvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gatā.

[03] tato ^a^M2.0271^ea^ acelakā ``mahāseṭṭhi kuto te evarūpā kālakaṇṇī laddhā, kiṃ sakalajambudīpe aññā dārikā natthī''ti seṭṭhiṃ paribhāsiṃsu. so ``ācariyā jānitvā vā kataṃ hotu ajānitvā vā, ahamettha jānissāmī''ti acelake uyyojetvā subhaddāya santikaṃ gantvā ``amma, kasmā evarūpaṃ akāsi, kasmā arahante lajjāpesī''ti āha. tāta, arahantā nāma evarūpā na hontīti. atha naṃ so āha --
[21] ``kīdisā samaṇā tuyhaṃ, bāḷhaṃ kho ne pasaṃsasi.
[22] kiṃsīlā kiṃsamācārā, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchitā''ti..
[03] sā āha --
[21] ``santindriyā santamanā, santatejā guṇamaggasaṇṭhitā.
[22] okkhittacakkhū mitabhāṇī, tādisā samaṇā mama..
[21] ``vasanti vanamogayha, nāgo chetvāva bandhanaṃ.
[22] ekakiyā adutiyā, tādisā samaṇā mamā''ti..

[03] evañca ^a^P3.0036^ea^ pana vatvā seṭṭhissa pure ṭhatvā tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇaṃ kathesi. seṭṭhi tassā vacanaṃ sutvā ``yadi evaṃ, tava samaṇe ānetvā maṅgalaṃ karomā''ti. sā pucchi ``kadā karissatha, tātā''ti. seṭṭhi cintesi -- ``katipāhaccayenāti vutte pesetvā pakkosāpeyyā''ti. atha naṃ ``sve ammā''ti āha. sā sāyanhasamaye uparipāsādaṃ āruyha mahantaṃ pupphasamuggaṃ gahetvā satthu guṇe anussaritvā aṭṭha pupphamuṭṭhiyo dasabalassa vissajjetvā añjaliṃ paggayha namassamānā aṭṭhāsi. evañca avaca -- ``bhagavā sve pañcahi ^a^V2.0264^ea^ bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā''ti. tāni pupphāni gantvā dasabalassa matthake vitānaṃ hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu. satthā āvajjento taṃ kāraṇaṃ addasa. dhammadesanāpariyosāne anāthapiṇḍikamahāseṭṭhi dasabalaṃ vanditvā ``sve, bhante, pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ mama gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā''ti āha. cūḷasubhaddāya nimantitamha seṭṭhīti. na, bhante, kañci āgataṃ passāmāti. āma, seṭṭhi, saddhā pana upāsikā dūre yojanasatamatthakepi yojanasahassamatthakepi ṭhitā himavanto viya paññāyatīti vatvā --
[21] ``dūre ^a^M2.0272^ea^ santo pakāsenti, himavantova pabbato.
[22] asantettha na dissanti, rattiṃ khittā yathā sarā''ti.. (dha0 pa0 304) --
[25] imaṃ gāthamāha. anāthapiṇḍiko ``bhante, mama, dhītu saṅgahaṃ karothā''ti vanditvā pakkāmi.

[03] satthā ānandattheraṃ āmantesi -- ``ahaṃ, ānanda, sāketaṃ gamissāmi, pañcannaṃ ^a^P3.0037^ea^ bhikkhusatānaṃ salākaṃ dehi. dadanto ca chaḷabhiññānaṃyeva dadeyyāsī''ti. thero tathā akāsi. cūḷasubhaddā rattibhāgasamanantare cintesi -- ``buddhā nāma bahukiccā bahukaraṇīyā, maṃ sallakkheyya vā na vā, kiṃ nu kho karissāmī''ti. tasmiṃ khaṇe vessavaṇo mahārājā cūḷasubhaddāya kathesi -- ``bhadde, mā kho tvaṃ vimanā ahosi, mā dummanā. adhivutthaṃ te bhagavatā svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghenā''ti. sā tuṭṭhapahaṭṭhā dānameva saṃvidahi. sakkopi kho devarājā vissakammaṃ āmantesi -- ``tāta, dasabalo cūḷasubhaddāya santikaṃ sāketanagaraṃ gacchissati, pañca kūṭāgārasatāni māpehī''ti. so tathā akāsi. satthā pañcahi chaḷabhiññasatehi parivuto kūṭāgārayānena maṇivaṇṇaṃ ākāsaṃ vilikhanto viya sāketanagaraṃ agamāsi.

[03] subhaddā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ datvā satthāraṃ vanditvā āha -- ``bhante, mayhaṃ sasurapakkho micchādiṭṭhiko, sādhu tesaṃ anucchavikadhammaṃ kathethā''ti. satthā dhammaṃ desesi. kāḷakaseṭṭhi sotāpanno hutvā attano uyyānaṃ dasabalassa adāsi. acelakā ``amhākaṃ paṭhamaṃ dinna''nti nikkhamituṃ na icchanti. ``gacchatha nīharitabbaniyāmena te nīharathā''ti sabbe nīharāpetvā tattheva satthu vihāraṃ kāretvā brahmadeyyaṃ katvā ^a^P3.0038^ea^ udakaṃ pātesi ^a^V2.0265^ea^. so kāḷakena kāritatāya kāḷakārāmo nāma jāto. bhagavā tasmiṃ samaye tattha viharati. tena vuttaṃ -- ``sākete viharati kāḷakārāme''ti.

[03] ^b^bhikkhū āmantesī^eb^ti pañcasate bhikkhū āmantesi. te kira sāketanagaravāsino kulaputtā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā satthu santike pabbajitvā upaṭṭhānasālāya nisinnā ``aho buddhaguṇā nāma mahantā, evarūpaṃ nāma micchādiṭṭhikaṃ kāḷakaseṭṭhiṃ diṭṭhito mocetvā sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpetvā ^a^M2.0273^ea^ sakalanagaraṃ satthārā devalokasadisaṃ kata''nti dasabalassa guṇaṃ kathenti. satthā tesaṃ guṇaṃ kathentānaṃ cittaṃ upaparikkhitvā -- ``mayi gate mahatī desanā samuṭṭhissati, desanāpariyosāne ca ime pañcasatā bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahissanti, mahāpathavī udakapariyantaṃ katvā kampissatī''ti dhammasabhaṃ gantvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno te bhikkhū ādiṃ katvā ^b^yaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassā^eb^ti imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. evamidaṃ suttaṃ guṇakathāya nikkhittanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] tattha ``tamahaṃ jānāmī''ti padapariyosāne mahāpathavī udakapariyantaṃ katvā akampittha. ^b^abbhaññāsi^eb^nti abhiaññāsiṃ, jāninti attho. ^b^vidita^eb^nti pākaṭaṃ katvā ñātaṃ. iminā etaṃ dasseti -- aññe jānantiyeva, mayā pana pākaṭaṃ katvā viditanti. imehi tīhi padehi sabbaññutabhūmi nāma kathitā. ^b^taṃ tathāgato na upaṭṭhāsī^eb^ti taṃ chadvārikaṃ ārammaṇaṃ tathāgato taṇhāya vā diṭṭhiyā vā na upaṭṭhāsi na upagañchi. ayañhi passati bhagavā cakkhunā rūpaṃ, chandarāgo ^a^P3.0039^ea^ bhagavato natthi, suvimuttacitto so bhagavā. suṇāti bhagavā sotena saddaṃ. ghāyati bhagavā ghānena gandhaṃ. sāyati bhagavā jivhāya rasaṃ. phusati bhagavā kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ. vijānāti bhagavā manasā dhammaṃ, chandarāgo bhagavato natthi, suvimuttacitto so bhagavā. tena vuttaṃ -- ``taṃ tathāgato na upaṭṭhāsī''ti. iminā padena khīṇāsavabhūmi kathitāti veditabbā.

[03] ^b^taṃ mamassa musā^eb^ti taṃ me vacanaṃ musāvādo nāma bhaveyya. ^b^taṃ passa tādisamevā^eb^ti tampi musāvādo bhaveyya. ^b^taṃ mamassa kalī^eb^ti taṃ vacanaṃ mayhaṃ doso bhaveyyāti attho. ettāvatā saccabhūmi nāma kathitāti veditabbā.

[03] ^b^daṭṭhā^eb^ ^a^V2.0266^ea^ ^b^daṭṭhabba^eb^nti disvā daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^diṭṭhaṃ na maññatī^eb^ti taṃ diṭṭhaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ ``ahaṃ mahājanena diṭṭhameva passāmī''ti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi na maññati. ^b^adiṭṭhaṃ na maññatī^eb^ti ``ahaṃ mahājanena adiṭṭhameva etaṃ passāmī''ti evampi taṇhādīhi maññanāhi na maññati. ^b^daṭṭhabbaṃ na maññatī^eb^ti ``mahājanena diṭṭhaṃ passāmī''ti evampi tāhi maññanāhi na maññati. daṭṭhabbañhi adiṭṭhampi hotiyeva. evarūpāni hi vacanāni tīsupi kālesu labbhanti, tenassa attho vutto. ^b^daṭṭhāraṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0040^ea^ ^b^na maññatī^eb^ti passitāraṃ ^a^M2.0274^ea^ ekasattaṃ nāma tāhi maññanāhi na maññatīti attho. sesaṭṭhānesupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. iminā ettakena ṭhānena suññatābhūmi nāma kathitā.

[03] ^b^iti kho, bhikkhave^eb^ti evaṃ kho, bhikkhave. ^b^tādīyeva tādī^eb^ti ^b^tāditā^eb^ nāma ekasadisatā. tathāgato ca yādiso lābhādīsu, tādisova alābhādīsu. tena vuttaṃ -- ``lābhepi tādī, alābhepi tādī. yasepi tādī, ayasepi tādī. nindāyapi tādī, pasaṃsāyapi tādī. sukhepi tādī, dukkhepi tādī''ti (mahāni0 38, 192). imāya tāditāya tādī. ^b^tamhā ca pana tādimhā^eb^ti tato tathāgatatādito añño uttaritaro vā paṇītataro vā tādī natthīti ettāvatā tādibhūmi nāma kathitā. imāhi pañcabhūmīhi desanaṃ niṭṭhāpentassa pañcasupi ṭhānesu mahāpathavī sakkhibhāvena akampittha. desanāpariyosāne te pañcasate adhunāpabbajite kulaputte ādiṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ pattānaṃ devamanussānaṃ caturāsīti pāṇasahassāni amatapānaṃ piviṃsu.

[03] bhagavāpi suttaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā gāthāhi kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto ^b^yaṃkiñcī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^a^P3.0041^ea^ ^b^ajjhositaṃ saccamutaṃ paresa^eb^nti paresaṃ saddhāya parapattiyāyanāya saccamutanti maññitvā ajjhositaṃ gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpetvā gahitaṃ. ^b^sayasaṃvutesū^eb^ti sayameva saṃvaritvā piyāyitvā gahitagahaṇesu, diṭṭhigatikesūti attho. diṭṭhigatikā hi sayaṃ saṃvutāti vuccanti. ^b^saccaṃ musā vāpi paraṃ daheyyā^eb^ti tesu sayaṃ saṃvutasaṅkhātesu diṭṭhigatikesu tathāgato tādī tesaṃ ekampi vacanaṃ ``idameva saccaṃ moghamañña''nti evaṃ saccaṃ musā vāpi paraṃ uttamaṃ katvā na odaheyya, na saddaheyya, na pattiyāyeyya. ^b^etañca salla^eb^nti etaṃ diṭṭhisallaṃ. ^b^paṭikacca disvā^eb^ti puretaraṃ bodhimūleyeva disvā. ^b^visattā^eb^ti laggā lagitā palibuddhā. ^b^jānāmi passāmi tatheva eta^eb^nti yathāyaṃ pajā ajjhositā gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpetvā visattā laggā lagitā, evaṃ ahampi ^a^V2.0267^ea^ jānāmi passāmi. tathā evaṃ yathā etāya pajāya gahitanti evaṃ ajjhositaṃ natthi tathāgatānanti attho.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^M2.0275^ea^ ^b^janakuhanattha^eb^nti tīhi kuhanavatthūhi janassa kuhanatthāya. ^b^na janalapanattha^eb^nti na janassa upalāpanatthaṃ. ^b^na lābhasakkārasilokānisaṃsattha^eb^nti na cīvarādithutivacanatthaṃ. ^b^na itivādappamokkhānisaṃsattha^eb^nti na tena tena kāraṇena ^a^P3.0042^ea^ katavādānisaṃsatthaṃ, na vādassa pamokkhānisaṃsatthaṃ. ^b^na iti maṃ jano jānātū^eb^ti na ``evaṃ kira esa bhikkhu, evaṃ kira esa bhikkhū''ti janassa jānanatthāya. ^b^saṃvarattha^eb^nti pañcahi saṃvarehi saṃvaraṇatthāya. ^b^pahānattha^eb^nti tīhi pahānehi pajahanatthāya. ^b^virāgattha^eb^nti rāgādīnaṃ virajjanatthāya. ^b^nirodhattha^eb^nti tesaṃyeva nirujjhanatthāya. ^b^anītiha^eb^nti itihaparivajjitaṃ, aparapattiyanti attho. ^b^nibbānogadhagāmina^eb^nti nibbānassa antogāminaṃ. maggabrahmacariyañhi nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karitvā nibbānassa antoyeva vattati pavattati. ^b^paṭipajjantī^eb^ti duvidhampi paṭipajjanti. imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathetvā gāthāsu vivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^kuhā^eb^ti kuhakā. ^b^thaddhā^eb^ti kodhena ca mānena ca thaddhā. ^b^lapā^eb^ti upalāpakā. ^b^siṅgī^eb^ti ``tattha katamaṃ siṅgaṃ, yaṃ siṅgaṃ siṅgāratā cāturatā cāturiyaṃ parikkhattatā pārikkhattiya''nti (vibha0 852) evaṃ vuttehi siṅgasadisehi pākaṭakilesehi samannāgatā. ^b^unnaḷā^eb^ti uggatanaḷā tucchamānaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitā. ^b^asamāhitā^eb^ti cittekaggamattassāpi alābhino. ^b^na^eb^ ^a^P3.0043^ea^ ^b^me te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū māmakā^eb^ti te mayhaṃ bhikkhū mama santakā na honti. ``te mayha''nti idaṃ pana satthāraṃ uddissa pabbajitattā vuttaṃ. ^b^te kho me, bhikkhave, bhikkhū māmakā^eb^ti idhāpi meti attānaṃ uddissa pabbajitattā vadati, sammāpaṭipannattā pana ``māmakā''ti āha. ^b^vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjantī^eb^ti sīlādīhi guṇehi vaḍḍhanato vuddhiṃ, niccalabhāvena virūḷhiṃ, sabbattha patthaṭatāya vepullaṃ pāpuṇanti. te panete yāva ^a^V2.0268^ea^ arahattamaggā viruhanti, arahattaphalaṃ patte virūḷhā nāma honti. iti imasmiṃ suttepi gāthāsupi vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^M2.0276^ea^ ^b^appānī^eb^ti parittāni. ^b^sulabhānī^eb^ti sukhena laddhabbāni, yattha katthaci sakkā honti labhituṃ. ^b^anavajjānī^eb^ti niddosāni. ^b^piṇḍiyālopabhojana^eb^nti jaṅghāpiṇḍiyabalena caritvā ālopamattaṃ laddhaṃ bhojanaṃ. ^b^pūtimutta^eb^nti yaṃkiñci muttaṃ. yathā hi suvaṇṇavaṇṇopi kāyo pūtikāyoti vuccati, evaṃ abhinavampi muttaṃ pūtimuttameva.

[03] ^b^vighāto^eb^ti vigataghāto, cittassa dukkhaṃ na hotīti attho. ^b^disā^eb^ ^a^P3.0044^ea^ ^b^nappaṭihaññatī^eb^ti yassa hi ``asukaṭṭhānaṃ nāma gato cīvarādīni labhissāmī''ti cittaṃ uppajjati, tassa disā paṭihaññati nāma. yassa evaṃ na uppajjati, tassa nappaṭihaññati nāma. ^b^dhammā^eb^ti paṭipattidhammā. ^b^sāmaññassānulomikā^eb^ti samaṇadhammassa anulomā. ^b^adhiggahitā^eb^ti sabbete tuṭṭhacittassa bhikkhuno adhiggahitā honti antogatā na paribāhirāti.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhamassa ajjhāsayiko nikkhepo. imaṃ kira mahāariyavaṃsasuttantaṃ bhagavā jetavanamahāvihāre dhammasabhāyaṃ paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno attanopi parapuggalānampi ajjhāsayavasena parivāretvā nisinnāni cattālīsa bhikkhusahassāni, ``bhikkhave''ti āmantetvā ^b^cattārome, bhikkhave, ariyavaṃsā^eb^ti ārabhi. tattha ^b^ariyavaṃsā^eb^ti ariyānaṃ vaṃsā. yathā hi khattiyavaṃso brāhmaṇavaṃso vessavaṃso suddavaṃso samaṇavaṃso kulavaṃso rājavaṃso, evaṃ ayampi aṭṭhamo ariyavaṃso ariyatanti ariyapaveṇī nāma hoti. so kho panāyaṃ ariyavaṃso imesaṃ vaṃsānaṃ mūlagandhādīnaṃ kāḷānusārigandhādayo viya aggamakkhāyati.

[03] ke pana te ariyā, yesaṃ ete vaṃsāti? ariyā vuccanti buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca tathāgatasāvakā ca, etesaṃ ariyānaṃ vaṃsāti ^b^ariyavaṃsā^eb^. ito pubbe hi satasahassakappādhikānaṃ ^a^V2.0269^ea^ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake taṇhaṅkaro, medhaṅkaro ^a^P3.0045^ea^, saraṇaṅkaro, dīpaṅkaroti cattāro ^a^M2.0277^ea^ buddhā uppannā, te ariyā, tesaṃ ariyānaṃ vaṃsāti ariyavaṃsā. tesaṃ buddhānaṃ parinibbānato aparabhāge asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā koṇḍañño nāma buddho uppanno...pe0... imasmiṃ kappe kakusandho, koṇāgamano, kassapo, amhākaṃ bhagavā gotamoti cattāro buddhā uppannā, tesaṃ ariyānaṃ vaṃsāti ariyavaṃsā. apica atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ sabbabuddha-paccekabuddha-buddhasāvakānaṃ ariyānaṃ vaṃsāti ariyavaṃsā.

[03] te kho panete ^b^aggaññā^eb^ aggāti jānitabbā, ^b^rattaññā^eb^ dīgharattaṃ pavattāti jānitabbā, ^b^vaṃsaññā^eb^ vaṃsāti jānitabbā. ^b^porāṇā^eb^ na adhunuppattikā. ^b^asaṃkiṇṇā^eb^ avikiṇṇā anapanītā. ^b^asaṃkiṇṇapubbā^eb^ atītabuddhehipi na saṃkiṇṇapubbā, ``ki imehī''ti na apanītapubbā. ^b^na saṃkīyantī^eb^ti idānipi na apanīyanti. ^b^na saṃkīyissantī^eb^ti anāgatabuddhehipi na apanīyissanti. ye loke viññū samaṇabrāhmaṇā, tehi ^b^appaṭikuṭṭhā,^eb^ samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi aninditā agarahitā.

[03] ^b^santuṭṭho hotī^eb^ti paccayasantosavasena santuṭṭho hoti. ^b^itarītarenā^eb^ti na thūlasukhumalūkhapaṇītathirajiṇṇānaṃ yena kenaci, atha kho yathāladdhādīnaṃ itarītarena yena kenaci santuṭṭho hotīti attho. cīvarasmiñhi tayo santosā ^a^P3.0046^ea^ yathālābhasantoso yathābalasantoso yathāsāruppasantosoti. piṇḍapātādīsupi eseva nayo. tesaṃ vitthārakathā ``santuṭṭhassa, bhikkhave, anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā uppajjantī''ti imasmiṃ sutte vuttanayeneva veditabbā. iti ime tayo santose sandhāya ``santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena cīvarena, yathāladdhādīsu yena kenaci cīvarena santuṭṭho hotī''ti vuttaṃ.

[03] ettha ca cīvaraṃ jānitabbaṃ, cīvarakkhettaṃ jānitabbaṃ, paṃsukūlaṃ jānitabbaṃ, cīvarasantoso jānitabbo, cīvarappaṭisaṃyuttāni dhutaṅgāni jānitabbāni. tattha ^b^cīvaraṃ jānitabba^eb^nti khomādīni cha cīvarāni dukūlādīni cha anulomacīvarāni jānitabbāni. imāni dvādasa kappiyacīvarāni. kusacīraṃ, vākacīraṃ, phalakacīraṃ, kesakambalaṃ, vāḷakambalaṃ, potthako, cammaṃ, ulūkapakkhaṃ, rukkhadussaṃ, latādussaṃ, erakadussaṃ, kadalidussaṃ, veḷudussanti evamādīni pana akappiyacīvarāni.

[03] ^b^cīvarakkhetta^eb^nti ^a^V2.0270^ea^ ^a^M2.0278^ea^ ``saṅghato vā gaṇato vā ñātito vā mittato vā attano vā dhanena, paṃsukūlaṃ vā''ti evaṃ uppajjanato cha khettāni, aṭṭhannañca mātikānaṃ vasena aṭṭha khettāni jānitabbāni.

[03] ^b^paṃsukūla^eb^nti sosānikaṃ, pāpaṇikaṃ, rathiyaṃ, saṅkārakūṭakaṃ, sotthiyaṃ, sinānaṃ, titthaṃ, gatapaccāgataṃ, aggidaḍḍhaṃ, gokhāyitaṃ, upacikakhāyitaṃ, undūrakhāyitaṃ ^a^P3.0047^ea^, antacchinnaṃ, dasacchinnaṃ, dhajāhaṭaṃ, thūpaṃ, samaṇacīvaraṃ, sāmuddiyaṃ, ābhisekiyaṃ, panthikaṃ, vātāhaṭaṃ, iddhimayaṃ, devadattiyanti tevīsati paṃsukūlāni veditabbāni. ettha ca ^b^sotthiya^eb^nti gabbhamalaharaṇaṃ. ^b^gatapaccāgata^eb^nti matakasarīraṃ pārupitvā susānaṃ netvā ānītacīvaraṃ. ^b^dhajāhaṭa^eb^nti dhajaṃ ussāpetvā tato ānītaṃ. ^b^thūpa^eb^nti vammike pūjitacīvaraṃ. ^b^sāmuddiya^eb^nti samuddavīcīhi thalaṃ pāpitaṃ. ^b^panthika^eb^nti panthaṃ gacchantehi corabhayena pāsāṇehi koṭṭetvā pārutacīvaraṃ. ^b^iddhimaya^eb^nti ehibhikkhucīvaraṃ. sesaṃ pākaṭamevāti.

[03] ^b^cīvarasantoso^eb^ti vīsati cīvarasantosā -- cīvare vitakkasantoso, gamanasantoso, pariyesanasantoso, paṭilābhasantoso, mattapaṭiggahaṇasantoso, loluppavivajjanasantoso, yathālābhasantoso, yathābalasantoso, yathāsāruppasantoso, udakasantoso, dhovanasantoso, karaṇasantoso, parimāṇasantoso, suttasantoso, sibbanasantoso, rajanasantoso, kappasantoso, paribhogasantoso, sannidhiparivajjanasantoso, vissajjanasantosoti.

[03] tattha sādakabhikkhunā temāsaṃ nibaddhavāsaṃ vasitvā ekamāsamattaṃ vitakketuṃ vaṭṭati. so hi pavāretvā cīvaramāse cīvaraṃ karoti, paṃsukūliko aḍḍhamāseneva karoti. idaṃ māsaḍḍhamāsamattaṃ vitakkanaṃ ^b^vitakkasantoso^eb^ nāma. vitakkasantosena pana santuṭṭhena bhikkhunā pācīnakhaṇḍarājivāsikapaṃsukūlikattherasadisena ^a^P3.0048^ea^ bhavitabbaṃ.

[03] thero kira ``cetiyapabbatavihāre cetiyaṃ vandissāmī''ti āgato cetiyaṃ vanditvā cintesi -- ``mayhaṃ cīvaraṃ jiṇṇaṃ, bahūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne labhissāmī''ti. so mahāvihāraṃ gantvā saṅghattheraṃ disvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchitvā tattha vuttho punadivase cīvaraṃ ādāya āgantvā theraṃ vandi. thero ``kiṃ ^a^M2.0279^ea^, āvuso''ti āha. gāmadvāraṃ, bhante, gamissāmīti. ahampāvuso, gamissāmīti ^a^V2.0271^ea^. sādhu, bhanteti gacchanto mahābodhidvārakoṭṭhake ṭhatvā ``puññavantānaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne manāpaṃ labhissāmī''ti cintetvā ``aparisuddho me vitakko''ti tatova paṭinivatti. punadivase ambaṅgaṇasamīpato, punadivase mahācetiyassa uttaradvārato tattheva paṭinivattitvā catutthadivase therassa santikaṃ agamāsi. thero ``imassa bhikkhuno vitakko na parisuddho bhavissatī''ti cīvaraṃ gahetvā tena saddhiṃyeva pañhaṃ pucchamāno gāmaṃ pāvisi. tañca rattiṃ eko manusso uccārapalibuddho sāṭakeyeva vaccaṃ katvā taṃ saṅkāraṭṭhāne chaḍḍesi. paṃsukūlikatthero taṃ nīlamakkhikāhi samparikiṇṇaṃ disvā añjaliṃ paggahesi. mahāthero ``kiṃ, āvuso, saṅkāraṭṭhānassa añjaliṃ paggaṇhāsī''ti. nāhaṃ, bhante, saṅkāraṭṭhānassa añjaliṃ paggaṇhāmi, mayhaṃ pitu dasabalassa paggaṇhāmi, puṇṇadāsiyā sarīraṃ pārupitvā chaḍḍitaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ tumbamatte pāṇake vidhunitvā susānato gaṇhantena dukkarataraṃ kataṃ ^a^P3.0049^ea^, bhanteti. mahāthero ``parisuddho vitakko paṃsukūlikassā''ti cintesi. paṃsukūlikattheropi tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne ṭhito vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tīṇi phalāni patto taṃ sāṭakaṃ gahetvā cīvaraṃ katvā pārupitvā pācīnakhaṇḍarājiṃ gantvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.

[03] cīvaratthāya gacchantassa pana ``kattha labhissāmī''ti acintetvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva gamanaṃ ^b^gamanasantoso^eb^ nāma. pariyesantassa pana yena vā tena vā saddhiṃ apariyesitvā lajjiṃ pesalaṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā pariyesanaṃ ^b^pariyesanasantoso^eb^ nāma. evaṃ pariyesantassa āhariyamānaṃ cīvaraṃ dūrato disvā ``etaṃ manāpaṃ bhavissati, etaṃ amanāpa''nti evaṃ avitakketvā thūlasukhumādīsu yathāladdheneva santussanaṃ ^b^paṭilābhasantoso^eb^ nāma. evaṃ laddhaṃ gaṇhantassāpi ``ettakaṃ dupaṭṭassa bhavissati, ettakaṃ ekapaṭṭassā''ti attano pahonakamatteneva santussanaṃ ^b^mattapaṭiggahaṇasantoso^eb^ nāma. cīvaraṃ pariyesantassa pana ``asukassa gharadvāre manāpaṃ labhissāmī''ti acintetvā dvārapaṭipāṭiyā caraṇaṃ ^b^loluppavivajjanasantoso^eb^ nāma.

[03] lūkhapaṇītesu yena kenaci yāpetuṃ sakkontassa yathāladdheneva yāpanaṃ ^b^yathālābhasantoso^eb^ nāma. attano thāmaṃ jānitvā yena yāpetuṃ sakkoti, tena yāpanaṃ ^b^yathābalasantoso^eb^ nāma. manāpaṃ aññassa ^a^M2.0280^ea^ datvā attanā yena kenaci yāpanaṃ ^b^yathāsāruppasantoso^eb^ nāma.

[03] ``kattha udakaṃ manāpaṃ, kattha amanāpa''nti avicāretvā yena kenaci dhovanūpagena udakena ^a^V2.0272^ea^ dhovanaṃ ^b^udakasantoso^eb^ nāma. paṇḍumattikagerukapūtipaṇṇarasakiliṭṭhāni pana udakāni vajjetuṃ vaṭṭati. dhovantassa pana muggarādīhi apaharitvā ^a^P3.0050^ea^ hatthehi madditvā dhovanaṃ ^b^dhovanasantoso^eb^ nāma. tathā asujjhantaṃ paṇṇāni pakkhipitvā tāpitaudakenāpi dhovituṃ vaṭṭati. evaṃ dhovitvā karontassa ``idaṃ thūlaṃ, idaṃ sukhuma''nti akopetvā pahonakanīhāreneva karaṇaṃ ^b^karaṇasantoso^eb^ nāma. timaṇḍalapaticchādanamattasseva karaṇaṃ ^b^parimāṇasantoso^eb^ nāma. cīvarakaraṇatthāya pana manāpaṃ suttaṃ pariyesissāmīti avicāretvā rathikādīsu vā devaṭṭhāne vā āharitvā pādamūle vā ṭhapitaṃ yaṃkiñcideva suttaṃ gahetvā karaṇaṃ ^b^suttasantoso^eb^ nāma.

[03] kusibandhanakāle pana aṅgulamatte satta vāre na vijjhitabbaṃ. evaṃ karontassa hi yo bhikkhu sahāyo na hoti, tassa vattabhedopi natthi. tivaṅgulamatte pana satta vāre vijjhitabbaṃ. evaṃ karontassa maggappaṭipannenāpi sahāyena bhavitabbaṃ. yo na hoti, tassa vattabhedo. ayaṃ ^b^sibbanasantoso^eb^ nāma. rajantena pana kāḷakacchakādīni pariyesantena na caritabbaṃ, somavakkalādīsu yaṃ labhati, tena rajitabbaṃ. alabhantena pana manussehi araññe vākaṃ gahetvā chaḍḍitarajanaṃ vā bhikkhūhi pacitvā chaḍḍitakasaṭaṃ vā gahetvā rajitabbaṃ. ayaṃ ^b^rajanasantoso^eb^ nāma. nīlakaddamakāḷasāmesu yaṃkiñci gahetvā hatthipiṭṭhe nisinnassa paññāyamānakappakaraṇaṃ ^b^kappasantoso^eb^ nāma.

[03] hirikopīnappaṭicchādanamattavasena paribhuñjanaṃ ^b^paribhogasantoso^eb^ nāma. dussaṃ pana labhitvā suttaṃ vā sūciṃ vā kārakaṃ vā alabhantena ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati, labhantena na vaṭṭati. katampi sace antevāsikādīnaṃ ^a^P3.0051^ea^ dātukāmo hoti, te ca asannihitā, yāva āgamanā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. āgatamattesu dātabbaṃ. dātuṃ asakkontena adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ. aññasmiṃ cīvare sati paccattharaṇampi adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭati. anadhiṭṭhitameva hi sannidhi ^a^M2.0281^ea^ hoti, adhiṭṭhitaṃ na hotīti ^b^mahāsīvatthero^eb^ āha. ayaṃ ^b^sannidhiparivajjanasantoso^eb^ nāma. vissajjentena pana na mukhaṃ oloketvā dātabbaṃ, sāraṇīyadhamme ṭhatvā vissajjetabbanti ayaṃ ^b^vissajjanasantoso^eb^ nāma.

[03] ^b^cīvarappaṭisaṃyuttāni dhutaṅgāni^eb^ nāma paṃsukūlikaṅgañceva tecīvarikaṅgañca. tesaṃ vitthārakathā visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.24-25) veditabbā. iti cīvarasantosamahāariyavaṃsaṃ pūrayamāno ^a^V2.0273^ea^ bhikkhu imāni dve dhutaṅgāni gopeti. imāni gopento cīvarasantosamahāariyavaṃsavasena santuṭṭho hotīti.

[03] ^b^vaṇṇavādī^eb^ti eko santuṭṭho hoti, santosassa vaṇṇaṃ na katheti. eko na santuṭṭho hoti, santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti. eko neva santuṭṭho hoti, na santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti. eko santuṭṭho ceva hoti, santosassa ca vaṇṇaṃ katheti. taṃ dassetuṃ ``itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇavādī''ti vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^anesana^eb^nti dūteyyapahinagamanānuyogapabhedaṃ nānappakāraṃ anesanaṃ. ^b^appatirūpa^eb^nti ayuttaṃ. ^b^aladdhā^eb^ ^a^P3.0052^ea^ ^b^cā^eb^ti alabhitvā. yathā ekacco ``kathaṃ nu kho cīvaraṃ labhissāmī''ti puññavantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā kohaññaṃ karonto uttasati paritassati, santuṭṭho bhikkhu evaṃ aladdhā cīvaraṃ na paritassati. ^b^laddhā cā^eb^ti dhammena samena labhitvā. ^b^agadhito^eb^ti vigatalobhagiddho. ^b^amucchito^eb^ti adhimattataṇhāya mucchaṃ anāpanno. ^b^anajjhopanno^eb^ti taṇhāya anotthato apariyonaddho. ^b^ādīnavadassāvī^eb^ti anesanāpattiyañca gedhitaparibhoge ca ādīnavaṃ passamāno. ^b^nissaraṇapañño^eb^ti ``yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāyā''ti vuttaṃ nissaraṇameva pajānanto.

[03] ^b^itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā^eb^ti yena kenaci cīvarena santuṭṭhiyā. ^b^nevattānukkaṃsetī^eb^ti ``ahaṃ paṃsukūliko, mayā upasampadamāḷeyeva paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ gahitaṃ, ko mayā sadiso atthī''ti attukkaṃsanaṃ na karoti. ^b^no paraṃ vambhetī^eb^ti ``ime panaññe bhikkhū na paṃsukūlikā''ti vā, ``paṃsukūlikaṅgamattampi etesaṃ natthī''ti vā evaṃ paraṃ na vambheti. ^b^yo hi tattha dakkho^eb^ti yo tasmiṃ cīvarasantose vaṇṇavādādīsu vā dakkho cheko ^a^M2.0282^ea^ byatto. ^b^analaso^eb^ti sātaccakiriyāya ālasiyavirahito. ^b^sampajāno paṭissato^eb^ti sampajānapaññāya ceva satiyā ca yutto. ^b^ariyavaṃse ṭhito^eb^ti ariyavaṃse patiṭṭhito.

[03] ^b^itarītarena^eb^ ^a^P3.0053^ea^ ^b^piṇḍapātenā^eb^ti yena kenaci piṇḍapātena. etthāpi piṇḍapāto jānitabbo, piṇḍapātakkhettaṃ jānitabbaṃ, piṇḍapātasantoso jānitabbo, piṇḍapātappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ jānitabbaṃ ^a^V2.0274^ea^. tattha ^b^piṇḍapāto^eb^ti odano kummāso sattu maccho maṃsaṃ khīraṃ dadhi sappi navanītaṃ telaṃ madhu phāṇitaṃ yāgu khādanīyaṃ sāyanīyaṃ lehanīyanti soḷasa piṇḍapātā.

[03] ^b^piṇḍapātakkhetta^eb^nti saṅghabhattaṃ uddesabhattaṃ nimantanaṃ salākabhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ uposathikaṃ pāṭipadikabhattaṃ āgantukabhattaṃ gamikabhattaṃ gilānabhattaṃ gilānupaṭṭhākabhattaṃ dhurabhattaṃ kuṭibhattaṃ vārabhattaṃ vihārabhattanti pannarasa piṇḍapātakkhettāni.

[03] ^b^piṇḍapātasantoso^eb^ti piṇḍapāte vitakkasantoso gamanasantoso pariyesanasantoso paṭilābhasantoso paṭiggahaṇasantoso mattapaṭiggahaṇasantoso loluppavivajjanasantoso yathālābhasantoso yathābalasantoso yathāsāruppasantoso upakārasantoso parimāṇasantoso paribhogasantoso sannidhiparivajjanasantoso vissajjanasantosoti pannarasa santosā.

[03] tattha sādako bhikkhu mukhaṃ dhovitvā vitakketi. piṇḍapātikena pana gaṇena saddhiṃ caratā sāyaṃ therūpaṭṭhānakāle ``sve kattha piṇḍāya carissāmāti? asukagāme, bhante''ti ettakaṃ cintetvā tato paṭṭhāya na vitakketabbaṃ. ekacārikena vitakkamāḷake ṭhatvā vitakketabbaṃ. tato paṭṭhāya vitakkento ariyavaṃsā cuto hoti paribāhiro. ayaṃ ^a^P3.0054^ea^ ^b^vitakkasantoso^eb^ nāma.

[03] piṇḍāya pavisantena ``kuhiṃ labhissāmī''ti acintetvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena gantabbaṃ. ayaṃ ^b^gamanasantoso^eb^ nāma. pariyesantena yaṃ vā taṃ vā aggahetvā lajjiṃ pesalameva gahetvā pariyesitabbaṃ. ayaṃ ^b^pariyesanasantoso^eb^ nāma. dūratova āhariyamānaṃ disvā ``etaṃ manāpaṃ ^a^M2.0283^ea^, etaṃ amanāpa''nti cittaṃ na uppādetabbaṃ. ayaṃ ^b^paṭilābhasantoso^eb^ nāma. ``imaṃ manāpaṃ gaṇhissāmi, imaṃ amanāpaṃ na gaṇhissāmī''ti acintetvā yaṃkiñci yāpanamattaṃ gahetabbameva. ayaṃ ^b^paṭiggahaṇasantoso^eb^ nāma.

[03] ettha pana deyyadhammo bahu, dāyako appaṃ dātukāmo, appaṃ gahetabbaṃ. deyyadhammopi bahu, dāyakopi bahuṃ dātukāmo, pamāṇeneva gahetabbaṃ. deyyadhammo na bahu, dāyakopi appaṃ dātukāmo, appaṃ gahetabbaṃ. deyyadhammo na bahu, dāyako pana bahuṃ dātukāmo, pamāṇena gahetabbaṃ ^a^V2.0275^ea^. paṭiggahaṇasmiñhi mattaṃ ajānanto manussānaṃ pasādaṃ makkheti, saddhādeyyaṃ vinipāteti, sāsanaṃ na karoti, vijātamātuyāpi cittaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti. iti mattaṃ jānitvāva paṭiggahetabbanti ayaṃ ^b^mattapaṭiggahaṇasantoso^eb^ nāma. aḍḍhakulāniyeva agantvā dvārapaṭipāṭiyā gantabbaṃ. ayaṃ ^b^loluppavivajjanasantoso^eb^ nāma. ^b^yathālābhasantosā^eb^dayo cīvare vuttanayā eva.

[03] piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā ``samaṇadhammaṃ anupālessāmī''ti evaṃ upakāraṃ ñatvā paribhuñjanaṃ ^b^upakārasantoso^eb^ nāma. pattaṃ pūretvā ānītaṃ na paṭiggahetabbaṃ. anupasampanne sati tena gāhāpetabbaṃ, asati harāpetvā paṭiggahaṇamattaṃ gahetabbaṃ. ayaṃ ^b^parimāṇasantoso^eb^ ^a^P3.0055^ea^ nāma. ``jighacchāya paṭivinodanaṃ idamettha nissaraṇa''nti evaṃ paribhuñjanaṃ ^b^paribhogasantoso^eb^ nāma. nidahitvā na paribhuñjitabbanti ayaṃ ^b^sannidhiparivajjanasantoso^eb^ nāma. mukhaṃ anoloketvā sāraṇīyadhamme ṭhitena vissajjetabbaṃ. ayaṃ ^b^vissajjanasantoso^eb^ nāma.

[03] ^b^piṇḍapātappaṭisaṃyuttāni^eb^ pana pañca dhutaṅgāni piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ sapadānacārikaṅgaṃ ekāsanikaṅgaṃ pattapiṇḍikaṅgaṃ khalupacchābhattikaṅganti. tesaṃ vitthārakathā visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.26-30) vuttā. iti piṇḍapātasantosamahāariyavaṃsaṃ pūrayamāno bhikkhu imāni pañca dhutaṅgāni gopeti, imāni gopento piṇḍapātasantosamahāariyavaṃsena santuṭṭho hoti. vaṇṇavādītiādīni vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.

[03] ^b^senāsanenā^eb^ti idha senāsanaṃ jānitabbaṃ, senāsanakkhettaṃ jānitabbaṃ, senāsanasantoso jānitabbo, senāsanappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ ^a^M2.0284^ea^ jānitabbaṃ. tattha ^b^senāsana^eb^nti mañco pīṭhaṃ bhisi bimbohanaṃ vihāro aḍḍhayogo pāsādo hammiyaṃ guhā leṇaṃ aṭṭo māḷo veḷugumbo rukkhamūlaṃ yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamantīti imāni pannarasa senāsanāni.
[03] ^b^senāsanakkhetta^eb^nti saṅghato vā gaṇato vā ñātito vā mittato vā attano vā dhanena paṃsukūlaṃ vāti cha khettāni.

[03] ^b^senāsanasantoso^eb^ti senāsane vitakkasantosādayo pannarasa santosā. te piṇḍapāte vuttanayeneva ^a^V2.0276^ea^ veditabbā. ^b^senāsanappaṭisaṃyuttāni^eb^ pana pañca dhutaṅgāni āraññikaṅgaṃ rukkhamūlikaṅgaṃ abbhokāsikaṅgaṃ sosānikaṅgaṃ yathāsanthatikaṅganti. tesaṃ vitthārakathā visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.31-35) vuttā. iti ^a^P3.0056^ea^ senāsanasantosamahāariyavaṃsaṃ pūrayamāno bhikkhu imāni pañca dhutaṅgāni gopeti. imāni gopento senāsanasantosamahāariyavaṃsena santuṭṭho hoti.
[03] ^b^gilānapaccayo^eb^ pana piṇḍapāteyeva paviṭṭho. tattha yathālābhayathābalayathāsāruppasantoseneva santussitabbaṃ. nesajjikaṅgaṃ bhāvanārāmāriyavaṃsaṃ bhajati. vuttampi cetaṃ --
[21] ``pañca senāsane vuttā, pañca āhāranissitā.
[22] eko vīriyasaṃyutto, dve ca cīvaranissitā''ti..

[03] iti bhagavā pathaviṃ pattharamāno viya sāgarakucchiṃ pūrayamāno viya ākāsaṃ vitthārayamāno viya ca paṭhamaṃ cīvarasantosaṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ kathetvā candaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya sūriyaṃ ullaṅghento viya ca dutiyaṃ piṇḍapātasantosaṃ kathetvā sineruṃ ukkhipanto viya tatiyaṃ senāsanasantosaṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ kathetvā idāni sahassanayapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ catutthaṃ bhāvanārāmaṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ kathetuṃ ^b^puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhāvanārāmo hotī^eb^ti desanaṃ ārabhi.

[03] tattha āramaṇaṃ ārāmo, abhiratīti attho. bhāvanāya ārāmo assāti ^b^bhāvanārāmo^eb^. bhāvanāya ratoti ^b^bhāvanārato^eb^. pañcavidhe pahāne ārāmo assāti ^b^pahānārāmo^eb^. apica bhāvento ^a^M2.0285^ea^ ramatīti ^b^bhāvanārāmo^eb^. pajahanto ramatīti ^b^pahānārāmo^eb^ti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ayañhi cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāvento ramati, ratiṃ vindatīti attho. tathā cattāro sammappadhāne. cattāro iddhipāde, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅge, satta anupassanā, aṭṭhārasa mahāvipassanā, sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhamme, aṭṭhatiṃsa ^a^P3.0057^ea^ ārammaṇavibhattiyo bhāvento ramati, ratiṃ vindati. kāmacchandādayo pana kilese pajahanto ramati, ratiṃ vindati.

[03] imesu pana catūsu ariyavaṃsesu purimehi tīhi terasannaṃ dhutaṅgānaṃ catupaccayasantosassa ca vasena sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ kathitaṃ hoti, bhāvanārāmena avasesaṃ piṭakadvayaṃ. imaṃ pana bhāvanārāmaṃ ^a^V2.0277^ea^ ariyavaṃsaṃ kathentena bhikkhunā paṭisambhidāmagge nekkhammapāḷiyā kathetabbo, dīghanikāye dasuttarasuttantapariyāyena kathetabbo, majjhimanikāye satipaṭṭhānasuttantapariyāyena kathetabbo, abhidhamme niddesapariyāyena kathetabbo.
[03] tattha ^b^paṭisambhidāmagge nekkhammapāḷiyā^eb^ti --

[03] ``nekkhammaṃ bhāvento ramati, kāmacchandaṃ pajahanto ramati. abyāpādaṃ, byāpādaṃ... ālokasaññaṃ... thinamiddhaṃ... avikkhepaṃ, uddhaccaṃ... dhammavavatthānaṃ... vicikicchaṃ... ñāṇaṃ... avijjaṃ... pāmojjaṃ... aratiṃ... paṭhamajjhānaṃ, pañca nīvaraṇe... dutiyajjhānaṃ... vitakkavicāre... tatiyajjhānaṃ... pītiṃ... catutthajjhānaṃ... sukhadukkhe... ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ bhāvento ramati, rūpasaññaṃ paṭighasaññaṃ nānattasaññaṃ pajahanto ramati. viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ...pe0... nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ bhāvento ramati, ākiñcaññāyatanasaññaṃ pajahanto ramati.

[03] ``aniccānupassanaṃ bhāvento ramati, niccasaññaṃ pajahanto ramati. dukkhānupassanaṃ... sukhasaññaṃ... anattānupassanaṃ... attasaññaṃ... nibbidānupassanaṃ... nandiṃ... virāgānupassanaṃ... rāgaṃ... nirodhānupassanaṃ... samudayaṃ... paṭinissaggānupassanaṃ... ādānaṃ... khayānupassanaṃ ^a^P3.0058^ea^... ghanasaññaṃ... vayānupassanaṃ... āyūhanaṃ... vipariṇāmānupassanaṃ... dhuvasaññaṃ... animittānupassanaṃ ^a^M2.0286^ea^... nimittaṃ... appaṇihitānupassanaṃ... paṇidhiṃ... suññatānupassanaṃ... abhinivesaṃ... adhipaññādhammavipassanaṃ... sārādānābhinivesaṃ... yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ... sammohābhinivesaṃ... ādīnavānupassanaṃ... ālayābhinivesaṃ... paṭisaṅkhānupassanaṃ... appaṭisaṅkhaṃ... vivaṭṭānupassanaṃ... saṃyogābhinivesaṃ... sotāpattimaggaṃ... diṭṭhekaṭṭhe kilese... sakadāgāmimaggaṃ... oḷārike kilese... anāgāmimaggaṃ... anusahagate kilese... arahattamaggaṃ bhāvento ramati, sabbakilese pajahanto ramatī''ti (paṭi0 ma0 1.41,95).
[03] evaṃ paṭisambhidāmagge nekkhammapāḷiyā kathetabbo.
[03] ^b^dīghanikāye^eb^ ^a^V2.0278^ea^ ^b^dasuttarasuttantapariyāyenā^eb^ti --

[02] ``ekaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvento ramati, ekaṃ dhammaṃ pajahanto ramati...pe0... dasa dhamme bhāvento ramati, dasa dhamme pajahanto ramati. katamaṃ ekaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvento ramati? kāyagatāsatiṃ sātasahagataṃ, imaṃ ekaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvento ramati. katamaṃ ekaṃ dhammaṃ pajahanto ramati? asmimānaṃ, imaṃ ekaṃ dhammaṃ pajahanto ramati. katame dve dhamme...pe0... katame dasa dhamme bhāvento ramati? dasa kasiṇāyatanāni, ime dasa dhamme bhāvento ramati. katame dasa dhamme pajahanto ramati? dasa micchatte, ime dasa dhamme pajahanto ramati. evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhāvanārāmo hotī''ti (dī0 ni0 3.351-360).
[03] evaṃ dīghanikāye dasuttarasuttantapariyāyena kathetabbo.
[03] ^b^majjhimanikāye satipaṭṭhānasuttantapariyāyenā^eb^ti --

[02] ``ekāyano ayaṃ, bhikkhave, maggo...pe0... yāvadeva ñāṇamattāya paṭissatimattāya. anissito ca viharati, na ca kiñci ^a^P3.0059^ea^ loke upādiyati. evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhāvanārāmo hoti bhāvanārato. pahānārāmo hoti pahānarato. puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gacchanto vā gacchāmīti pajānāti...pe0... puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu seyyathāpi passeyya sarīraṃ sivathikāya chaḍḍitaṃ...pe0... pūtīni cuṇṇakajātāni. so imameva kāyaṃ ^a^M2.0287^ea^ upasaṃharati `ayampi kho kāyo evaṃdhammo evaṃbhāvī evaṃanatīto'ti. iti ajjhattaṃ vā kāye kāyānupassī viharati...pe0... evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhāvanārāmo hotī''ti (ma0 ni0 1.106 ādayo).
[03] evaṃ majjhimanikāye satipaṭṭhānasuttantapariyāyena kathetabbo.

[03] ^b^abhidhamme niddesapariyāyenā^eb^ti sabbepi saṅkhate ``aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato ^a^V2.0279^ea^ ...pe0... saṃkilesikadhammato passanto ramati, evaṃ kho bhikkhu bhāvanārāmo hotī''ti (mahāni0 13; cūḷani0 upasīvamāṇavapucchāniddeso 39, nandamāṇavapucchāniddeso 51). evaṃ niddesapariyāyena kathetabbo.

[03] ^b^nevattānukkaṃsetī^eb^ti ``ajja me saṭṭhi vā sattati vā vassāni aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti vipassanāya kammaṃ karontassa ko mayā sadiso atthī''ti evaṃ attukkaṃsanaṃ na karoti. ^b^no paraṃ vambhetī^eb^ti ``aniccaṃ dukkhanti vipassanāmattakampi natthi, kiṃ ime vissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhānā carantī''ti evaṃ paravambhanaṃ na karoti. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro ariyavaṃsā^eb^ti, bhikkhave, ime cattāro ariyavaṃsā ariyatantiyo ariyapaveṇiyo ariyañjasā ariyavaṭumānīti suttantaṃ vinivaṭṭetvā idāni mahāariyavaṃsaparipūrakassa ^a^P3.0060^ea^ bhikkhuno vasanadisā dassento ^b^imehi ca pana, bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^sveva aratiṃ sahatī^eb^ti soyeva aratiṃ anabhiratiṃ ukkaṇṭhitaṃ sahati abhibhavati. ^b^na taṃ arati sahatī^eb^ti taṃ pana bhikkhuṃ yā esā pantesu senāsanesu adhikusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya arati nāma hoti, sā sahituṃ adhibhavituṃ na sakkoti. ^b^aratiratisaho^eb^ti aratiñca pañcakāmaguṇaratiñca sahati, adhibhavituṃ sakkoti.

[03] idāni gāthāhi kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto ^b^nāratī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^dhīra^eb^nti vīriyavantaṃ. ^b^nārati dhīraṃ sahatī^eb^ti idaṃ purimasseva kāraṇavacanaṃ. yasmā sā dhīraṃ na sahati nappahoti dhīraṃ sahituṃ adhibhavituṃ na sakkoti, tasmā nārati ^a^M2.0288^ea^ sahati dhīraṃ. ^b^dhīro hi aratissaho^eb^ti aratisahattā hi so dhīro nāma, tasmā aratiṃ sahatīti attho. ^b^sabbakammavihāyīna^eb^nti sabbaṃ tebhūmakakammaṃ cajitvā paricchinnaṃ parivaṭumaṃ katvā ṭhitaṃ. ^b^panuṇṇaṃ ko nivāraye^eb^ti kilese panuditvā ṭhitaṃ ko nāma rāgo vā doso vā nivāreyya. ^b^nekkhaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0061^ea^ ^b^jambonadasseva, ko taṃ ninditumarahatī^eb^ti jambonadasaṅkhātassa jātirattasuvaṇṇassa nikkhasadisaṃ garahitabbadosavimuttaṃ ko taṃ puggalaṃ nindituṃ arahati. ^b^brahmunāpi pasaṃsito^eb^ti mahābrahmunāpi esa puggalo pasaṃsitoyevāti. desanāpariyosāne cattālīsa bhikkhusahassāni arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^V2.0280^ea^ ^b^dhammapadānī^eb^ti dhammakoṭṭhāsā. ^b^anabhijjhā^eb^tiādīsu abhijjhāpaṭikkhepena ^b^anabhijjhā,^eb^ byāpādapaṭikkhepena ^b^abyāpādo,^eb^ micchāsatipaṭikkhepena ^b^sammāsati,^eb^ micchāsamādhipaṭikkhepena ^b^sammāsamādhi^eb^ veditabbo.

[03] ^b^anabhijjhālū^eb^ti nittaṇho hutvā. ^b^abyāpannena cetasā^eb^ti sabbakālaṃ pakatibhāvaṃ avijahantena cittena. ^b^sato ekaggacittassā^eb^ti satiyā samannāgato ārammaṇe ekaggacitto assa. ^b^ajjhattaṃ susamāhito^eb^ti niyakajjhatte suṭṭhu ṭhapitacitto imasmiṃ suttepi gāthāyapi vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^abhiññātā^eb^ti ñātā pākaṭā. ^b^annabhāro^eb^tiādīni tesaṃ nāmāni. ^b^paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito^eb^ti phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhito. sā hi idha paṭisallānanti adhippetā. ^b^paccakkhāyā^eb^ti paṭikkhipitvā. ^b^abhijjhālu^eb^nti sataṇhaṃ. ^b^kāmesu^eb^ ^a^P3.0062^ea^ ^b^tibbasārāga^eb^nti vatthukāmesu bahalarāgaṃ. ^b^tamahaṃ tattha evaṃ vadeyya^eb^nti taṃ ahaṃ tasmiṃ kāraṇe evaṃ vadeyyaṃ. ^b^paṭikkositabbaṃ maññeyyā^eb^ti paṭikkositabbāni paṭibāhitabbani vā maññeyya. ^b^sahadhammikā^eb^ti sakāraṇā. ^b^vādānupātā^eb^ti dhammikavāde ghaṭṭayamānā adhammikavādānupātā, vādappavattiyoti attho. ^b^gārayhā ṭhānā^eb^ti garahitabbayuttakā paccayā. ^b^āgacchantī^eb^ti upagacchanti.

[03] ^b^ukkalā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0289^ea^ ukkalajanapadavāsino. ^b^vassabhaññā^eb^ti vasso ca bhañño cāti dve janā. ^b^ahetukavādā^eb^ti ``natthi hetu natthi paccayo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā''tievamādivādino. ^b^akiriyavādā^eb^ti ``karoto na karīyati pāpa''nti evaṃ kiriyapaṭikkhepavādino. ^b^natthikavādā^eb^ti ``natthi dinna''ntiādivādino. te imesu tīsupi dassanesu okkantaniyāmā ahesuṃ. kathaṃ pana tesu niyāmo hotīti? yo hi evarūpaṃ laddhiṃ gahetvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu nisinno sajjhāyati vīmaṃsati, tassa ``natthi hetu natthi paccayo karoto na karīyati pāpaṃ...pe0... natthi dinnaṃ...pe0... kāyassa bhedā ucchijjatī''ti tasmiṃ ārammaṇe ^a^V2.0281^ea^ micchāsati santiṭṭhati, cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti, javanāni javanti. paṭhamajavane satekiccho hoti, tathā dutiyādīsu, sattame buddhānampi atekiccho anivatti ariṭṭhakaṇṭakasadiso hoti ^a^P3.0063^ea^. tattha koci ekaṃ dassanaṃ okkamati, koci dve, koci tīṇipi. niyatamicchādiṭṭhikova hoti, patto saggamaggāvaraṇañceva mokkhamaggāvaraṇañca, abhabbo tassa attabhāvassa anantaraṃ saggampi gantuṃ, pageva mokkhaṃ. vaṭṭakhāṇuko nāmesa satto pathavigopako, yebhuyyena evarūpassa bhavato vuṭṭhānaṃ natthi. vassabhaññāpi edisā ahesuṃ. ^b^nindābyārosanaupārambhabhayā^eb^ti attano nindabhayena ghaṭṭanabhayena upavādabhayena cāti attho. ^b^abhijjhāvinaye sikkha^eb^nti abhijjhāvinayo vuccati arahattaṃ, arahatte sikkhamāno appamatto nāma vuccatīti suttante vaṭṭaviṭṭaṃ kathetvā gāthāya phalasamāpatti kathitāti.
[06] uruvelavaggo tatiyo.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ catutthassa ^a^V2.0282^ea^ paṭhame ^b^cakkānī^eb^ti sampattiyo. ^b^catucakkaṃ vattatī^eb^ti cattāri sampatticakkāni vattanti ghaṭiyantiyevāti attho. ^b^patirūpadesavāso^eb^ti yattha catasso parisā sandissanti, evarūpe anucchavike dese vāso. ^b^sappurisāvassayo^eb^ti buddhādīnaṃ sappurisānaṃ avassayanaṃ sevanaṃ ^a^M2.0290^ea^ bhajanaṃ, na rājānaṃ. ^b^attasammāpaṇidhī^eb^ti attano sammā ṭhapanaṃ, sace pubbe assaddhādīhi ^a^P3.0064^ea^ samannāgato hoti, tāni pahāya saddhādīsu patiṭṭhāpanaṃ. ^b^pubbe ca katapuññatā^eb^ti pubbe upacitakusalatā. idameva cettha pamāṇaṃ. yena hi ñāṇasampayuttacittena kusalakammaṃ kataṃ hoti, tadeva kusalaṃ taṃ purisaṃ patirūpadese upaneti, sappurise bhajāpeti, so eva ca puggalo attānaṃ sammā ṭhapeti. ^b^puññakato^eb^ti katapuñño. ^b^sukhañcetaṃdhivattatī^eb^ti sukhañca etaṃ puggalaṃ adhivattati, avattharatīti attho.
