[03] 32^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^saṅgahavatthūnī^eb^ti saṅgaṇhanakāraṇāni. ^b^dānañcā^eb^tiādīsu ekacco hi dāneneva saṅgaṇhitabbo hoti, tassa dānameva dātabbaṃ. ^b^peyyavajja^eb^nti piyavacanaṃ. ekacco hi ``ayaṃ dātabbaṃ nāma deti, ekekena pana vacanena sabbaṃ makkhetvā nāseti, kiṃ tassa dāna''nti vattā hoti. ekacco ``ayaṃ kiñcāpi dānaṃ na deti, kathento pana telena viya makkheti. esa detu vā mā vā, vacanamevassa sahassaṃ agghatī''ti vattā hoti. evarūpo puggalo dānaṃ na paccāsīsati, piyavacanameva paccāsīsati. tassa piyavacanameva vattabbaṃ. ^b^atthacariyā^eb^ti atthavaḍḍhanakathā. ekacco hi neva dānaṃ, na piyavacanaṃ paccāsīsati, attano hitakathaṃ vaḍḍhikathameva paccāsīsati. evarūpassa puggalassa ``idaṃ te kātabbaṃ, idaṃ na kātabbaṃ, evarūpo puggalo sevitabbo, evarūpo na sevitabbo''ti evaṃ atthacariyakathāva kathetabbā. ^b^samānattatā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0065^ea^ samānasukhadukkhabhāvo. ekacco hi dānādīsu ekampi na paccāsīsati ^a^V2.0283^ea^, ekāsane nisajjaṃ, ekapallaṅke sayanaṃ, ekato bhojananti evaṃ samānasukhadukkhataṃ paccāsīsati. so sace gahaṭṭhassa jātiyā pabbajitassa sīlena sadiso hoti, tassāyaṃ samānattatā kātabbā. ^b^tattha tattha yathāraha^eb^nti tesu tesu dhammesu yathānucchavikaṃ samānattatāti attho. ^b^rathassāṇīva yāyato^eb^ti yathā rathassa gacchato āṇi saṅgaho nāma hoti, sā rathaṃ saṅgaṇhāti, evamime saṅgahā lokaṃ saṅgaṇhanti. ^b^na mātā puttakāraṇā^eb^ti yadi mātā ete saṅgahe puttassa na kareyya, puttakāraṇā mānaṃ vā pūjaṃ vā na labheyya. ^b^saṅgahā^eb^ ^a^M2.0291^ea^ ^b^ete^eb^ti upayogavacane paccattaṃ. saṅgahe eteti vā pāṭho. ^b^samavekkhantī^eb^ti sammā pekkhanti. ^b^pāsaṃsā ca bhavantī^eb^ti pasaṃsanīyā ca bhavanti.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^sīho^eb^ti cattāro sīhā -- tiṇasīho, kāḷasīho, paṇḍusīho, kesarasīhoti. tesu ^b^tiṇasīho^eb^ kapotavaṇṇagāvisadiso tiṇabhakkho ca hoti. ^b^kāḷasīho^eb^ kāḷagāvisadiso tiṇabhakkhoyeva. ^b^paṇḍusīho^eb^ paṇḍupalāsavaṇṇagāvisadiso maṃsabhakkho. ^b^kesarasīho^eb^ lākhāparikammakateneva mukhena agganaṅguṭṭhena catūhi ca pādapariyantehi samannāgato, matthakatopissa paṭṭhāya lākhātūlikāya katā viya tisso rājiyo piṭṭhimajjhena gantvā antarasatthimhi dakkhiṇāvattā hutvā ṭhitā. khandhe panassa satasahassagghanikakambalaparikkhepo viya kesarabhāro hoti, avasesaṭṭhānaṃ parisuddhasālipiṇḍasaṅkhacuṇṇapiṇḍavaṇṇaṃ hoti. imesu catūsu sīhesu ayaṃ kesarasīho idha adhippeto.

[03] ^b^migarājā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0066^ea^ sabbamigagaṇassa rājā. ^b^āsayā^eb^ti vasanaṭṭhānato, suvaṇṇaguhato vā rajatamaṇiphalikamanosilāguhato vā nikkhamatīti vuttaṃ hoti. nikkhamamāno panesa catūhi kāraṇehi nikkhamati andhakārapīḷito vā ālokatthāya, uccārapassāvapīḷito vā tesaṃ vissajjanatthāya, jighacchāpīḷito vā gocaratthāya, sambhavapīḷito vā assaddhammapaṭisevanatthāya. idha pana gocaratthāya nikkhamanto adhippeto.

[03] ^b^vijambhatī^eb^ti suvaṇṇatale vā rajatamaṇiphalikamanosilātalānaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ dve pacchimapāde samaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā purimapāde purato pasāretvā sarīrassa pacchābhāgaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā purimabhāgaṃ ^a^V2.0284^ea^ abhiharitvā piṭṭhiṃ nāmetvā gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā asanisaddaṃ karonto viya nāsapuṭāni pothetvā sarīralaggaṃ rajaṃ vidhunanto vijambhati. vijambhanabhūmiyañca pana taruṇavacchako viya aparāparaṃ javati, javato panassa sarīraṃ andhakāre paribbhamantaṃ alātaṃ viya khāyati.

[03] ^b^anuviloketī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0292^ea^ kasmā anuviloketi? parānuddayatāya. tasmiṃ kira sīhanādaṃ nadante papātāvāṭādīsu visamaṭṭhānesu carantā hatthigokaṇṇamahiṃsādayo pāṇā papātepi āvāṭepi patanti, tesaṃ anuddayāya anuviloketi. kiṃ panassa luddassa paramaṃsakhādino anuddayā nāma atthīti? āma atthi. tathā hi ``kiṃ me bahūhi ghātitehī''ti attano ^a^P3.0067^ea^ gocaratthāyāpi khuddake pāṇe na gaṇhāti. evaṃ anuddayaṃ karoti, vuttampi cetaṃ -- ``māhaṃ khuddake pāṇe visamagate saṅghātaṃ āpādesi''nti (a0 ni0 10.21).

[03] ^b^sīhanādaṃ nadatī^eb^ti tikkhattuṃ tāva abhītanādaṃ nadati. evañca panassa vijambhanabhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā nadantassa saddo samantā tiyojanapadesaṃ ekaninnādaṃ karoti, tamassa ninnādaṃ sutvā tiyojanabbhantaragatā dvipadacatuppadagaṇā yathāṭhāne ṭhātuṃ na sakkonti. ^b^gocarāya pakkamatī^eb^ti āhāratthāya gacchati. kathaṃ? so hi vijambhanabhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā dakkhiṇato vā vāmato vā uppatanto usabhamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ gaṇhāti, uddhaṃ uppatanto cattāripi aṭṭhapi usabhaṭṭhānāni uppatati, same ṭhāne ujukaṃ pakkhandanto soḷasausabhamattampi vīsatiusabhamattampi ṭhānaṃ pakkhandati, thalā vā pabbatā vā pakkhandanto saṭṭhiusabhamattampi asītiusabhamattampi ṭhānaṃ pakkhandati, antarāmagge rukkhaṃ vā pabbataṃ vā disvā taṃ pariharanto vāmato vā dakkhiṇato vā uddhaṃ vā usabhamattaṃ apakkamati. tatiyaṃ pana sīhanādaṃ naditvā teneva saddhiṃ tiyojane ṭhāne paññāyati, tiyojanaṃ gantvā nivattitvā ṭhito attanova nādassa anunādaṃ suṇāti. evaṃ sīghena javena pakkamati.

[03] ^b^yebhuyyenā^eb^ti pāyena. ^b^bhayaṃ santāsaṃ saṃvega^eb^nti sabbaṃ cittutrāsasseva nāmaṃ. sīhassa hi saddaṃ sutvā bahū bhāyanti, appakā na ^a^P3.0068^ea^ bhāyanti. ke pana teti? samasīho hatthājānīyo assājānīyo usabhājānīyo purisājānīyo khīṇāsavoti. kasmā panete na bhāyantīti? samasīho tāva ``jātigottakulasūrabhāvehi samānosmī''ti na bhāyati, hatthājānīyādayo attano ^a^V2.0285^ea^ sakkāyadiṭṭhibalavatāya na bhāyanti, khīṇāsavo sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pahīnattā na bhāyati.

[03] ^b^bilāsayā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0293^ea^ bile sayantā bilavāsino ahinakulagodhādayo. ^b^udakāsayā^eb^ti udakavāsino macchakacchapādayo. ^b^vanāsayā^eb^ti vanavāsino hatthiassagokaṇṇamigādayo. ^b^pavisantī^eb^ti ``idāni āgantvā gaṇhissatī''ti maggaṃ oloketvā pavisanti. ^b^daḷhehī^eb^ti thirehi. ^b^varattehī^eb^ti cammarajjūhi. ^b^mahiddhiko^eb^tiādīsu vijambhanabhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā dakkhiṇapassādīhi usabhamattaṃ, ujuṃ vīsatiusabhamattādilaṅghanavasena mahiddhikatā, sesamigānaṃ adhipatibhāvena mahesakkhatā, samantā tiyojanaṭṭhāne saddaṃ sutvā palāyantānaṃ vasena mahānubhāvatā veditabbā.

[03] ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti bhagavā tesu tesu suttantesu tathā tathā attānaṃ kathesi. ``sīhoti kho, bhikkhave, tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā''ti (a0 ni0 5.99; 10.21) imasmiṃ tāva sutte sīhasadisaṃ attānaṃ kathesi. ``bhisakko sallakattoti kho, sunakkhatta, tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacana''nti (ma0 ni0 3.65) imasmiṃ ^a^P3.0069^ea^ vejjasadisaṃ, ``brāhmaṇoti kho, bhikkhave, tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacana''nti (a0 ni0 8.85) imasmiṃ brāhmaṇasadisaṃ, ``puriso maggakusaloti kho, tissa, tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacana''nti (saṃ0 ni0 3.84) imasmiṃ maggadesakapurisasadisaṃ, ``rājāhamasmi, selā''ti (su0 ni0 559; ma0 ni0 2.399) imasmiṃ rājasadisaṃ. imasmiṃ pana sutte sīhasadisameva katvā attānaṃ kathento evamāha.

[03] tatrāyaṃ sadisatā -- sīhassa kañcanaguhādīsu vasanakālo viya hi tathāgatassa dīpaṅkarapādamūle katābhinīhārassa aparimitakālaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā pacchimabhave paṭisandhiggahaṇena ceva mātukucchito nikkhamanena ca dasasahassilokadhātuṃ kampetvā vuddhimanvāya dibbasampattisadisaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavamānassa tīsu pāsādesu nivāsakālo daṭṭhabbo. sīhassa kañcanaguhādito nikkhantakālo viya tathāgatassa ekūnatiṃsasaṃvacchare vivaṭena dvārena kaṇḍakaṃ āruyha channasahāyassa nikkhamitvā tīṇi rajjāni atikkamitvā anomānadītīre brahmunā dinnāni kāsāyāni paridahitvā pabbajitassa sattame divase rājagahaṃ gantvā ^a^V2.0286^ea^ tattha ^a^M2.0294^ea^ piṇḍāya caritvā paṇḍavagiripabbhāre katabhattakiccassa sammāsambodhiṃ patvā paṭhamameva magadharaṭṭhaṃ āgamanatthāya yāva rañño paṭiññādānakālo.

[03] sīhassa vijambhanakālo viya tathāgatassa dinnapaṭiññassa āḷārakālāmaupasaṅkamanaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva sujātāya ^a^P3.0070^ea^ dinnapāyāsassa ekūnapaṇṇāsāya piṇḍehi paribhuttakālo veditabbo. sīhassa sarīravidhunanaṃ viya sāyanhasamaye sottiyena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatāhi thomiyamānassa gandhādīhi pūjiyamānassa tikkhattuṃ bodhiṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha cuddasahatthubbedhe ṭhāne tiṇasantharaṃ attharitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya nisinnassa taṃkhaṇaññeva mārabalaṃ vidhametvā tīsu yāmesu tisso vijjā visodhetvā anulomappaṭilomaṃ paṭiccasamuppādamahāsamuddaṃ yamakañāṇamanthanena manthentassa sabbaññutaññāṇe paṭividdhe tadanubhāvena dasasahassilokadhātukampanaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03] sīhassa catudisāvilokanaṃ viya paṭividdhasabbaññutaññāṇassa sattasattāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍe viharitvā paribhuttamadhupiṇḍikāhārassa ajapālanigrodhamūle mahābrahmuno dhammadesanāyācanaṃ paṭiggahetvā tattha viharantassa ekādasame divase ``sve āsāḷhipuṇṇamā bhavissatī''ti paccūsasamaye ``kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya''nti āḷārudakānaṃ kālakatabhāvaṃ ñatvā dhammadesanatthāya pañcavaggiyānaṃ olokanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. sīhassa gocaratthāya tiyojanaṃ gamanakālo viya attano pattacīvaraṃ ādāya ``pañcavaggiyānaṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattessāmī''ti ^a^P3.0071^ea^ pacchābhatte ajapālanigrodhato vuṭṭhitassa aṭṭhārasayojanamaggaṃ gamanakālo.

[03] sīhassa sīhanādakālo viya tathāgatassa aṭṭhārasayojanamaggaṃ gantvā pañcavaggiye saññāpetvā acalapallaṅke nisinnassa dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi sannipatitena devagaṇena parivutassa ``dveme, bhikkhave, antā pabbajitena na sevitabbā''tiādinā nayena dhammacakkappavattanakālo veditabbo. imasmiṃ ca pana pade desiyamāne tathāgatasīhassa dhammaghoso heṭṭhā avīciṃ upari bhavaggaṃ gahetvā dasasahassilokadhātuṃ paṭicchādesi. sīhassa saddena khuddakapāṇānaṃ santāsāpajjanakālo ^a^M2.0295^ea^ viya tathāgatassa tīṇi lakkhaṇāni dīpetvā cattāri saccāni soḷasahākārehi saṭṭhiyā ca nayasahassehi vibhajitvā dhammaṃ kathentassa dīghāyukānaṃ devānaṃ ñāṇasantāsassa uppattikālo veditabbo.

[03] aparo ^a^V2.0287^ea^ nayo -- sīho viya sabbaññutaṃ patto tathāgato, āsayabhūtāya kanakaguhāya nikkhamanaṃ viya gandhakuṭito nikkhamanakālo, vijambhanaṃ viya dhammasabhaṃ upasaṅkamanakālo, disāvilokanaṃ viya parisāvilokanaṃ, sīhanādanadanaṃ viya dhammadesanākālo, gocarāya pakkamanaṃ viya paravādanimmaddanatthāya gamanaṃ.

[03] aparo nayo -- sīho viya tathāgato, himavantanissitāya kañcanaguhāya nikkhamanaṃ viya ārammaṇavasena nibbānanissitāya ^a^P3.0072^ea^ phalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṃ, vijambhanaṃ viya paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ, disāvilokanaṃ viya veneyyasattavilokanaṃ, sīhanādo viya sampattaparisāya dhammadesanā, gocarāya pakkamanaṃ viya asampattānaṃ veneyyasattānaṃ santikūpasaṅkamanaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^yadā^eb^ti yasmiṃ kāle. ^b^tathāgato^eb^ti heṭṭhā vuttehi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi tathāgato. ^b^loke^eb^ti sattaloke. ^b^uppajjatī^eb^ti abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya yāva bodhipallaṅkā vā arahattamaggañāṇā vā uppajjati nāma, arahattaphale pana patte uppanno nāma. ^b^arahaṃ sammāsambuddho^eb^tiādīni visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.124 ādayo) buddhānussatiniddese vitthāritāni.

[03] ^b^iti sakkāyo^eb^ti ayaṃ sakkāyo, ettako sakkāyo, na ito bhiyyo sakkāyo atthīti. ettāvatā sabhāvato sarasato pariyantato paricchedato parivaṭumato sabbepi pañcupādānakkhandhā dassitā honti. ^b^iti sakkāyasamudayo^eb^ti ayaṃ sakkāyassa samudayo nāma. ettāvatā ``āhārasamudayā rūpasamudayo''tiādi sabbaṃ dassitaṃ hoti. ^b^iti sakkāyassa atthaṅgamo^eb^ti ayaṃ sakkāyassa atthaṅgamo. imināpi ``āhāranirodhā rūpanirodho''tiādi sabbaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^vaṇṇavanto^eb^ti ^a^M2.0296^ea^ sarīravaṇṇena vaṇṇavanto. ^b^dhammadesanaṃ sutvā^eb^ti pañcasu khandhesu paṇṇāsalakkhaṇappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā. ^b^yebhuyyenā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0073^ea^ idha ke ṭhapeti? ariyasāvake deve. tesaṃ hi khīṇāsavattā cittutrāsabhayampi na uppajjati, saṃviggassa yoniso padhānena pattabbaṃ pattatāya ñāṇasaṃvegopi. itarāsaṃ pana devatānaṃ ``tāso heso, bhikkhave, anicca''nti manasikarontānaṃ cittutrāsabhayampi, balavavipassanākāle ñāṇabhayampi uppajjati. ^b^bho^eb^ti dhammālapanamattametaṃ. ^b^sakkāyapariyāpannā^eb^ti pañcakkhandhapariyāpannā. iti tesaṃ sammāsambuddhe ^a^V2.0288^ea^ vaṭṭadosaṃ dassetvā tilakkhaṇāhataṃ katvā dhammaṃ desente ñāṇabhayaṃ nāma okkamati.

[03] ^b^abhiññāyā^eb^ti jānitvā. ^b^dhammacakka^eb^nti paṭivedhañāṇampi desanāñāṇampi. ^b^paṭivedhañāṇaṃ^eb^ nāma yena ñāṇena bodhipallaṅke nisinno cattāri saccāni soḷasahākārehi saṭṭhiyā ca nayasahassehi paṭivijjhi. ^b^desanāñāṇaṃ^eb^ nāma yena ñāṇena tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi. ubhayampetaṃ dasabalassa ure jātañāṇameva. tesu dhammadesanāñāṇaṃ gahetabbaṃ. taṃ panesa yāva aṭṭhārasabrahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ aññākoṇḍaññattherassa sotāpattiphalaṃ na uppajjati, tāva pavatteti nāma. tasmiṃ uppanne pavattitaṃ nāma hotīti veditabbaṃ. ^b^appaṭipuggalo^eb^ti sadisapuggalarahito. ^b^yasassino^eb^ti parivārasampannā. ^b^tādino^eb^ti ^a^P3.0074^ea^ lābhālābhādīhi ekasadisassa.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ catutthe aggesu pasādā, aggā vā pasādāti ^b^aggappasādā^eb^. ^b^yāvatā^eb^ti yattakā. ^b^apadā^eb^ti nippadā ahimacchādayo. ^b^dvipadā^eb^ti manussapakkhiādayo. ^b^catuppadā^eb^ti hatthiassādayo. ^b^bahuppadā^eb^ti satapadiādayo. ^b^nevasaññināsaññino^eb^ti bhavagge nibbattasattā. ^b^aggamakkhāyatī^eb^ti guṇehi aggo uttamo seṭṭhoti akkhāyati. ^b^asaṅkhatā^eb^ti nibbānameva gahetvā vuttaṃ. ^b^virāgo^eb^tiādīni nibbānasseva nāmāni. tañhi āgamma sabbakilesā virajjanti, sabbe rāgamadādayo madā nimmadā honti, abhāvaṃ gacchanti, sabbā pipāsā vinayaṃ upenti, sabbe ālayā ^a^M2.0297^ea^ samugghātaṃ gacchanti, vaṭṭāni upacchijjanti, taṇhā khīyanti, vaṭṭadukkhā nirujjhanti, sabbe pariḷāhā nibbāyanti. tasmā etāni nāmāni labhati. sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^anussaritā^eb^ti anugantvā saritā, aparāparaṃ sarituṃ samatthoti attho. ^b^dakkho^eb^ti cheko. ^b^tatrupāyāyā^eb^ti ``imasmiṃ kāle imaṃ nāma kattabba''nti evaṃ tattha tattha upāyabhūtāya ^a^V2.0289^ea^ paññāya samannāgato. ^b^anumoditabba^eb^nti abhinanditabbaṃ. ^b^paṭikkositabba^eb^nti paṭikkhipitabbaṃ. ^b^neva kho tyāha^eb^nti neva kho te ahaṃ. kasmā panetaṃ bhagavā nābhinandati, nappaṭikkhipatīti? lokiyattā nābhinandati ^a^P3.0075^ea^, lokiyaṃ atthaṃ gahetvā ṭhitattā nappaṭikkosati. ^b^bahussa janatā^eb^ti bahu assa janatā. idañca karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^ariye ñāye^eb^ti sahavipassanake magge. ^b^kalyāṇadhammatā kusaladhammatā^eb^tipi tasseva nāmāni. ^b^yaṃ vitakka^eb^nti nekkhammavitakkādīsu aññataraṃ. ^b^na taṃ vitakkaṃ vitakketī^eb^ti kāmavitakkādīsu ekampi na vitakketi. itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^vitakkapathe^eb^ti ettha vitakkoyeva vitakkapatho. ^b^ahañhi brāhmaṇā^eb^tiādīsu paṭhamanayena khīṇāsavassa sīlañceva bāhusaccañca kathitaṃ, dutiyatatiyehi khīṇāsavassa kiriyavitakkāni ceva kiriyajjhānāni ca, catutthena khīṇāsavabhāvo kathitoti veditabbo.
[03] ^b^maccupāsappamocana^eb^nti maccupāsā pamocanakaṃ maggaṃ. ^b^ñāyaṃ dhamma^eb^nti sahavipassanakaṃ maggaṃ. ^b^disvā ca sutvā cā^eb^ti ñāṇeneva passitvā ca suṇitvā ca. sesamettha uttānameva.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^antarā ca ukkaṭṭhaṃ antarā ca setabya^eb^nti ettha ^b^ukkaṭṭhā^eb^ti ukkāhi dhārīyamānāhi māpitattā evaṃladdhavohāraṃ nagaraṃ. ^b^setabya^eb^nti atīte kassapasammāsambuddhassa jātanagaraṃ. ^b^antarā^eb^saddo pana kāraṇakhaṇacittavemajjhavivarādīsu vattati. ``tadantaraṃ ko jāneyya aññatra tathāgatā''ti ^a^M2.0298^ea^ (a0 ni0 6.44; 10.75) ca, ``janā ^a^P3.0076^ea^ saṅgamma mantenti, mañca tañca kimantara''nti ca ādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 1.228) kāraṇe. ``addasā maṃ, bhante, aññatarā itthī vijjantarikāya bhājanaṃ dhovantī''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 2.149) khaṇe. ``yassantarato na santi kopā''tiādīsu (udā0 20) citte. ``antarāvosānamāpādī''tiādīsu vemajjhe. ``apicāyaṃ tapodā dvinnaṃ mahānirayānaṃ antarikāya āgacchatī''tiādīsu (pārā0 231) vivare. svāyamidha vivare vattati. tasmā ukkaṭṭhāya ca setabyassa ca vivareti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. antarāsaddena pana yuttattā upayogavacanaṃ kataṃ. īdisesu ca ṭhānesu akkharacintakā ``antarā gāmañca nadiñca yātī''ti ^a^V2.0290^ea^ evaṃ ekameva antarāsaddaṃ payuñjanti, so dutiyapadenapi yojetabbo hoti, ayojiyamāne upayogavacanaṃ na pāpuṇāti. idha pana yojetvā eva vutto.

[03] ^b^addhānamaggappaṭipanno hotī^eb^ti addhānasaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ paṭipanno hoti, dīghamagganti attho. kasmā paṭipannoti? taṃ divasaṃ kira bhagavā idaṃ addasa ``mayi taṃ maggaṃ paṭipanne doṇo brāhmaṇo mama padacetiyāni passitvā padānupadiko hutvā mama nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā pañhaṃ pucchissati. athassāhaṃ ekaṃ saccadhammaṃ desessāmi ^a^P3.0077^ea^. brāhmaṇo tīṇi sāmaññaphalāni paṭivijjhitvā dvādasapadasahassaparimāṇaṃ doṇagajjitaṃ nāma vaṇṇaṃ vatvā mayi parinibbute sakalajambudīpe uppannaṃ mahākalahaṃ vūpasametvā dhātuyo bhājessatī''ti. iminā kāraṇena paṭipanno. ^b^doṇopi sudaṃ brāhmaṇo^eb^ti doṇo brāhmaṇopi tayo vede paguṇe katvā pañcasate māṇavake sippaṃ vācento taṃdivasaṃ pātova uṭṭhāya sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā satagghanakaṃ nivāsetvā pañcasatagghanakaṃ ekaṃsavaragataṃ katvā āmuttayaññasutto rattavaṭṭikā upāhanā ārohitvā pañcasatamāṇavakaparivāro tameva maggaṃ paṭipajji. taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^pādesū^eb^ti pādehi akkantaṭṭhānesu. ^b^cakkānī^eb^ti lakkhaṇacakkāni. kiṃ pana bhagavato gacchantassa akkantaṭṭhāne padaṃ paññāyatīti? na paññāyati ^a^M2.0299^ea^. kasmā? sukhumattā mahābalattā mahājanānuggahena ca. buddhānañhi sukhumacchavitāya akkantaṭṭhānaṃ tūlapicuno patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ viya hoti, padavaḷañjo na paññāyati. yathā ca balavato vātajavasindhavassa paduminipattepi akkantamattameva hoti, evaṃ mahābalatāya tathāgatena akkantaṭṭhānaṃ akkantamattameva hoti, na tattha padavaḷañjo paññāyati. buddhānañca anupadaṃ mahājanakāyo ^a^P3.0078^ea^ gacchati, tassa satthu padavaḷañjaṃ disvā maddituṃ avisahantassa gamanavicchedo bhaveyya. tasmā akkantākkantaṭṭhāne yopi padavaḷañjo bhaveyya, so antaradhāyateva. doṇo pana brāhmaṇo tathāgatassa adhiṭṭhānavasena passi. bhagavā hi yassa padacetiyaṃ dassetukāmo hoti, taṃ ārabbha ``asuko nāma passatū''ti adhiṭṭhāti. tasmā māgaṇḍiyabrāhmaṇo viya ayampi brāhmaṇo tathāgatassa adhiṭṭhānavasena addasa.

[03] ^b^pāsādika^eb^nti pasādajanakaṃ. itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^uttamadamathasamathamanuppatta^eb^nti ettha uttamadamatho nāma arahattamaggo, uttamasamatho nāma arahattamaggasamādhi, tadubhayaṃ pattanti attho ^a^V2.0291^ea^. ^b^danta^eb^nti nibbisevanaṃ. ^b^gutta^eb^nti gopitaṃ. ^b^saṃyatindriya^eb^nti rakkhitindriyaṃ. ^b^nāga^eb^nti chandādīhi agacchanato, pahīnakilese puna anāgacchanato, āguṃ akaraṇato, balavantaṭṭhenāti catūhi kāraṇehi nāgaṃ.

[03] ^b^devo no bhavaṃ bhavissatī^eb^ti ettha ``devo no bhava''nti ettāvatāpi pucchā niṭṭhitā bhaveyya, ayaṃ pana brāhmaṇo ``anāgate mahesakkho eko devarājā bhavissatī''ti anāgatavasena pucchāsabhāgeneva kathento evamāha. bhagavāpissa pucchāsabhāgeneva kathento ^b^na kho ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa, devo bhavissāmī^eb^ti āha. esa nayo sabbattha. ^b^āsavāna^eb^nti ^a^P3.0079^ea^ kāmāsavādīnaṃ catunnaṃ. ^b^pahīnā^eb^ti bodhipallaṅke sabbaññutaññāṇādhigameneva pahīnā. ^b^anupalitto lokenā^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhilepānaṃ pahīnattā saṅkhāralokena anupalitto. ^b^buddho^eb^ti catunnaṃ saccānaṃ buddhattā buddho iti maṃ dhārehi.

[03] ^b^yenā^eb^ti yena āsavena. ^b^devūpapatyassā^eb^ti devūpapatti assa mayhaṃ bhaveyya. ^b^vihaṅgamo^eb^ti ākāsacaro gandhabbakāyikadevo. ^b^viddhastā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0300^ea^ vidhamitā. ^b^vinaḷīkatā^eb^ti vigatanaḷā vigatabandhanā katā. ^b^vaggū^eb^ti sundaraṃ. ^b^toyena nupalippatī^eb^ti udakato ratanamattaṃ accuggamma ṭhitaṃ saraṃ sobhayamānaṃ bhamaragaṇaṃ hāsayamānaṃ toyena na lippati. ^b^tasmā buddhosmi brāhmaṇā^eb^ti desanāpariyosāne tīṇi maggaphalāni pāpuṇitvā dvādasahi padasahassehi doṇagajjitaṃ nāma vaṇṇaṃ kathesi, tathāgate ca parinibbute jambudīpatale uppannaṃ mahākalahaṃ vūpasametvā dhātuyo bhājesīti.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^nibbānasseva santike^eb^ti nibbānasantikeyeva carati. ^b^sīle patiṭṭhito^eb^ti pātimokkhasīle patiṭṭhito. ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0080^ea^ ^b^vihārī^eb^ti evaṃ viharanto. ^b^ātāpī^eb^ti ātāpena vīriyena samannāgato. ^b^yogakkhemassā^eb^ti catūhi yogehi khemassa nibbānassa. ^b^pamāde bhayadassivā^eb^ti pamādaṃ bhayato passanto.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^V2.0292^ea^ ^b^panuṇṇapaccekasacco^eb^ti ``idameva dassanaṃ saccaṃ, idameva sacca''nti evaṃ pāṭiekkaṃ gahitattā paccekasaṅkhātāni diṭṭhisaccāni panuṇṇāni nīhaṭāni pahīnāni assāti panuṇṇapaccekasacco. ^b^samavayasaṭṭhesano^eb^ti ettha ^b^avayā^eb^ti anūnā, ^b^saṭṭhā^eb^ti vissaṭṭhā, sammā avayā saṭṭhā esanā assāti samavayasaṭṭhesano, sammā vissaṭṭhasabbaesanoti attho. ^b^patilīno^eb^ti nilīno ekībhāvaṃ upagato. ^b^puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇāna^eb^nti bahūnaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ. ettha ca ^b^samaṇā^eb^ti pabbajjūpagatā, ^b^brāhmaṇā^eb^ti bhovādino. ^b^puthupaccekasaccānī^eb^ti bahūni pāṭekkasaccāni. ^b^nuṇṇānī^eb^ti nīhaṭāni. ^b^panuṇṇānī^eb^ti suṭṭhu nīhaṭāni. ^b^cattānī^eb^ti vissaṭṭhāni. ^b^vantānī^eb^ti vamitāni. ^b^muttānī^eb^ti chinnabandhanāni katāni. ^b^pahīnānī^eb^ti pajahitāni. ^b^paṭinissaṭṭhānī^eb^ti yathā na puna cittaṃ ārohanti, evaṃ paṭinissajjitāni. sabbānevetāni ^a^P3.0081^ea^ gahitagahaṇassa vissaṭṭhabhāvavevacanāni.

[03] ^b^kāmesanā pahīnā hotī^eb^ti anāgāmimaggena pahīnā. ^b^bhavesanā^eb^ pana arahattamaggena pahīyati. ``brahmacariyaṃ esissāmi gavesissāmī''ti evaṃ ^a^M2.0301^ea^ pavattajjhāsayasaṅkhātā ^b^brahmacariyesanā^eb^pi arahattamaggeneva paṭippassaddhiṃ vūpasamaṃ gacchati. diṭṭhibrahmacariyesanā pana sotāpattimaggeneva paṭippasambhatīti veditabbā. ^b^evaṃ kho, bhikkhave^eb^ti evaṃ catutthajjhānena passaddhakāyasaṅkhāro vūpasantāssāsapassāso nāma hoti. ^b^asmimāno^eb^ti asmīti uppajjanako navavidhamāno.

[03] gāthāsu ^b^kāmesanā bhavesanā^eb^ti etā dve esanā, ^b^brahmacariyesanā sahā^eb^ti tāhiyeva saha brahmacariyesanāti tissopi etā. idha ṭhatvā ^b^esanā paṭinissaṭṭhā^eb^ti iminā padena saddhiṃ yojanā kātabbā. ^b^iti saccaparāmāso, diṭṭhiṭṭhānā samussayā^eb^ti ``iti saccaṃ iti sacca''nti gahaṇaparāmāso ca diṭṭhisaṅkhātāyeva diṭṭhiṭṭhānā ca ye samussitattā uggantvā ṭhitattā samussayāti vuccanti, te sabbepi. idha ṭhatvā ^b^diṭṭhiṭṭhānā samūhatā^eb^ti iminā padena saddhiṃ yojanā kātabbā. kassa pana etā esanā paṭinissaṭṭhā, ete ca diṭṭhiṭṭhānā samūhatāti? ^b^sabbarāgavirattassa taṇhākkhayavimuttino^eb^. yo hi sabbarāgehipi viratto, taṇhākkhaye ca nibbāne pavattāya ^a^P3.0082^ea^ arahattaphalavimuttiyā samannāgato, etassa esanā paṭinissaṭṭhā, diṭṭhiṭṭhānā ca samūhatā ^a^V2.0293^ea^. ^b^sa ve santo^eb^ti so evarūpo kilesasantatāya santo. ^b^passaddho^eb^ti dvīhi kāyacittapassaddhīhi passaddho. ^b^aparājito^eb^ti sabbakilese jinitvā ṭhitattā kenaci aparājito. ^b^mānābhisamayā^eb^ti mānassa pahānābhisamayena. ^b^buddho^eb^ti cattāri saccāni bujjhitvā ṭhito. iti imasmiṃ suttepi gāthāsupi khīṇāsavova kathitoti.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^saṅghātaṃ āpajjantī^eb^ti vadhaṃ maraṇaṃ āpajjanti. ^b^niccadāna^eb^nti salākabhattaṃ. ^b^anukulayañña^eb^nti amhākaṃ pitūhi pitāmahehi dinnattā evaṃ kulānukulavasena yajitabbaṃ, dātabbanti attho. ^b^assamedha^eb^ntiādīsu assamettha medhantīti assamedho, dvīhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa ekavīsatiyūpassa ṭhapetvā bhūmiñca purise ca avasesasabbavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. purisamettha medhantīti ^b^purisamedho,^eb^ catūhi ^a^M2.0302^ea^ pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃ bhūmiyā assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. sammamettha pāsantīti ^b^sammāpāso,^eb^ divase divase sammaṃ khipitvā tassa patitokāse vediṃ katvā saṃhārimehi yūpādīhi sarassatinadiyā nimuggokāsato pabhuti paṭilomaṃ gacchantena yajitabbassa sabbayāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. vājamettha pivantīti ^b^vājapeyyaṃ,^eb^ ekena pariyaññena sattarasahi pasūhi yajitabbassa beluvayūpassa sattarasakadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. natthi ^a^P3.0083^ea^ ettha aggaḷāti ^b^niraggaḷo^eb^. navahi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃ bhūmiyā purisehi ca assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa sabbamedhapariyāyanāmassa assamedhavikappassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^mahārambhā^eb^ti mahākiccā mahākaraṇīyā. apica pāṇātipātasamārambhassa mahantatāyapi mahārambhāyeva. ^b^na te honti mahapphalā^eb^ti ettha niravasesatthe sāvasesarūpanaṃ kataṃ. tasmā iṭṭhaphalena nipphalāva hontīti attho. idañca pāṇātipātasamārambhameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. yaṃ pana tattha antarantarā dānaṃ diyyati, taṃ iminā samārambhena upahatattā mahapphalaṃ na hoti, mandaphalaṃ hotīti attho. ^b^haññare^eb^ti haññanti. ^b^yajanti anukulaṃ sadā^eb^ti ye aññe anukulaṃ yajanti, pubbapurisehi yiṭṭhattā pacchimapurisāpi yajantīti attho. ^b^seyyo hotī^eb^ti visesova hoti. ^b^na pāpiyo^eb^ti pāpaṃ kiñci na hoti.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^V2.0294^ea^ ^b^abhisaṅkhata^eb^nti rāsikataṃ. ^b^nirārambha^eb^nti pāṇasamārambharahitaṃ. ^b^yañña^eb^nti deyyadhammaṃ. tañhi yajitabbattā yaññanti vuccati. ^b^kālenā^eb^ti yuttappattakālena. ^b^upasaṃyantī^eb^ti upagacchanti. ^b^kulaṃ gati^eb^nti vaṭṭakulañceva vaṭṭagatiñca atikkantā. ^b^yaññassa^eb^ ^a^P3.0084^ea^ ^b^kovidā^eb^ti catubhūmakayaññe kusalā. ^b^yaññe^eb^ti pakatidāne. ^b^saddhe^eb^ti matakadāne. ^b^habyaṃ katvā^eb^ti hunitabbaṃ deyyadhammaṃ upakappetvā. ^b^sukhette brahmacārisū^eb^ti brahmacārisaṅkhāte sukhettamhīti attho. ^b^suppatta^eb^nti suṭṭhu pattaṃ. ^b^dakkhiṇeyyesu yaṃ kata^eb^nti yaṃ dakkhiṇāya ^a^M2.0303^ea^ anucchavikesu upakappitaṃ, taṃ suhutaṃ suyiṭṭhaṃ suppattanti attho. ^b^saddho^eb^ti buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇānaṃ saddahanatāya saddho. ^b^muttena cetasā^eb^ti vissaṭṭhena cittena. imināssa muttacāgaṃ dīpetīti.
[06] cakkavaggo catuttho.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ pañcamassa ^a^V2.0295^ea^ paṭhame ^b^ñāṇadassanappaṭilābhāyā^eb^ti dibbacakkhuñāṇadassanassa paṭilābhāya. ^b^divāsaññaṃ adhiṭṭhātī^eb^ti divāti evaṃ saññaṃ adhiṭṭhāti. ^b^yathā divā tathā ratti^eb^nti yathā divā ālokasaññā manasi katā, tatheva taṃ rattimpi manasi karoti. dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. ^b^sappabhāsa^eb^nti dibbacakkhuñāṇobhāsena sahobhāsaṃ. kiñcāpi ^a^P3.0085^ea^ ālokasadisaṃ kataṃ, attho panettha na evaṃ sallakkhetabbo. dibbacakkhuñāṇāloko hi idhādhippeto.

[03] ^b^viditā^eb^ti pākaṭā hutvā. kathaṃ pana vedanā viditā uppajjanti, viditā abbhatthaṃ gacchantīti? idha bhikkhu vatthuṃ pariggaṇhāti, ārammaṇaṃ pariggaṇhāti. tassa pariggahitavatthārammaṇatāya tā vedanā ``evaṃ uppajjitvā evaṃ ṭhatvā evaṃ nirujjhantī''ti viditā uppajjanti, viditā tiṭṭhanti, viditā abbhatthaṃ gacchanti nāma. ^b^saññāvitakkesu^eb^pi eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^udayabbayānupassī^eb^ti udayañca vayañca passanto. ^b^iti rūpa^eb^nti evaṃ rūpaṃ ettakaṃ rūpaṃ na ito paraṃ rūpaṃ atthīti. ^b^iti rūpassa samudayo^eb^ti evaṃ rūpassa uppādo. ^b^atthaṅgamo^eb^ti pana bhedo adhippeto. ^b^vedanādīsu^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^idañca pana metaṃ, bhikkhave, sandhāya bhāsita^eb^nti, bhikkhave, yaṃ mayā etaṃ puṇṇakapañhe ``saṅkhāya lokasmi''ntiādi bhāsitaṃ, taṃ idaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ sandhāya bhāsitanti attho.

[03] tattha ^b^saṅkhāyā^eb^ti ñāṇena jānitvā. ^b^lokasmi^eb^nti sattaloke. ^b^paroparānī^eb^ti uccāvacāni uttamādhamāni. ^b^iñjita^eb^nti calitaṃ. ^b^natthi kuhiñci loke^eb^ti ^a^M2.0304^ea^ lokasmiṃ katthaci ekakkhandhepi ekāyatanepi ekadhātuyāpi ekārammaṇepi natthi. ^b^santo^eb^ti paccanīkakilesavūpasamena santo. ^b^vidhūmo^eb^ti ^a^V2.0296^ea^ ^a^P3.0086^ea^ kodhadhūmena vigatadhūmo. evamettha suttante maggekaggatampi kathetvā gāthāya phalasamāpattiyeva kathitāti.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^yo ca tesaṃ tattha tattha, jānāti anudhammata^eb^nti yo etesaṃ pañhānaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne byākaraṇaṃ jānāti. ^b^catupañhassa kusalo, āhu bhikkhuṃ tathāvidha^eb^nti tathāvidhaṃ bhikkhuṃ tesu catūsu pañhesu kusaloti evaṃ vadanti. ^b^durāsado duppasaho^eb^ti parehi ghaṭṭetuṃ vā abhibhavituṃ vā na sakkā. ^b^gambhīro^eb^ti sattasīdantaramahāsamuddo viya gambhīro. ^b^duppadhaṃsiyo^eb^ti dummocāpayo, gahitaggahaṇaṃ vissajjāpetuṃ na sakkāti attho. ^b^atthe anatthe cā^eb^ti vaḍḍhiyañca avaḍḍhiyañca. ^b^atthābhisamayā^eb^ti atthasamāgamena. ^b^dhīro paṇḍitoti pavuccatī^eb^ti dhitisampanno puggalo ``paṇḍito aya''nti evaṃ pavuccati.
[03] 43-44^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^kodhagaru na saddhammagarū^eb^ti kodhaṃ gāravena garuṃ katvā gaṇhāti, na saddhammaṃ, saddhammaṃ pana agāravena lāmakaṃ katvā gaṇhāti. sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
[03] ^b^virūhantī^eb^ti vaḍḍhanti, sañjātamūlāya vā saddhāya patiṭṭhahanti acalā bhavanti. catutthe ^b^kodhagarutā^eb^ti kodhamhi sagāravatā. esa ^a^P3.0087^ea^ nayo sabbattha.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^yatthā^eb^ti cakkavāḷalokassa ekokāse bhummaṃ. ^b^na cavati na upapajjatī^eb^ti idaṃ aparāparaṃ cutipaṭisandhivasena gahitaṃ. ^b^gamanenā^eb^ti padagamanena. ^b^lokassa anta^eb^nti satthā saṅkhāralokassa antaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^ñāteyya^eb^ntiādīsu ñātabbaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ pattabbanti attho. iti devaputtena cakkavāḷalokassa anto pucchito, satthārā saṅkhāralokassa kathito ^a^M2.0305^ea^. so pana ``attano ^a^V2.0297^ea^ pañhena saddhiṃ satthu byākaraṇaṃ sametī''ti saññāya sampahaṃsanto ^b^acchariya^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03] ^b^daḷhadhammā^eb^ti daḷhadhanu uttamappamāṇena dhanunā samannāgato. ^b^dhanuggaho^eb^ti dhanuācariyo. ^b^sikkhito^eb^ti dvādasa vassāni dhanusippaṃ sikkhito. ^b^katahattho^eb^ti usabhappamāṇepi vālaggaṃ vijjhituṃ samatthabhāvena katahattho. ^b^katūpāsano^eb^ti katasarakkhepo dassitasippo. ^b^asanenā^eb^ti kaṇḍena. ^b^atipāteyyā^eb^ti atikkameyya. yāvatā so tālacchādiṃ atikkameyya, tāvatā kālena ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ atikkamāmīti attano javasampattiṃ dasseti.

[03] ^b^puratthimā samuddā pacchimo^eb^ti yathā puratthimā samuddā ^a^P3.0088^ea^ pacchimasamuddo dūre, evaṃ me dūre padavītihāro ahosīti vadati. so kira pācīnacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ ṭhito pādaṃ pasāretvā pacchimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiṃ atikkamati, puna dutiyapādaṃ pasāretvā paracakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiṃ atikkamati. ^b^icchāgata^eb^nti icchā eva. ^b^aññatrevā^eb^ti nippapañcataṃ dasseti. bhikkhācārakāle kiresa nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā anotatte mukhaṃ dhovitvā kāle sampatte uttarakurumhi piṇḍāya caritvā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ nisinno bhattakiccaṃ karoti, tattha muhuttaṃ vissamitvā puna javati. ^b^vassasatāyuko^eb^ti tadā dīghāyukakālo hoti, ayaṃ pana vassasatāvasiṭṭhe āyumhi gamanaṃ ārabhi. ^b^vassasatajīvī^eb^ti taṃ vassasataṃ anantarāyena jīvanto. ^b^antarāyeva kālaṅkato^eb^ti cakkavāḷalokassa antaṃ appatvā antarāva mato. so pana tattha kālaṃ katvāpi āgantvā imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe nibbatti.

[03] ^b^appatvā^eb^ti saṅkhāralokassa antaṃ appatvā. ^b^dukkhassā^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhassa. ^b^antakiriya^eb^nti pariyantakaraṇaṃ. ^b^kaḷevare^eb^ti attabhāve. ^b^sasaññimhi samanake^eb^ti sasaññe sacittake. ^b^loka^eb^nti dukkhasaccaṃ. ^b^lokasamudaya^eb^nti ^a^P3.0089^ea^ samudayasaccaṃ. ^b^lokanirodha^eb^nti nirodhasaccaṃ. ^b^paṭipada^eb^nti maggasaccaṃ. iti ``nāhaṃ, āvuso, imāni cattāri saccāni tiṇakaṭṭhādīsu paññapemi, imasmiṃ pana catumahābhūtike kāyasmiṃyeva paññapemī''ti dasseti. ^b^samitāvī^eb^ti samitapāpo. ^b^nāsīsatī^eb^ti na pattheti. chaṭṭhaṃ uttānatthamevāti.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^V2.0298^ea^ ^a^M2.0306^ea^ ^b^suvidūravidūrānī^eb^ti kenaci pariyāyena anāsannāni hutvā suvidūrāneva vidūrāni. ^b^nabhañca, bhikkhave, pathavī cā^eb^ti ākāsañca mahāpathavī ca. tattha kiñcāpi pathavito ākāsaṃ nāma na dūre, dvaṅgulamattepi hoti. aññamaññaṃ alagganaṭṭhena pana ``suvidūravidūre''ti vuttaṃ. ^b^verocano^eb^ti sūriyo. ^b^satañca, bhikkhave, dhammo^eb^ti catusatipaṭṭhānādibhedo sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammo. ^b^asatañca dhammo^eb^ti dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatabhedo assaddhammo.

[03] ^b^pabhaṅkaro^eb^ti ālokakaro. ^b^abyāyiko hotī^eb^ti avigacchanasabhāvo hoti. ^b^sataṃ samāgamo^eb^ti paṇḍitānaṃ mittasanthavavasena samāgamo. ^b^yāvāpi^eb^ ^a^P3.0090^ea^ ^b^tiṭṭheyyā^eb^ti yattakaṃ addhānaṃ tiṭṭheyya. ^b^tatheva hotī^eb^ti tādisova hoti, pakatiṃ na jahati. ^b^khippaṃ hi vetī^eb^ti sīghaṃ vigacchati.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^pañcālaputto^eb^ti pañcālabrāhmaṇiyā putto. ^b^poriyā vācāyā^eb^ti paripuṇṇavācāya. ^b^vissaṭṭhāyā^eb^ti apalibuddhāya. ^b^anelagalāyā^eb^ti niddosāya ceva agaḷitāya ca apatitapadabyañjanāya. ^b^pariyāpannāyā^eb^ti vivaṭṭapariyāpannāya. ^b^anissitāyā^eb^ti vaṭṭaṃ anissitāya. vivaṭṭanissitameva katvā katheti, vaṭṭanissitaṃ katvā na kathetīti ayamettha adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^nābhāsamāna^eb^nti na akathentaṃ. ^b^amataṃ pada^eb^nti nibbānapadaṃ. ^b^bhāsaye^eb^ti obhāseyya. ^b^jotaye^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^paggaṇhe isinaṃ dhaja^eb^nti abbhuggataṭṭhena navalokuttaradhammo isīnaṃ dhajo nāma vuccati, tameva paggaṇheyya ukkhipeyya, uccaṃ katvā katheyyāti attho. navalokuttaradhammadīpakaṃ subhāsitaṃ dhajo etesanti ^b^subhāsitadhajā. isayo^eb^ti buddhādayo ariyā. ^b^dhammo hi isinaṃ dhajo^eb^ti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva lokuttaradhammo isīnaṃ dhajo nāmāti.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^V2.0299^ea^ ^a^M2.0307^ea^ ^b^saññāvipallāsā^eb^ti saññāya vipallatthabhāvā, catasso viparītasaññāyoti attho. sesapadadvayepi ^a^P3.0091^ea^ eseva nayo. ^b^anicce, bhikkhave, niccanti saññāvipallāso^eb^ti anicce vatthusmiṃ ``niccaṃ ida''nti evaṃ gahetvā uppajjanakasaññā, saññāvipallāsoti attho. iminā nayena sabbapadesu attho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^anattani ca attā^eb^ti anattani ``attā''ti evaṃsaññinoti attho. ^b^micchādiṭṭhihatā^eb^ti na kevalaṃ saññinova, saññāya viya uppajjamānāya micchādiṭṭhiyāpi hatā. ^b^khittacittā^eb^ti te saññādiṭṭhiyo viya uppajjamānena khittena cittena samannāgatā. ^b^visaññino^eb^ti desanāmattametaṃ, viparītasaññācittadiṭṭhinoti attho. ^b^te yogayuttā mārassā^eb^ti te mārassa yoge yuttā nāma honti. ^b^ayogakkhemino^eb^ti catūhi yogehi khemaṃ nibbānaṃ appattā. ^b^sattā^eb^ti puggalā. ^b^buddhā^eb^ti catusaccabuddhā. ^b^imaṃ dhamma^eb^nti catusaccadhammaṃ. ^b^sacittaṃ paccaladdhā^eb^ti sakaṃ cittaṃ paṭilabhitvā. ^b^aniccato dakkhu^eb^nti aniccabhāvena addasaṃsu. ^b^asubhataddasu^eb^nti asubhaṃ asubhatoyeva addasaṃsu. ^b^sammādiṭṭhisamādānā^eb^ti gahitasammādassanā. ^b^sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ upaccagu^eb^nti sakalaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ samatikkantā.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^P3.0092^ea^ ^b^upakkilesā^eb^ti virocituṃ adatvā upakkiliṭṭhabhāvakaraṇena upakkilesā. ^b^mahikā^eb^ti himaṃ. ^b^dhūmo rajo^eb^ti dhūmo ca rajo ca. ^b^rāhū^eb^ti purimā tayo asampattaupakkilesā, rāhu pana sampattaupakkilesavasena kathitoti veditabbo. ^b^samaṇabrāhmaṇā na tapanti na bhāsanti na virocantī^eb^ti guṇappatāpena na tapanti, guṇobhāsena na bhāsanti, guṇavirocanena na virocanti. ^b^surāmerayapānā appaṭiviratā^eb^ti pañcavidhāya surāya catubbidhassa merayassa ca pānato aviratā.

[01] ^b^avijjānivutā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0300^ea^ ^a^M2.0308^ea^ avijjāya nivāritā pihitā. ^b^piyarūpābhinandino^eb^ti piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ abhinandamānā tussamānā. ^b^sādiyantī^eb^ti gaṇhanti. ^b^aviddasū^eb^ti andhabālā. ^b^sanettikā^eb^ti taṇhāyotteneva sayottā. ^b^kaṭasi^eb^nti attabhāvaṃ. ^b^ghora^eb^nti kakkhaḷaṃ. imasmiṃ suttepi gāthāsupi vaṭṭameva kathitanti.
[06] rohitassavaggo pañcamo.
[06] paṭhamapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ dutiyassa ^a^V2.0301^ea^ ^a^M2.0309^ea^ paṭhame ^b^puññābhisandā^eb^ti puññassa abhisandā, puññappattiyoti attho. ^b^kusalābhisandā^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. te ^a^P3.0093^ea^ panete sukhaṃ āharantīti ^b^sukhassāhārā^eb^. suṭṭhu aggānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ dāyakāti ^b^sovaggikā^eb^. sukho nesaṃ vipākoti ^b^sukhavipākā^eb^. sagge upapatti saggo, saggāya saṃvattantīti ^b^saggasaṃvattanikā. cīvaraṃ paribhuñjamāno^eb^ti cīvaratthāya vatthaṃ labhitvā sūcisuttādīnaṃ abhāvena taṃ nikkhipantopi karontopi pārupantopi jiṇṇakāle paccattharaṇaṃ karontopi paccattharitumpi asakkuṇeyyaṃ bhūmattharaṇaṃ karontopi bhūmattharaṇassa ananucchavikaṃ phāletvā pādapuñchanaṃ karontopi ``paribhuñjamāno''tveva vuccati. yadā pana ``pādapuñchanampi na sakkā ida''nti sammajjitvā chaḍḍitaṃ hoti, tadā paribhuñjamāno nāma na hoti. ^b^appamāṇaṃ cetosamādhi^eb^nti arahattaphalasamādhiṃ. ^b^appamāṇo tassa puññābhisando^eb^ti iminā dāyakassa puññacetanāya appamāṇataṃ katheti. tassa hi ``khīṇāsavo me cīvaraṃ paribhuñjatī''ti punappunaṃ anussaraṇavasena pavattā puññacetanā appamāṇā hoti. taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^piṇḍapātā^eb^dīsu pana yo piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā sattāhampi teneva yāpeti, aññaṃ na paribhuñjati, so sattāhampi taṃyeva piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjamāno nāma hoti. ekasmiṃ pana senāsane rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānādīsu caṅkamantopi yāva taṃ senāsanaṃ pahāya aññaṃ na gaṇhāti, tāva paribhuñjamāno nāma hoti. ekena pana bhesajjena byādhimhi vūpasante yāva aññaṃ bhesajjaṃ na paribhuñjati, tāvadeva paribhuñjamāno nāma hoti.

[03] ^b^bahubherava^eb^nti ^a^P3.0094^ea^ bahūhi bheravārammaṇehi samannāgataṃ. ^b^ratanavarāna^eb^nti sattannampi vararatanānaṃ. ^b^ālaya^eb^nti nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^puthū savantī^eb^ti bahukā hutvā sandamānā. sesamettha uttānameva.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^V2.0302^ea^ ^a^M2.0310^ea^ ^b^ariyakantehī^eb^ti maggaphalasampayuttehi. tāni hi ariyānaṃ kantāni honti piyāni manāpāni. sesaṃ suttante tāva yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.124 ādayo) vuttameva.

[03] gāthāsu pana ^b^saddhā^eb^ti sotāpannassa saddhā adhippetā. sīlampi sotāpannassa sīlameva. ^b^ujubhūtañca dassana^eb^nti kāyavaṅkādīnaṃ abhāvena khīṇāsavassa dassanaṃ ujubhūtadassanaṃ nāma. ^b^āhū^eb^ti kathayanti. ^b^pasāda^eb^nti buddhadhammasaṅghesu pasādaṃ. ^b^dhammadassana^eb^nti catusaccadhammadassanaṃ.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^sambahulāpi kho gahapatī ca gahapatāniyo cā^eb^ti bahukā gahapatayo ca gahapatāniyo ca āvāhavivāhakaraṇatthāya gacchantā tameva maggaṃ paṭipannā honti. ^b^saṃvāsā^eb^ti sahavāsā ekatovāsā. ^b^chavo chavāyā^eb^ti guṇamaraṇena matattā chavo guṇamaraṇeneva matāya chavāya saddhiṃ. ^b^deviyā saddhi^eb^nti guṇehi devibhūtāya saddhiṃ. ^b^dussīlo^eb^ti nissīlo. ^b^pāpadhammo^eb^ti lāmakadhammo. ^b^akkosakaparibhāsako^eb^ti dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosako, bhayaṃ dassetvā santajjanena paribhāsako. evaṃ ^a^P3.0095^ea^ sabbattha attho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^kadariyā^eb^ti thaddhamaccharino. ^b^jānipatayo^eb^ti jayampatikā. ^b^vadaññū^eb^ti yācakānaṃ vacanassa atthaṃ jānanti. ^b^saññatā^eb^ti sīlasaṃyamena samannāgatā. ^b^dhammajīvino^eb^ti dhamme ṭhatvā jīvikaṃ kappentīti dhammajīvino. ^b^atthāsaṃ pacurā hontī^eb^ti vaḍḍhisaṅkhātā atthā etesaṃ bahū honti. ^b^phāsukaṃ upajāyatī^eb^ti aññamaññaṃ phāsuvihāro jāyati. ^b^kāmakāmino^eb^ti kāme kāmayamānā.
[03] 54^b^.^eb^ catutthe kammapathavasena desanā pavattitā. sesaṃ tādisameva. imesu pana dvīsupi suttesu agārikapaṭipadā kathitā. sotāpannasakadāgāmīnampi vaṭṭati.

[03] 55-56^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^V2.0303^ea^ ^a^M2.0311^ea^ ^b^tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti kimatthaṃ upasaṅkami? anuggaṇhanatthaṃ. tathāgato hi taṃ raṭṭhaṃ pāpuṇanto imesaṃyeva dvinnaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthāya pāpuṇāti. nakulapitā kira pañca jātisatāni tathāgatassa pitā ahosi, pañca jātisatāni mahāpitā, pañca jātisatāni cūḷapitā. nakulamātāpi pañca jātisatāni tathāgatassa mātā ahosi, pañca jātisatāni mahāmātā, pañca jātisatāni cūḷamātā. te satthu diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya puttasinehaṃ paṭilabhitvā ``hantāta, hantātā''ti vacchakaṃ disvā vacchagiddhinī gāvī viya viravamānā upasaṅkamitvā paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpannā jātā. nivesane ^a^P3.0096^ea^ pañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āsanāni sadā paññattāneva honti. iti bhagavā tesaṃ anuggaṇhanatthāya upasaṅkami. ^b^aticaritā^eb^ti atikkamitā. ^b^abhisamparāyañcā^eb^ti paraloke ca. ^b^samasaddhā^eb^ti saddhāya samā ekasadisā. ^b^sīlā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo. chaṭṭhaṃ kevalaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ desitaṃ. sesamettha tādisameva.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^pajjanika^eb^nti tassa nigamassa nāmaṃ. ^b^koliyāna^eb^nti kolarājakulānaṃ. ^b^āyuṃ kho pana datvā^eb^ti āyudānaṃ datvā. ^b^āyussa bhāginī hotī^eb^ti āyubhāgapaṭilābhinī hoti, āyuṃ vā bhajanikā hoti, āyuppaṭilābhinīti attho. sesapadesupi eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^rasasā upeta^eb^nti rasena upetaṃ rasasampannaṃ. ^b^ujjugatesū^eb^ti kāyavaṅkādirahitattā ujukameva gatesu khīṇāsavesu. ^b^caraṇūpapannesū^eb^ti pañcadasahi caraṇadhammehi samannāgatesu. ^b^mahaggatesū^eb^ti mahattaṃ gatesu. khīṇāsavānaññevetaṃ nāmaṃ. ^b^puññena puññaṃ saṃsandamānā^eb^ti puññena saddhiṃ puññaṃ ghaṭayamānā. ^b^mahapphalā lokavidūna vaṇṇitā^eb^ti evarūpā dānasaṅkhātā dakkhiṇā tividhalokaṃ viditaṃ katvā ṭhitattā lokavidūnaṃ buddhānaṃ vaṇṇitā, buddhehi pasatthāti attho. ^b^yaññamanussarantā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0097^ea^ yaññaṃ dānaṃ anussarantā. ^b^vedajātā^eb^ti tuṭṭhijātā.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^V2.0304^ea^ ^a^M2.0312^ea^ ^b^saññatāna^eb^nti kāyavācāhi saṃyatānaṃ. ^b^paradattabhojina^eb^nti parehi dinnameva bhuñjitvā yāpentānaṃ. ^b^kālenā^eb^ti yuttappattakālena. ^b^sakkacca dadātī^eb^ti sahatthā sakkāraṃ katvā dadāti. ^b^cattāri ṭhānāni anuppavecchatī^eb^ti cattāri kāraṇāni anuppaveseti dadāti. ^b^yasavā hotī^eb^ti mahāparivāro hoti. navamaṃ kevalaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kathitaṃ. sesamettha tādisameva.

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^gihisāmīcipaṭipada^eb^nti gihīnaṃ anucchavikaṃ paṭipattiṃ. ^b^paccupaṭṭhito hotī^eb^ti atiharitvā dātukāmatāya patiupaṭṭhito hoti upagato, bhikkhusaṅghassa cīvaraṃ detīti attho.

[03] ^b^upaṭṭhitā^eb^ti upaṭṭhāyako. ^b^tesaṃ divā ca ratto cā^eb^ti ye evaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahanti, tesaṃ divā ca rattiñca pariccāgavasena ca anussaraṇavasena ca sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati. ^b^saggañca kamatiṭṭhāna^eb^nti tādiso ca bhaddakaṃ kammaṃ katvā saggaṭṭhānaṃ upagacchati. imesu catūsupi suttesu āgāriyapaṭipadā kathitā. sotāpannasakadāgāmīnampi vaṭṭati.
[06] puññābhisandavaggo paṭhamo.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ dutiyassa ^a^V2.0305^ea^ ^a^P3.0098^ea^ paṭhame aniṭṭhapaṭikkhepena ^b^iṭṭhā^eb^. mane kamanti pavisantīti ^b^kantā^eb^. manaṃ appāyanti pavaḍḍhentīti ^b^manāpā. dullabhā^eb^ti paramadullabhā. ^b^bhogā^eb^ti bhuñjitabbā rūpādayo visayā. ^b^sahadhammenā^eb^ti dhammeneva saddhiṃ uppajjantu, mā dhammūpaghātaṃ katvā adhammenāti. athavā ^b^sahadhammenā^eb^ti sakāraṇena, tena tena senāpatiseṭṭhiṭṭhānādikāraṇena saddhiṃyeva uppajjantūti attho. ^b^yaso^eb^ti parivārasampatti. ^b^saha^eb^ ^a^M2.0313^ea^ ^b^ñātībhī^eb^ti ñātakehi saddhiṃ. ^b^saha upajjhāyehī^eb^ti sukhadukkhesu upanijjhāyitabbattā upajjhāyasaṅkhātehi sandiṭṭhasambhattehi saddhiṃ.

[03] ^b^akiccaṃ karotī^eb^ti akātabbaṃ karoti. ^b^kiccaṃ aparādhetī^eb^ti kattabbayuttakaṃ kiccaṃ akaronto taṃ aparādheti nāma. ^b^dhaṃsatī^eb^ti patati parihāyati. ^b^abhijjhāvisamalobha^eb^nti abhijjhāsaṅkhātaṃ visamalobhaṃ. ^b^pajahatī^eb^ti nudati nīharati. ^b^mahāpañño^eb^ti mahantapañño. ^b^puthupañño^eb^ti puthulapañño. ^b^āpātadaso^eb^ti taṃ taṃ atthaṃ āpāteti tameva passati, sukhumampissa atthajātaṃ āpātaṃ āgacchatiyevāti attho.

[03] ^b^uṭṭhānavīriyādhigatehī^eb^ti ^a^P3.0099^ea^ uṭṭhānasaṅkhātena vīriyena adhigatehi. ^b^bāhābalaparicitehī^eb^ti bāhābalena paricitehi vaḍḍhitehi. ^b^sedāvakkhittehī^eb^ti avakkhittasedehi, sedaṃ muñcitvā vāyāmena payogena samadhigatehīti attho. ^b^dhammikehī^eb^ti dhammayuttehi. ^b^dhammaladdhehī^eb^ti dasakusalakammapathadhamme akopetvā laddhehi. ^b^pattakammānī^eb^ti yuttakammāni anucchavikakammāni. ^b^sukhetī^eb^ti sukhitaṃ karoti. ^b^pīṇetī^eb^ti pīṇitaṃ balasampannaṃ karoti. ^b^ṭhānagataṃ hotī^eb^ti kāraṇagataṃ hoti. kiṃ pana tanti? catūsu pattakammesu ekaṃ bhogehi kattabbakammaṃ bhogajātameva ṭhānagataṃ. ^b^pattagata^eb^nti yuttappattaṭṭhānagataṃ. ^b^āyatanaso paribhutta^eb^nti kāraṇeneva paribhuttaṃ bhogajātaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^pariyodhāya^eb^ ^a^V2.0306^ea^ ^b^saṃvattatī^eb^ti pidahitvā vattati. yathā aggiādīhi uppannāsu āpadāsu, evaṃ ādittagehanibbāpanādīnaṃ atthāya dhanapariccāgaṃ katvā tāsaṃ āpadānaṃ maggaṃ pidahati nivāreti. ^b^sotthiṃ attānaṃ karotī^eb^ti nirupaddavaṃ khemaṃ attānaṃ karoti. ^b^ñātibali^eb^nti ñātakānaṃ baliṃ. ^b^atithibali^eb^nti āgantukānaṃ baliṃ. ^b^pubbapetabali^eb^nti ^a^P3.0100^ea^ paralokagatānaṃ ñātakānaṃ baliṃ. ^b^rājabali^eb^nti rañño kattabbayuttakaṃ rājabaliṃ. ^b^devatābali^eb^nti devatānaṃ kattabbabaliṃ. sabbametaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ yathānucchavikavasena dātabbadānassa adhivacanaṃ.

[03] ^b^khantisoracce niviṭṭhā^eb^ti adhivāsanakkhantiyañca susīlatāya ca niviṭṭhā. ^b^ekamattānaṃ damentī^eb^ti ekaṃ attanova attabhāvaṃ indriyadamena damenti. ^b^samentī^eb^ti attano cittaṃ kilesavūpasamanena samenti. ^b^parinibbāpentī^eb^ti kilesaparinibbāneneva ^a^M2.0314^ea^ parinibbāpenti. ^b^uddhaggika^eb^ntiādīsu uparūparibhūmīsu phaladānavasena uddhamaggamassāti ^b^uddhaggikā^eb^. saggassa hitāti tatrupapattijananato ^b^sovaggikā^eb^. nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne sukhova vipāko assāti ^b^sukhavipākā^eb^. suṭṭhu aggānaṃ dibbavaṇṇādīnaṃ dasannaṃ visesānaṃ nibbattanato ^b^saggasaṃvattanikā,^eb^ evarūpaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ patiṭṭhāpetīti attho.

[03] ^b^ariyadhamme ṭhito^eb^ti pañcasīladhamme patiṭṭhito. ^b^pecca sagge pamodatī^eb^ti paralokaṃ gantvā yattha sagge paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhāti, tattha modati. sotāpannasakadāgāmino vā hontu anāgāmī vā, sabbesaṃ ayaṃ paṭipadā labbhatevāti.

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^P3.0101^ea^ ^b^adhigamanīyānī^eb^ti pattabbāni. ^b^kāmabhoginā^eb^ti vatthukāme ca kilesakāme ca paribhuñjantena. ^b^atthisukhā^eb^dīsu atthīti uppajjanakasukhaṃ ^b^atthisukhaṃ^eb^ nāma. bhoge paribhuñjantassa uppajjanakasukhaṃ ^b^bhogasukhaṃ^eb^ nāma. anaṇosmīti uppajjanakasukhaṃ ^b^ānaṇyasukhaṃ^eb^ nāma. niddoso anavajjosmīti uppajjanakasukhaṃ ^b^anavajjasukhaṃ^eb^ nāma.

[03] ^b^bhuñja^eb^nti bhuñjamāno. ^b^paññā vipassatī^eb^ti paññāya vipassati. ^b^ubho bhāge^eb^ti dve koṭṭhāse, heṭṭhimāni tīṇi ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ, anavajjasukhaṃ ekaṃ koṭṭhāsanti evaṃ paññāya passamāno ^a^V2.0307^ea^ dve koṭṭhāse jānātīti attho. ^b^anavajjasukhasseta^eb^nti etaṃ tividhampi sukhaṃ anavajjasukhassa soḷasiṃ kalaṃ nāgghatīti.
[03] 63^b^.^eb^ tatiyaṃ tikanipāte vaṇṇitameva. ^b^sapubbadevatānī^eb^ti padamattameva ettha visesoti. catutthe sabbaṃ uttānatthameva.

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ pañcame rūpe pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno ^b^rūpappamāṇo^eb^ nāma. ^b^rūpappasanno^eb^ti tasseva atthavacanaṃ. ghose pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno ^b^ghosappamāṇo^eb^ ^a^M2.0315^ea^ nāma. cīvaralūkhapattalūkhesu pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno ^b^lūkhappamāṇo^eb^ nāma. dhamme pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno ^b^dhammappamāṇo^eb^ nāma. itarāni tesaṃyeva atthavacanāni. sabbasatte ^a^P3.0102^ea^ ca tayo koṭṭhāse katvā dve koṭṭhāsā rūpappamāṇā, eko na rūpappamāṇo. pañca koṭṭhāse katvā cattāro koṭṭhāsā ghosappamāṇā, eko na ghosappamāṇo. dasa koṭṭhāse katvā nava koṭṭhāsā lūkhappamāṇā, eko na lūkhappamāṇo. satasahassaṃ koṭṭhāse katvā pana eko koṭṭhāsova dhammappamāṇo, sesā na dhammappamāṇāti veditabbā.

[03] ^b^rūpe pamāṇiṃsū^eb^ti ye rūpaṃ disvā pasannā, te rūpe pamāṇiṃsu nāma, pasīdiṃsūti attho. ^b^ghosena anvagū^eb^ti ghosena anugatā, ghosappamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasannāti attho. ^b^chandarāgavasūpetā^eb^ti chandassa ca rāgassa ca vasaṃ upetā. ^b^ajjhattañca na jānātī^eb^ti niyakajjhatte tassa guṇaṃ na jānāti. ^b^bahiddhā ca na passatī^eb^ti bahiddhāpissa paṭipattiṃ na passati. ^b^samantāvaraṇo^eb^ti samantato āvārito, samantā vā āvaraṇamassāti samantāvaraṇo. ^b^ghosena vuyhatī^eb^ti ghosena niyati, na guṇena. ^b^ajjhattañca na jānāti, bahiddhā ca vipassatī^eb^ti niyakajjhatte guṇaṃ na jānāti, bahiddhā panassa paṭipattiṃ passati. ^b^bahiddhā phaladassāvī^eb^ti tassa parehi kataṃ bahiddhā sakkāraphalaṃ passanto. ^b^vinīvaraṇadassāvī^eb^ti vivaṭadassāvī. ^b^na so ghosena vuyhatī^eb^ti so ghosena na nīyati.

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^V2.0308^ea^ ^b^mohajaṃ cāpaviddasū^eb^ti mohajaṃ cāpi aviddasū apaṇḍitā. ^b^savighāta^eb^nti ^a^P3.0103^ea^ sadukkhaṃ. ^b^dukhudraya^eb^nti āyatiñca dukkhavaḍḍhidāyakaṃ. ^b^acakkhukā^eb^ti paññācakkhurahitā. ^b^yathā dhammā tathā santā^eb^ti yathā rāgādayo dhammā ṭhitā, tathā sabhāvāva hutvā. ^b^na tassevanti maññare^eb^ti mayaṃ evaṃsantā evaṃsabhāvāti tassa na maññare, na maññantīti attho. imasmiṃ suttepi gāthāsupi vaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.

[03] 67^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^M2.0316^ea^ ^b^imāni cattāri ahirājakulānī^eb^ti idaṃ daṭṭhavisāneva sandhāya vuttaṃ. ye hi keci daṭṭhavisā, sabbete imesaṃ catunnaṃ ahirājakulānaṃ abbhantaragatāva honti. ^b^attaguttiyā^eb^ti attano guttatthāya. ^b^attarakkhāyā^eb^ti attano rakkhaṇatthāya. ^b^attaparittāyā^eb^ti attano parittāṇatthāya. parittaṃ nāma anujānāmīti attho.

[03] idāni yathā taṃ parittaṃ kātabbaṃ, taṃ dassento ^b^virūpakkhehi me^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^virūpakkhehī^eb^ti virūpakkhanāgakulehi. sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^apādakehī^eb^ti apādakasattehi. sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^sabbe sattā^eb^ti ito pubbe ettakena ṭhānena odissakamettaṃ kathetvā idāni anodissakamettaṃ kathetuṃ idamāraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^sattā pāṇā bhūtā^eb^ti sabbānetāni puggalavevacanāneva. ^b^bhadrāni passantū^eb^ti bhadrāni ārammaṇāni passantu. ^b^mā kañci pāpamāgamā^eb^ti kañci sattaṃ pāpakaṃ lāmakaṃ mā āgacchatu. ^b^appamāṇo buddho^eb^ti ettha ^b^buddho^eb^ti buddhaguṇā veditabbā. te hi appamāṇā nāma. sesapadadvayepi ^a^P3.0104^ea^ eseva nayo. ^b^pamāṇavantānī^eb^ti guṇappamāṇena yuttāni. ^b^uṇṇanābhī^eb^ti lomasanābhiko makkaṭako. ^b^sarabū^eb^ti gharagolikā. ^b^katā me rakkhā, katā me parittā^eb^ti mayā ettakassa janassa rakkhā ca parittāṇañca kataṃ. ^b^paṭikkamantu bhūtānī^eb^ti sabbepi me kataparittāṇā sattā apagacchantu, mā maṃ viheṭhayiṃsūti attho.

[03] 68^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^V2.0309^ea^ ^b^acirapakkante devadatte^eb^ti saṅghaṃ bhinditvā nacirapakkante. ^b^parābhavāyā^eb^ti avaḍḍhiyā vināsāya. ^b^assatarī^eb^ti vaḷavāya kucchismiṃ gadrabhassa jātā. ^b^attavadhāya gabbhaṃ gaṇhātī^eb^ti taṃ assena saddhiṃ sampayojenti, sā gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā kāle sampatte vijāyituṃ nasakkontī pādehi bhūmiṃ paharantī tiṭṭhati. athassā cattāro pāde catūsu khāṇūsu bandhitvā kucchiṃ phāletvā potakaṃ nīharanti. sā tattheva marati. tenetaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^M2.0317^ea^ kilesānaṃ saṃvaratthāya pavesanadvāraṃ pidahanatthāya padhānaṃ ^b^saṃvarappadhānaṃ,^eb^ pajahanatthāya padhānaṃ ^b^pahānappadhānaṃ,^eb^ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ brūhanatthāya vaḍḍhanatthāya padhānaṃ ^b^bhāvanāppadhānaṃ,^eb^ tesaṃyeva anurakkhaṇatthāya padhānaṃ ^b^anurakkhaṇāppadhānaṃ^eb^.

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^P3.0105^ea^ ^b^adhammikā hontī^eb^ti porāṇakarājūhi ṭhapitaṃ dasabhāgabaliñceva aparādhānurūpañca daṇḍaṃ aggahetvā atirekabalino ceva atirekadaṇḍassa ca gahaṇena adhammikā. ^b^rājāyuttā^eb^ti rañño janapadesu kiccasaṃvidhāyakā āyuttakapurisā. ^b^brāhmaṇagahapatikā^eb^ti antonagaravāsino brāhmaṇagahapatayo. ^b^negamajānapadā^eb^ti nigamavāsino ceva janapadavāsino ca. ^b^visama^eb^nti visamā hutvā, asamayena vāyantīti attho. ^b^visamā^eb^ti na samā, atithaddhā vā atimudukā vāti attho. ^b^apañjasā^eb^ti maggato apagatā, ummaggagāmino hutvā vāyantīti attho. ^b^devatā parikupitā bhavantī^eb^ti vātesu hi visamesu apañjasesu vāyantesu rukkhā bhijjanti, vimānāni bhijjanti. tasmā devatā parikupitā bhavanti, tā devassa sammā vassituṃ na denti. tena vuttaṃ ^b^devo na sammā dhāraṃ anuppavecchatī^eb^ti. ^b^visamapākāni sassāni bhavantī^eb^ti ekasmiṃ ṭhāne gabbhīni honti, ekasmiṃ sañjātakhīrāni, ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ paccatīti evaṃ visamaṃ pākāni sassāni bhavanti.

[03] ^b^samaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0310^ea^ ^b^nakkhattāni tārakarūpāni parivattantī^eb^ti yathā kattikapuṇṇamā kattikanakkhattameva labhati, migasirapuṇṇamā migasiranakkhattamevāti evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ^a^P3.0106^ea^ māse sā sā puṇṇamā taṃ taṃ nakkhattameva labhati, tathā sammā parivattanti. ^b^samaṃ vātā vāyantī^eb^ti avisamā hutvā samayasmiṃyeva vāyanti, cha māse uttarā vātā, cha māsedakkhiṇāti evaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ janapadānaṃ anurūpe samaye vāyanti. ^b^samā^eb^ti samappavattino nātithaddhā nātimudū. ^b^pañjasā^eb^ti maggappaṭipannā, maggeneva vāyanti, no amaggenāti attho.

[03] ^b^jimhaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0318^ea^ ^b^gacchatī^eb^ti kuṭilaṃ gacchati, atitthaṃ gaṇhāti. ^b^nette jimhaṃ gate satī^eb^ti nayatīti nettā. tasmiṃ nette jimhaṃ gate kuṭilaṃ gantvā atitthaṃ gaṇhante itarāpi atitthameva gaṇhantīti attho. netetipi pāṭho. ^b^dukkhaṃ setī^eb^ti dukkhaṃ sayati, dukkhitaṃ hotīti attho.
[06] pattakammavaggo dutiyo.

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ tatiyavaggassa ^a^V2.0311^ea^ paṭhame ^b^apaṇṇakappaṭipada^eb^nti aviraddhappaṭipadaṃ. ^b^yoni cassa āraddhā hotī^eb^ti kāraṇañcassa paripuṇṇaṃ hoti. ^b^āsavānaṃ khayāyā^eb^ti arahattatthāya. dutiyaṃ uttānameva.

[03] 73^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^avaṇṇo^eb^ti aguṇo. ^b^pātu^eb^ ^a^P3.0107^ea^ ^b^karotī^eb^ti katheti, pākaṭaṃ karoti. ^b^pañhābhinīto^eb^ti pañhatthāya abhinīto. ^b^ahāpetvā alambitvā^eb^ti aparihīnaṃ alambitaṃ katvā. ettha ca asappuriso pāpicchatāya attano avaṇṇaṃ chādeti, sappuriso lajjitāya attano vaṇṇaṃ. idāni yasmā asappuriso hirottapparahito saṃvāsena avajānāti, sappuriso pana hirottappasamannāgato saṃvāsenāpi nāvajānāti. tasmā asappurisabhāvasādhakaṃ adhunāgatavadhukopammaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, vadhukā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^vadhukā^eb^ti suṇisā. ^b^tibba^eb^nti bahalaṃ. sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.

[03] 74-75^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^sīlagga^eb^nti aggappattaṃ uttamasīlaṃ. eseva nayo sabbattha. pañcame ^b^rūpagga^eb^nti yaṃ rūpaṃ sammasitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, idaṃ rūpaggaṃ nāma. sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^bhavagga^eb^nti ettha pana yasmiṃ attabhāve ṭhito arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, etaṃ bhavaggaṃ nāmāti.

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^V2.0312^ea^ ^a^M2.0319^ea^ ^b^upavattane^eb^ti pācīnagatāya sālapantiyā uttarena nivattitvā ṭhitāya vemajjhaṭṭhāne. ^b^antarena yamakasālāna^eb^nti dvinnaṃ sālarukkhānaṃ antare. ^b^kaṅkhā^eb^ti dveḷhakaṃ. ^b^vimatī^eb^ti vinicchituṃ asamatthatā. ``buddho nu kho na buddho nu kho, dhammo nu kho na dhammo nu kho, saṅgho nu kho na saṅgho nu kho, maggo nu kho na maggo nu kho, paṭipadā nu kho na paṭipadā nu kho''ti ^a^P3.0108^ea^ yassa saṃsayo uppajjeyya, taṃ vo vadāmi pucchatha, bhikkhaveti ayamettha saṅkhepattho. ^b^satthugāravenapi na puccheyyāthā^eb^ti ``mayaṃ satthu santike pabbajimha, cattāro paccayāpi no satthu santakāva. te mayaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ kaṅkhaṃ akatvā na arahāma ajja pacchime kāle kaṅkhaṃ kātu''nti sace evaṃ satthari gāravena na pucchatha. ^b^sahāyakopi, bhikkhave, sahāyakassa ārocetū^eb^ti tumhākaṃ yo yassa bhikkhussa sandiṭṭho sambhatto, so tassa ārocetu, ahaṃ ekassa bhikkhussa kathessāmi, tassa kathaṃ sutvā sabbe nikkaṅkhā bhavathāti dasseti. ^b^evaṃ pasanno^eb^ti evaṃ saddahāmi ahanti attho. ^b^ñāṇamevā^eb^ti nikkaṅkhabhāvapaccakkhakaraṇañāṇaṃyeva ettha tathāgatassa, na saddhāmattanti attho. ^b^imesañhi, ānandā^eb^ti imesaṃ antosāṇiyaṃ nisinnānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ. ^b^yo pacchimako^eb^ti yo guṇavasena pacchimako, ānandattheraṃyeva sandhāyāha.

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^acinteyyānī^eb^ti cintetuṃ ayuttāni. ^b^na cintetabbānī^eb^ti acinteyyattāyeva na cintetabbāni. ^b^yāni cintento^eb^ti yāni kāraṇāni cintento. ^b^ummādassā^eb^ti ummattakabhāvassa. ^b^vighātassā^eb^ti dukkhassa. ^b^buddhavisayo^eb^ti buddhānaṃ visayo, sabbaññutaññāṇādīnaṃ buddhaguṇānaṃ pavatti ca ānubhāvo ca. ^b^jhānavisayo^eb^ti abhiññājhānavisayo. ^b^kammavipāko^eb^ti ^a^P3.0109^ea^ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyādīnaṃ kammānaṃ vipāko. ^b^lokacintā^eb^ti ``kena nu kho candimasūriyā katā, kena mahāpathavī, kena mahāsamuddo, kena sattā uppāditā, kena pabbatā, kena ambatālanāḷikerādayo''ti evarūpā lokacintā.

[03] 78^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^V2.0313^ea^ ^a^M2.0320^ea^ ^b^dakkhiṇāvisuddhiyo^eb^ti dānasaṅkhātāya dakkhiṇāya visujjhanakāraṇāni. ^b^dāyakato visujjhatī^eb^ti mahapphalabhāvena visujjhati, mahapphalā hotīti attho. ^b^kalyāṇadhammo^eb^ti sucidhammo. ^b^pāpadhammo^eb^ti lāmakadhammo. ^b^dāyakato visujjhatī^eb^ti ettha vessantaramahārājā kathetabbo. so hi jūjakabrāhmaṇassa dārake datvā mahāpathaviṃ kampesi. ^b^paṭiggāhakato visujjhatī^eb^ti ettha kalyāṇīnadīmukhadvāravāsī kevaṭṭo kathetabbo. so kira dīghasumattherassa tikkhattuṃ piṇḍapātaṃ datvā maraṇamañce nipanno ``ayyassa maṃ dīghasumattherassa dinnapiṇḍapāto uddharatī''ti āha. ^b^neva dāyakato^eb^ti ettha vaḍḍhamānavāsī luddako kathetabbo. so kira petadakkhiṇaṃ dento ekassa dussīlasseva tayo vāre adāsi. tatiyavāre ``amanusso dussīlo maṃ vilumpatī''ti viravi. ekassa sīlavato bhikkhuno datvā pāpitakāleyevassa pāpuṇi. ^b^dāyakato ceva visujjhati paṭiggāhakato cā^eb^ti ettha asadisadānaṃ kathetabbanti.

[03] 79^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^P3.0110^ea^ ^b^tādisā vā^eb^ti taṃsadisāva taṃsarikkhakāva. ^b^chedagāminī hotī^eb^ti chedaṃ gacchati. yaṃ patthitaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ nassatīti attho. ^b^na yathādhippāyā hotī^eb^ti yathājjhāsayā na hoti. ^b^parādhippāyā hotī^eb^ti parajjhāsayā ajjhāsayato adhikataraphalā hoti. ^b^samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā^eb^ti ettha samitapāpabāhitapāpatāhi samaṇabrāhmaṇatā veditabbā. ^b^vadatu, bhante, paccayenā^eb^ti, bhante, catubbidhena cīvarādinā paccayena vadeyyāsīti evaṃ pavāreti nimanteti. ^b^yena pavāretī^eb^ti paricchinditvā yattakena pavāreti. ^b^taṃ na detī^eb^ti taṃ sabbasova na deti.^b^ na yathādhippāyaṃ detī^eb^ti yathā tassa ajjhāsayo, evaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti, hāpetvā appakaṃ deti. ^b^yathādhippāyaṃ detī^eb^ti yattakaṃ so icchati, tattakameva deti. ^b^parādhippāyaṃ detī^eb^ti appakaṃ pavāretvā avattharitvā bahuṃ deti.

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^M2.0321^ea^ ^b^neva sabhāyaṃ nisīdatī^eb^ti vinicchayakaraṇatthaṃ vinicchayasabhāyaṃ neva nisīdati ^a^V2.0314^ea^. ^b^na kammantaṃ payojetī^eb^ti kasivaṇijjādimahākammantaṃ nappayojeti. ^b^na kambojaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti bhoge sambharaṇatthāya kambojaraṭṭhaṃ na gacchati. desanāmattameva cetaṃ, yaṃ kiñci tiroraṭṭhaṃ na gacchatīti attho. ^b^kodhano^eb^tiādīsu kodhanatāya kodhapariyuṭṭhito atthānatthaṃ na jānāti, issukitāya parasampattiṃ na sahati, maccharitāya ^a^P3.0111^ea^ dhanaṃ datvā kiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, nippaññatāya kiccaṃ saṃvidhātuṃ na sakkoti. tasmā etāni sabhānisīdanādīni na karotīti.
[06] apaṇṇakavaggo tatiyo.

[03] 81-85^b^.^eb^ catutthassa ^a^V2.0315^ea^ paṭhamādīni uttānatthāneva. pañcame ``nīce kule paccājāto''tiādikena tamena yuttoti ^b^tamo^eb^. kāyaduccaritādīhi puna nirayatamūpagamanato ^b^tamaparāyaṇo^eb^. iti ubhayenapi khandhatamova kathito hoti. ``aḍḍhe kule paccājāto''tiādikena jotinā yuttato ^b^joti,^eb^ ālokabhūtoti vuttaṃ hoti. kāyasucaritādīhi puna sagguppattijotibhāvūpagamanato ^b^jotiparāyaṇo^eb^. iminā nayena itarepi dve veditabbā.

[03] ^b^venakule^eb^ti vilīvakārakule. ^b^nesādakule^eb^ti migaluddakādīnaṃ kule. ^b^rathakārakule^eb^ti cammakārakule. ^b^pukkusakule^eb^ti pupphachaḍḍakakule. ^b^kasiravuttike^eb^ti dukkhavuttike. ^b^dubbaṇṇo^eb^ti ^a^P3.0112^ea^ paṃsupisācako viya jhāmakhāṇuvaṇṇo. ^b^duddasiko^eb^ti vijātamātuyāpi amanāpadassano. ^b^okoṭimako^eb^ti lakuṇḍako. ^b^kāṇo^eb^ti ekacchikāṇo vā ubhayacchikāṇo vā. ^b^kuṇī^eb^ti ekahatthakuṇī vā ubhayahatthakuṇī vā. ^b^khañjo^eb^ti ekapādakhañjo vā ubhayapādakhañjo vā. ^b^pakkhahato^eb^ti hatapakkho pīṭhasappī ^a^M2.0322^ea^. ^b^padīpeyyassā^eb^ti telakapallādino dīpaupakaraṇassa. ^b^evaṃ kho, bhikkhave^eb^ti ettha eko puggalo bahiddhā ālokaṃ adisvā mātu kucchimhiyeva kālaṃ katvā apāyesu nibbattanto sakalampi kappaṃ saṃsarati. sopi tamotamaparāyaṇova. so pana kuhakapuggalo bhaveyya. kuhakassa hi evarūpā nipphatti hotīti vuttaṃ.

[03] ettha ca ``nīce kule''tiādīhi āgamanavipatti ceva paccuppannapaccayavipatti ca dassitā. ``dalidde''tiādīhi pavattapaccayavipatti, ``kasiravuttike''tiādīhi ājīvupāyavipatti, ``dubbaṇṇo''tiādīhi attabhāvavipatti, ``bahvābādho''tiādīhi dukkhakāraṇasamāyogo, ``na lābhī''tiādīhi sukhakāraṇavipatti ceva upabhogavipatti ca, ``kāyena duccarita''ntiādīhi tamaparāyaṇabhāvassa kāraṇasamāyogo, ``kāyassa bhedā''tiādīhi samparāyikatamūpagamo. sukkapakkho vuttapaṭipakkhanayena veditabbo.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^V2.0316^ea^ ^b^oṇatoṇato^eb^ti idāni nīcako āyatimpi nīcako bhavissati. ^b^oṇatuṇṇato^eb^ti idāni nīco āyatiṃ ucco bhavissati. ^b^uṇṇatoṇato^eb^ti idāni ucco āyatiṃ nīco bhavissati. ^b^uṇṇatuṇṇato^eb^ti ^a^P3.0113^ea^ idāni ucco āyatimpi ucco bhavissati. vitthāro pana nesaṃ purimasuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^samaṇamacalo^eb^ti samaṇācalo, makāro padasandhikaro, niccalasamaṇoti attho. iminā sattavidhampi sekhaṃ dasseti. so hi sāsane mūlajātāya saddhāya patiṭṭhitattā acalo nāma. ^b^samaṇapuṇḍarīko^eb^ti puṇḍarīkasadiso samaṇo. puṇḍarīkaṃ nāma ūnasatapattaṃ saroruhaṃ. iminā sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavaṃ dasseti. so hi jhānābhiññānaṃ abhāvena aparipuṇṇaguṇattā samaṇapuṇḍarīko nāma hoti. ^b^samaṇapadumo^eb^ti padumasadiso samaṇo. padumaṃ nāma paripuṇṇasatapattaṃ saroruhaṃ. iminā ubhatobhāgavimuttaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ dasseti. so hi jhānābhiññānaṃ bhāvena paripuṇṇaguṇattā samaṇapadumo nāma hoti ^a^M2.0323^ea^. ^b^samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo^eb^ti sabbesupi etesu samaṇesu sukhumālasamaṇo muducittasarīro kāyikacetasikadukkharahito ekantasukhī. etena attānañceva attasadise ca dasseti.

[03] evaṃ mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā idāni paṭipāṭiyā vibhajanto ^b^kathañca, bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^sekho^eb^ti sattavidhopi sekho. ^b^pāṭipado^eb^ti paṭipannako. ^b^anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ patthayamāno viharatī^eb^ti arahattaṃ patthayanto viharati. ^b^muddhāvasittassā^eb^ti muddhani avasittassa, katābhisekassāti attho. ^b^ābhiseko^eb^ti abhisekaṃ kātuṃ yutto. ^b^anabhisitto^eb^ti ^a^P3.0114^ea^ na tāva abhisitto. ^b^macalappatto^eb^ti rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa puttabhāvena ceva puttesu jeṭṭhakabhāvena ca na tāva abhisittabhāvena ca abhisekappattiatthāya acalappatto niccalapatto. makāro nipātamattaṃ. ^b^kāyena phusitvā^eb^ti nāmakāyena phusitvā.

[03] ^b^yācitova bahulaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjatī^eb^ti ``idaṃ, bhante, paribhuñjathā''ti evaṃ dāyakehi yācamāneheva ^a^V2.0317^ea^ upanītaṃ cīvaraṃ bahuṃ paribhuñjati, kiñcideva ayācitaṃ, bākulatthero viya. piṇḍapātaṃ khadiravanamagge sīvalitthero viya. senāsanaṃ aṭṭhakanāgarasutte (ma0 ni0 2.17 ādayo; a0 ni0 11.16 ādayo) ānandatthero viya. gilānapaccayaṃ pilindavacchathero viya. ^b^tyassā^eb^ti te assa. ^b^manāpenevā^eb^ti manaṃ allīyanakena. ^b^samudācarantī^eb^ti kattabbakiccāni karonti pavattanti vā. ^b^upahāraṃ upaharantī^eb^ti kāyikacetasikaupahāraṃ upaharanti upanīyanti. ^b^sannipātikānī^eb^ti tiṇṇampi sannipātena nibbattāni. ^b^utupariṇāmajānī^eb^ti utupariṇāmato atisītātiuṇhaututo jātāni. ^b^visamaparihārajānī^eb^ti accāsanātiṭṭhānādikā visamaparihārato jātāni. ^b^opakkamikānī^eb^ti vadhabandhanādiupakkamena nibbattāni. ^b^kammavipākajānī^eb^ti ^a^P3.0115^ea^ vināpi imehi kāraṇehi kevalaṃ pubbe katakammavipākavaseneva jātāni. ^b^catunnaṃ jhānāna^eb^nti ettha khīṇāsavānampi buddhānampi kiriyajjhānāneva adhippetāni. sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame sāsane laddhappatiṭṭhattā sotāpannova ^b^samaṇamacalo^eb^ti vutto, nātibahuguṇattā na bahupattaṃ viya saroruhaṃ sakadāgāmī ^a^M2.0324^ea^ ^b^samaṇapuṇḍarīko^eb^ti, tato bahutaraguṇattā satapattaṃ viya saroruhaṃ anāgāmī ^b^samaṇapadumo^eb^ti, thaddhabhāvakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ sabbaso samucchinnattā mudubhāvappatto khīṇāsavo ^b^samaṇasukhumālo^eb^ti.

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^sammādiṭṭhiko^eb^tiādīhi aṭṭhaṅgikamaggavasena paṭhamasutte viya satta sekhā gahitā. dutiyavāre dasaṅgikamaggavasena vā arahattaphalañāṇārahattaphalavimuttīhi saddhiṃ, aṭṭhaṅgikamaggavasena vā sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavo kathito, tatiyavāre ubhatobhāgavimutto, catutthavāre tathāgato ca tathāgatasadisakhīṇāsavo cāti. iti idaṃ suttaṃ paṭhamasutte kathitapuggalānaṃ vaseneva kathitaṃ, desanāmattameva panettha nānanti.

[03] 90^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^V2.0318^ea^ paṭhamavāre arahattatthāya payogaṃ anārabhitvā ṭhito pamādavihārī sekhapuggalo kathito. dutiyavāre anuppāditajjhāno āraddhavipassako appamādavihārī sekhapuggalo kathito. tatiyavāre āraddhavipassako appamādavihārī aṭṭhavimokkhalābhī sekhapuggalo kathito, catutthavāre paramasukhumālakhīṇāsavoti.
[06] macalavaggo catuttho.
[03] 91^b^.^eb^ pañcamassa ^a^V2.0319^ea^ ^a^P3.0116^ea^ paṭhame ^b^asuro^eb^ti asurasadiso bībhaccho. ^b^devo^eb^ti devasadiso guṇavasena abhirūpo pāsādiko.

[03] 92^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^M2.0325^ea^ ^b^ajjhattaṃ cetosamathassā^eb^ti niyakajjhatte appanācittasamādhissa. ^b^adhipaññādhammavipassanāyā^eb^ti saṅkhārapariggāhakavipassanāñāṇassa. tañhi adhipaññāsaṅkhātañca, pañcakkhandhasaṅkhātesu ca dhammesu vipassanābhūtaṃ, tasmā ``adhipaññādhammavipassanā''ti vuccatīti.

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^yogo karaṇīyo^eb^ti yuttappayuttatā kattabbā. ^b^chando^eb^ti kattukamyatāchando. ^b^vāyāmo^eb^ti payogo. ^b^ussāho^eb^ti tato adhimattataraṃ vīriyaṃ. ^b^ussoḷhī^eb^ti paṅkalaggasakaṭauddharaṇasadisaṃ mahāvīriyaṃ. ^b^appaṭivānī^eb^ti anivattanatā.

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^evaṃ kho, āvuso, saṅkhārā daṭṭhabbā^eb^tiādīsu, āvuso, saṅkhārā nāma aniccato daṭṭhabbā, aniccato sammasitabbā, aniccato passitabbā. tathā dukkhato, anattatoti evaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^evaṃ kho, āvuso, cittaṃ saṇṭhapetabba^eb^ntiādīsupi paṭhamajjhānavasena, āvuso, cittaṃ saṇṭhapetabbaṃ paṭhamajjhānavasena sannisādetabbaṃ, paṭhamajjhānavasena ^a^V2.0320^ea^ ekodi kātabbaṃ, paṭhamajjhānavasena samādahitabbaṃ. tathā dutiyajjhānādivasenāti evaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo. imesu tīsupi suttesu samathavipassanā lokiyalokuttarāva kathitā.

[03] 95^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^chavālāta^eb^nti susāne alātaṃ. ^b^majjhe^eb^ ^a^P3.0117^ea^ ^b^gūthagata^eb^nti majjhaṭṭhāne gūthamakkhitaṃ. ^b^neva gāme kaṭṭhatthaṃ pharatī^eb^ti kūṭagopānasithambhasopānādīnaṃ atthāya anupaneyyatāya gāme na kaṭṭhatthaṃ sādheti, khettakuṭipādaṃ vā mañcapādaṃ vā kātuṃ anupaneyyatāya na araññe kaṭṭhatthaṃ sādheti. dvīsu koṭīsu gayhamānaṃ hatthaṃ ḍahati, majjhe gayhamānaṃ gūthena makkheti. ^b^tathūpama^eb^nti taṃsarikkhakaṃ. ^b^abhikkantataro^eb^ti sundarataro. ^b^paṇītataro^eb^ti uttamataro. ^b^gavā khīra^eb^nti gāvito khīraṃ. ^b^khīramhā dadhī^eb^tiādīsu paraṃ paraṃ purimato purimato aggaṃ, sappimaṇḍo pana tesu sabbesupi aggameva ^a^M2.0326^ea^. ^b^aggo^eb^tiādīsu guṇehi aggo ceva seṭṭho ca pamukho ca uttamo ca pavaro cāti veditabbo. chavālātūpamāya na dussīlo puggalo kathito, appassuto pana vissaṭṭhakammanto goṇasadiso puggalo kathitoti veditabbo. chaṭṭhe sabbaṃ uttānatthameva.

[03] 97^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^khippanisantī^eb^ti khippanisāmano sīghaṃ jānituṃ samattho. ^b^sutānañca dhammāna^eb^nti sutappaguṇānaṃ tantidhammānaṃ. ^b^atthūpaparikkhī^eb^ti atthaṃ upaparikkhako. ^b^atthamaññāya dhammamaññāyā^eb^ti aṭṭhakathañca pāḷiñca jānitvā. ^b^dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hotī^eb^ti navalokuttaradhammānaṃ ^a^P3.0118^ea^ anurūpadhammabhūtaṃ sasīlakaṃ pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti. ^b^no ca kalyāṇavāco^eb^ti na sundaravacano. ^b^na kalyāṇavākkaraṇo^eb^ti na sundaravacanaghoso hoti. ^b^poriyā^eb^tiādīhi saddhiṃ no-kāro yojetabboyeva. guṇaparipuṇṇāya apalibuddhāya adosāya agaḷitapadabyañjanāya atthaṃ viññāpetuṃ samatthāya vācāya samannāgato na hotīti attho. iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo.
[03] 98-99^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhamaṃ ^a^V2.0321^ea^ puggalajjhāsayavasenāpi dasabalassa desanāñāṇavilāsenāpi kathitaṃ, navamaṃ pañcaveravasena.

[03] 100^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^kālenā^eb^ti yuttappattakālena. ^b^khamatī^eb^ti ruccati. ^b^yadidaṃ tattha tattha kālaññutā^eb^ti yā esā tattha tattha kālaṃ jānanā. taṃ taṃ kālaṃ ñatvā hi avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇakathanaṃ vaṇṇārahassa ca vaṇṇakathanaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ pakatīti dasseti.
[06] asuravaggo pañcamo.
[06] dutiyapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 101-2^b^.^eb^ tatiyapaṇṇāsakassa ^a^V2.0322^ea^ ^a^M2.0327^ea^ ^a^P3.0119^ea^ paṭhame ^b^valāhakā^eb^ti meghā. ^b^bhāsitā hoti no kattā^eb^ti ``idañcidañca karissāmī''ti kevalaṃ bhāsatiyeva, na karoti. ^b^kattā hoti no bhāsitā^eb^ti akathetvāva ``idañcidañca mayā kātuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti kattā hoti. evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo. dutiyaṃ uttānatthameva.
[03] 103^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^kumbhā^eb^ti ghaṭā. ^b^tuccho pihito^eb^ti rittako pihitamukho. ^b^pūro vivaṭo^eb^ti udakapuṇṇo apārutamukho. sesadvayepi eseva nayo.
[03] 104^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^uttāno gambhīrobhāso^eb^tiādīsu purāṇapaṇṇarasasambhinnavaṇṇo kāḷaudako ^b^gambhīrobhāso^eb^ nāma, acchavippasannamaṇivaṇṇaudako ^b^uttānobhāso^eb^ nāma.
[03] 105-6^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^āmaṃ pakkavaṇṇī^eb^ti āmakaṃ hutvā olokentānaṃ pakkasadisaṃ khāyati. evaṃ sabbapadāni daṭṭhabbāni. chaṭṭhaṃ uttānatthameva.
[03] 107^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^V2.0323^ea^ yo āvāṭaṃ khaṇati, na ca tattha vasati, so ^b^gādhaṃ kattā no vasitā^eb^ti vuccati. khantātipi pāṭho. iminā nayena sabbapadāni veditabbāni.

[03] 108^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^M2.0328^ea^ yo attano gogaṇaṃ maddati, na paragogaṇaṃ, ayaṃ ^b^sagavacaṇḍo no paragavacaṇḍo^eb^ti evaṃ sabbapadāni veditabbāni. ^b^ubbejetā hotī^eb^ti ghaṭṭetvā vijjhitvā ubbegapattaṃ karoti.
[03] 109^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^pheggu phegguparivāro^eb^ti nissāro pheggurukkho pheggurukkheheva parivuto. ^b^sāraparivāro^eb^ti ^a^P3.0120^ea^ khadirādīhi sārarukkheheva parivuto. esa nayo sabbattha.
[03] 110^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^āgataviso na ghoraviso^eb^ti yassa visaṃ āgacchati, ghoraṃ pana na hoti, cirakālaṃ na pīḷeti. sesapadesupi eseva nayoti.
[06] valāhakavaggo paṭhamo.

[03] 111^b^.^eb^ dutiyassa ^a^V2.0324^ea^ paṭhame ^b^kesī^eb^ti tassa nāmaṃ. assadamme sāretīti ^b^assadammasārathi. saṇhenapi vinetī^eb^tiādīsu tassa anucchavikaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā subhojanaṃ bhojetvā madhurapānaṃ pāyetvā muduvacanena samudācaritvā damento saṇhena dameti nāma, jāṇubandhanamukhabandhanādīhi ceva patodavijjhanakasābhighātapharusavacanehi ca damento pharusena dameti nāma, kālena kālaṃ tadubhayaṃ karonto saṇhapharusena dameti nāma.

[03] 112^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^M2.0329^ea^ ^b^ajjavenā^eb^ti ujukabhāvena. ^b^javenā^eb^ti padavegena. ^b^khantiyā^eb^ti adhivāsanakkhantiyā. ^b^soraccenā^eb^ti sucibhāvasīlena. puggalaguṇaṅgesu ^b^javenā^eb^ti ñāṇajavena. sesamettha uttānatthameva.

[03] 113^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^P3.0121^ea^ ^b^patodacchāya^eb^nti vijjhanatthaṃ ukkhittassa patodassa chāyaṃ. ^b^saṃvijjatī^eb^ti ``javo me gahetabbo''ti sallakkhaṇavasena saṃvijjati. ^b^saṃvegaṃ āpajjatī^eb^ti saṃvegaṃ paṭipajjati ^b^lomavedhaviddho^eb^ti lomakūpe patodavedhena viddhamatto. ^b^cammavedhaviddho^eb^ti chavicammaṃ chindantena patodavedhena viddho. ^b^aṭṭhivedhaviddho^eb^ti aṭṭhiṃ bhindantena vedhena viddho. ^b^kāyenā^eb^ti nāmakāyena. ^b^paramasacca^eb^nti nibbānaṃ. ^b^sacchikarotī^eb^ti passati. ^b^paññāyā^eb^ti sahavipassanāya maggapaññāya.

[03] 114^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^V2.0325^ea^ ^b^aṭṭhiṃ katvā^eb^ti aṭṭhiko hutvā. ^b^tiṇavaninnādasaddāna^eb^nti ettha ^b^tiṇavo^eb^ti ḍiṇḍimo, ^b^ninnādasaddo^eb^ti sabbesampi ekatomissito mahāsaddo. ḍaṃsādīsu ^b^ḍaṃsā^eb^ti piṅgalamakkhikā, ^b^makasā^eb^ makasāva. ^b^khippaññeva gantā hotī^eb^ti sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttivimuttiñāṇadassanāni pūretvā sīghameva gantā hoti.

[03] 115^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^ṭhānānī^eb^ti kāraṇāni. ^b^anatthāya saṃvattatī^eb^ti ahitāya avaḍḍhiyā saṃvattati. ettha ca paṭhamaṃ opātakkhaṇanamacchabandhanasandhicchedanādibhedaṃ sadukkhaṃ savighātaṃ pāpakammaṃ veditabbaṃ, dutiyaṃ samajīvikānaṃ gihīnaṃ pupphacchaḍḍakādikammaṃ sudhākoṭṭana-gehacchādanāsuciṭṭhānasammajjanādikammañca ^a^P3.0122^ea^ veditabbaṃ, tatiyaṃ surāpānagandhavilepanamālāpiḷandhanādikammañceva assādavasena pavattaṃ pāṇātipātādikammañca veditabbaṃ, catutthaṃ dhammassavanatthāya gamanakāle suddhavatthacchādana-mālāgandhādīnaṃ ādāya gamanaṃ ^a^M2.0330^ea^ cetiyavandanaṃ bodhivandanaṃ madhuradhammakathāsavanaṃ pañcasīlasamādānanti evamādīsu somanassasampayuttaṃ kusalakammaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^purisathāme^eb^ti purisassa ñāṇathāmasmiṃ. sesadvayepi eseva nayo.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^yato kho^eb^ti yadā kho. ^b^samparāyikassā^eb^ti desanāmattametaṃ, khīṇāsavo pana neva samparāyikassa, na diṭṭhadhammikassa maraṇassa bhāyati. sova idha adhippeto. keci pana ``sammādiṭṭhi bhāvitāti vacanato sotāpannaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbepi ariyā adhippetā''ti vadanti.

[03] 117^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^attarūpenā^eb^ti attano anurūpena anucchavikena, hitakāmenāti attho. ^b^rajanīyesū^eb^ti ^a^V2.0326^ea^ rāgassa paccayabhūtesu. ^b^dhammesū^eb^ti sabhāvesu, iṭṭhārammaṇesūti attho. evaṃ sabbattha nayo veditabbo. ^b^na rajjatī^eb^ti diṭṭhivasena na rajjati. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^na ca pana samaṇavacanahetupi gacchatī^eb^ti samaṇānaṃ paravādīnaṃ vacanahetupi attano diṭṭhiṃ pahāya tesaṃ diṭṭhivasena na gacchatīti attho. idhāpi khīṇāsavova adhippeto.

[03] 118-120^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^dassanīyānī^eb^ti passitabbayuttakāni. ^b^saṃvejanīyānī^eb^ti saṃvegajanakāni. navame ^b^jātibhaya^eb^nti jātiṃ ārabbha uppajjanakabhayaṃ. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. dasame ^a^P3.0123^ea^ ^b^aggibhaya^eb^nti aggiṃ paṭicca uppajjanakabhayaṃ. sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
[06] kesivaggo dutiyo.

[03] 121^b^.^eb^ tatiyassa ^a^V2.0327^ea^ ^a^M2.0331^ea^ paṭhame ^b^attānuvādabhaya^eb^nti attānaṃ anuvadantassa uppajjanakabhayaṃ. ^b^parānuvādabhaya^eb^nti parassa anuvādato uppajjanakabhayaṃ. ^b^daṇḍabhaya^eb^nti dvattiṃsa kammakāraṇā paṭicca uppajjanakabhayaṃ. ^b^duggatibhaya^eb^nti cattāro apāye paṭicca uppajjanakabhayaṃ. ^b^idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, attānuvādabhaya^eb^ntiādīsu attānuvādabhayaṃ tāva paccavekkhantassa ajjhattaṃ hirī samuṭṭhāti, sāssa tīsu dvāresu saṃvaraṃ janeti, tīsu dvāresu saṃvaro catupārisuddhisīlaṃ hoti. so tasmiṃ sīle patiṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aggaphale patiṭṭhāti. parānuvādabhayaṃ pana paccavekkhantassa bahiddhā ottappaṃ samuṭṭhāti, tadassa tīsu dvāresu saṃvaraṃ janeti, tīsu dvāresu saṃvaro catupārisuddhisīlaṃ hoti. so tasmiṃ sīle patiṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aggaphale patiṭṭhāti. duggatibhayaṃ paccavekkhantassa ajjhattaṃ hirī samuṭṭhāti, sāssa tīsu dvāresu saṃvaraṃ janeti, tīsu dvāresu saṃvaro catupārisuddhisīlaṃ hoti. so tasmiṃ sīle patiṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aggaphale patiṭṭhāti.

[03] 122^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^udakorohantassā^eb^ti udakaṃ otarantassa. ^b^pāṭikaṅkhitabbānī^eb^ti icchitabbāni. ^b^susukābhaya^eb^nti caṇḍamacchabhayaṃ. ^b^mukhāvaraṇaṃ maññe karontī^eb^ti mukhapidahanaṃ viya karonti. ^b^odarikattassā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0124^ea^ mahodaratāya mahagghasabhāvassa. ^b^arakkhiteneva kāyenā^eb^tiādīsu kāyadvāre tividhassa saṃvarassa abhāvato arakkhitena kāyena. vacīdvāre catubbidhassa saṃvarassa abhāvato ^b^arakkhitāya vācāya^eb^.

[03] 123^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^tadassādetī^eb^ti taṃ jhānaṃ sukhassādena assādeti. ^b^nikāmetī^eb^ti pattheti. ^b^vittiṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0328^ea^ ^b^āpajjatī^eb^ti tuṭṭhiṃ āpajjati. ^b^tadadhimutto^eb^ti ^a^M2.0332^ea^ tasmiṃ adhimutto, taṃ vā adhimutto. ^b^tabbahulavihārī^eb^ti tena jhānena bahulaṃ viharanto. ^b^sahabyataṃ upapajjatī^eb^ti sahabhāvaṃ gacchati, tattha nibbattatīti attho. ^b^kappo āyuppamāṇa^eb^nti ettha paṭhamajjhānaṃ atthi hīnaṃ, atthi majjhimaṃ, atthi paṇītaṃ. tattha hīnena uppannānaṃ kappassa tatiyo koṭṭhāso āyuppamāṇaṃ, majjhimena upaḍḍhakappo, paṇītena kappo. taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^nirayampi gacchatī^eb^ti nirayagamanīyassa kammassa appahīnattā aparāparaṃ gacchati, na anantarameva. ^b^tasmiṃyeva bhave parinibbāyatī^eb^ti tasmiṃyeva rūpabhave ṭhatvā parinibbāyati, na heṭṭhā otarati. ^b^yadidaṃ gatiyā upapattiyā satī^eb^ti yaṃ idaṃ gatiyā ca upapattiyā ca sati sekhassa ariyasāvakassa paṭisandhivasena heṭṭhā anotaritvā tasmiṃyeva rūpabhave upari dutiyatatiyādīsu aññatarasmiṃ brahmaloke parinibbānaṃ, puthujjanassa pana nirayādigamanaṃ, idaṃ nānākaraṇanti attho.

[03] ^b^dve kappā^eb^ti etthāpi dutiyajjhānaṃ vuttanayeneva tividhaṃ hoti. tattha paṇītabhāvanena nibbattānaṃ aṭṭhakappā āyuppamāṇaṃ, majjhimena cattāro, hīnena dve. taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^cattāro^eb^ ^a^P3.0125^ea^ ^b^kappā^eb^ti ettha yaṃ heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ``kappo, dve kappā''ti, tampi āharitvā attho veditabbo. kappoti ca guṇassapi nāmaṃ, tasmā kappo dve kappā cattāro kappāti ayamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yo paṭhamaṃ vutto kappo, so dve vāre gaṇetvā ekena guṇena dve kappā honti, dutiyena cattāro, puna te cattāro kappāti imehi catūhi guṇehi guṇitā ekena guṇena aṭṭha honti, dutiyena soḷasa, tatiyena dvattiṃsa, catutthena catusaṭṭhīti. evamidha paṇītajjhānavasena catusaṭṭhi kappā gahitāti veditabbā. ^b^pañca kappasatānī^eb^ti idaṃ paṇītasseva upapattijjhānassa vasena vuttaṃ. vehapphalesu vā paṭhamajjhānabhūmiādīsu viya tiṇṇaṃ brahmalokānaṃ abhāvato ettakameva āyuppamāṇaṃ. tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] 124^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^M2.0333^ea^ rūpameva ^b^rūpagataṃ^eb^. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^aniccato^eb^tiādīsu hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena ^b^aniccato,^eb^ ābādhaṭṭhena ^b^rogato,^eb^ anto padussanaṭṭhena ^b^gaṇḍato,^eb^ anupaviṭṭhaṭṭhena ^b^sallato,^eb^ sadukkhaṭṭhena ^b^aghato,^eb^ sampīḷanaṭṭhena ^b^ābādhato,^eb^ avidheyyaṭṭhena ^b^parato,^eb^ palujjanaṭṭhena ^b^palokato,^eb^ nissattaṭṭhena ^b^suññato,^eb^ avasavattanaṭṭhena ^b^anattato^eb^. ettha ca ``aniccato palokato''ti ^a^V2.0329^ea^ dvīhi padehi aniccalakkhaṇaṃ kathitaṃ, ``suññato anattato''ti dvīhi anattalakkhaṇaṃ, sesehi dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^samanupassatī^eb^ti ñāṇena passati. evaṃ pañcakkhandhe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā passanto tayo magge tīṇi phalāni sacchikaroti. ^b^suddhāvāsānaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0126^ea^ ^b^devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī^eb^ti tattha ṭhito catutthajjhānaṃ bhāvetvā upapajjati.
[03] 125-126^b^.^eb^ pañcame paṭhamajjhānavasena mettā, dutiyādivasena karuṇādayo dassitā. chaṭṭhaṃ catutthe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] 127^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^pātubhāvā^eb^ti pātubhāvena. ^b^kucchiṃ okkamatī^eb^ti ettha kucchiṃ okkanto hotīti attho. okkante hi tasmiṃ evaṃ hoti, na okkamamāne. ^b^appamāṇo^eb^ti vuḍḍhippamāṇo, vipuloti attho. ^b^uḷāro^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^devānaṃ devānubhāva^eb^nti ettha devānaṃ ayamānubhāvo -- nivatthavatthassa pabhā dvādasa yojanāni pharati, tathā sarīrassa, tathā vimānassa, taṃ atikkamitvāti attho. ^b^lokantarikā^eb^ti tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antarā ekeko lokantariko hoti, tiṇṇaṃ sakaṭacakkānaṃ pattānaṃ vā aññamaññaṃ āhacca ṭhapitānaṃ majjhe okāso viya. so pana lokantarikanirayo parimāṇato aṭṭhayojanasahassappamāṇo hoti. ^b^aghā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0334^ea^ niccavivaṭā. ^b^asaṃvutā^eb^ti heṭṭhāpi appatiṭṭhā. ^b^andhakārā^eb^ti tamabhūtā. ^b^andhakāratimisā^eb^ti cakkhuviññāṇuppattinivāraṇato andhabhāvakaraṇatimisāya samannāgatā. tattha kira cakkhuviññāṇaṃ na jāyati. ^b^evaṃmahiddhikāna^eb^nti candimasūriyā kira ekappahāreneva tīsu dīpesu paññāyanti, evaṃmahiddhikā. ekekāya disāya ^a^P3.0127^ea^ nava nava yojanasatasahassāni andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokaṃ dassenti, ^b^evaṃmahānubhāvā. ābhā nānubhontī^eb^ti pabhā nappahonti. te kira cakkavāḷapabbatassa vemajjhena caranti cakkavāḷapabbatañca atikkamitvā lokantaranirayā. tasmā tesaṃ tattha ābhā nappahonti.

[03] ^b^yepi tattha sattā^eb^ti yepi tasmiṃ lokantaramahāniraye sattā upapannā. kiṃ pana kammaṃ katvā ^a^V2.0330^ea^ tattha uppajjantīti? bhāriyaṃ dāruṇaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānañca upari aparādhaṃ, aññañca divase divase pāṇavadhādisāhasikakammaṃ katvā uppajjanti tambapaṇṇidīpe abhayacoranāgacorādayo viya. tesaṃ attabhāvo tigāvutiko hoti, vaggulīnaṃ viya dīghanakhā honti. te rukkhe vagguliyo viya nakhehi cakkavāḷapabbatapāde lagganti. yadā saṃsappantā aññamaññassa hatthapāsagatā honti, atha ``bhakkho no laddho''ti maññamānā tattha byāvaṭā viparivattitvā lokasandhārakaudake patanti, vāte paharantepi madhukaphalāni viya chijjitvā udake patanti, patitamattāva accantakhāre udake piṭṭhapiṇḍi viya vilīyanti. ^b^aññepi kira bho santi sattā^eb^ti bho yathā mayaṃ mahādukkhaṃ anubhavāma, evaṃ aññepi kira sattā idaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavanatthāya idhūpapannāti taṃdivasaṃ passanti. ayaṃ pana obhāso ekayāgupānamattampi na tiṭṭhati. yāvatā niddāyitvā pabuddho ārammaṇaṃ vibhāveti ^a^P3.0128^ea^, tattakaṃ kālaṃ hoti. dīghabhāṇakā pana ``accharāsaṅghātamattameva vijjuobhāso viya niccharitvā kiṃ idanti bhaṇantānaṃyeva antaradhāyatī''ti vadanti.

[03] 128^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame taṇhādiṭṭhīhi allīyitabbaṭṭhena ālayoti pañca kāmaguṇā, sakalameva vā vaṭṭaṃ. āramanti etthāti ārāmo, ālayo ārāmo etissāti ^b^ālayārāmā^eb^. ālaye ratāti ^b^ālayaratā^eb^ ^a^M2.0335^ea^. ālaye sammuditāti ^b^ālayasammuditā. anālaye dhamme^eb^ti ālayapaṭipakkhe vivaṭṭūpanissite ariyadhamme. ^b^sussūsatī^eb^ti sotukāmo hoti. ^b^sotaṃ odahatī^eb^ti sotaṃ ṭhapeti. ^b^aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapetī^eb^ti ājānanatthāya cittaṃ paccupaṭṭhapeti. ^b^māno^eb^ti maññanā, maññitabbaṭṭhena vā sakalaṃ vaṭṭameva. ^b^mānavinaye dhamme^eb^ti mānavinayadhamme. upasamapaṭipakkho ^b^anupasamo,^eb^ anupasantaṭṭhena vā vaṭṭameva anupasamo nāma. ^b^opasamike^eb^ti upasamakare vivaṭṭūpanissite. avijjāya gatā samannāgatāti ^b^avijjāgatā^eb^. avijjaṇḍakosena pariyonaddhattā aṇḍaṃ viya bhūtāti ^b^aṇḍabhūtā^eb^. samantato onaddhāti ^b^pariyonaddhā. avijjāvinaye^eb^ti avijjāvinayo vuccati arahattaṃ, taṃnissite dhamme desiyamāneti attho. iti ^a^P3.0129^ea^ imasmiṃ sutte catūsu ṭhānesu vaṭṭaṃ, catūsu vivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.

[03] 129^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^V2.0331^ea^ ^b^bhikkhuparisā ānandaṃ dassanāyā^eb^ti ye bhagavantaṃ passitukāmā theraṃ upasaṅkamanti, ye vā ``āyasmā kirānando samantapāsādiko abhirūpo dassanīyo bahussuto saṅghasobhano''ti therassa guṇe sutvā āgacchanti, te sandhāya ``bhikkhuparisā ānandaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamatī''ti vuttaṃ. esa nayo sabbattha. ^b^attamanā^eb^ti ``savanena no dassanaṃ sametī''ti sakamanā tuṭṭhacittā. ^b^dhamma^eb^nti ``kacci, āvuso, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci yonisomanasikārakammaṃ karotha, ācariyupajjhāyavattaṃ pūrethā''ti evarūpaṃ paṭisanthāradhammaṃ. tattha bhikkhunīsu ``kacci, bhaginiyo, aṭṭha garudhamme samādāya vattathā''ti idampi nānākaraṇaṃ hoti. upāsakesu ``svāgataṃ, upāsaka, na te kiñci sīsaṃ vā aṅgaṃ vā rujjati, arogā te puttabhātaro''ti na evaṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karoti, evaṃ pana karoti -- ``kathaṃ, upāsakā, tīṇi saraṇāni pañca sīlāni rakkhatha, māsassa aṭṭha uposathe karotha, mātāpitūnaṃ upaṭṭhānavattaṃ pūretha, dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇe paṭijaggathā''ti. upāsikāsupi eseva nayo.
