[03] 130^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^khattiyaparisā^eb^ti abhisittā anabhisittā ca khattiyā ^a^P3.0130^ea^. te hi kira ``rājā cakkavattī nāma abhirūpo pāsādiko hoti, ākāsena ^a^M2.0336^ea^ vicaranto rajjaṃ anusāsati, dhammiko dhammarājā''ti tassa guṇakathaṃ sutvā savanena dassanamhi samente attamanā honti. ^b^bhāsatī^eb^ti ``kathaṃ, tātā, rājadhammaṃ pūretha, paveṇiṃ rakkhathā''ti paṭisanthāraṃ karoti. brāhmaṇesu pana ``kathañca, ācariyā, mante vācetha, antevāsikā mante gaṇhanti, dakkhiṇaṃ vā vatthāni vā sīlaṃ vā labhathā''ti evaṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karoti. gahapatīsu ``kathaṃ, tātā, na vo rājakulato daṇḍena vā bandhanena vā pīḷā atthi, sammā devo dhāraṃ anuppavecchati, sassāni sampajjantī''ti evaṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karoti. samaṇesu ``kathaṃ, bhante, kacci pabbajitaparikkhārā sulabhā, samaṇadhamme nappamajjathā''ti evaṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karotīti.
[06] bhayavaggo tatiyo.

[03] 131^b^.^eb^ catutthassa ^a^V2.0332^ea^ paṭhame ^b^upapattipaṭilābhiyānī^eb^ti yehi anantarā upapattiṃ paṭilabhati. ^b^bhavapaṭilābhiyānī^eb^ti upapattibhavassa paṭilābhāya paccayāni. ^b^sakadāgāmissā^eb^ti idaṃ appahīnasaṃyojanesu ariyesu uttamakoṭiyā gahitaṃ. yasmā pana antarāparinibbāyissa antarā upapatti natthi, yaṃ pana so tattha jhānaṃ samāpajjati, taṃ ^a^P3.0131^ea^ kusalattā ``upapattibhavassa paccayo'' teva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. tasmāssa ``upapattipaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni, bhavapaṭilābhiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnānī''ti vuttaṃ. orambhāgiyesu ca appahīnaṃ upādāya sakadāgāmissa avisesena ``orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnānī''ti vuttaṃ. sesamettha uttānameva.
[03] 132^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^yuttappaṭibhāno no muttappaṭibhāno^eb^ti pañhaṃ kathento yuttameva katheti, sīghaṃ pana na katheti, saṇikameva kathetīti attho. iminā nayena sabbapadāni veditabbāni.
[03] 133^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^M2.0337^ea^ catunnampi puggalānaṃ iminā suttena viseso veditabbo --

[02] ``katamo ca puggalo ugghaṭitaññū, yassa puggalassa saha udāhaṭavelāya dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo ^b^ugghaṭitaññū^eb^. katamo ca puggalo vipañcitaññū, yassa puggalassa vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo ^b^vipañcitaññū^eb^. katamo ca puggalo neyyo, yassa puggalassa uddesato ^a^V2.0333^ea^ paripucchato yonisomanasikaroto kalyāṇamitte sevato bhajato payirupāsato anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo ^b^neyyo^eb^. katamo ca puggalo padaparamo, yassa puggalassa bahumpi suṇato bahumpi bhaṇato bahumpi dhārayato bahumpi vācayato na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo ^b^padaparamo''^eb^ti (pu0 pa0 148-151).

[03] 134^b^.^eb^ catutthe uṭṭhānavīriyeneva divasaṃ vītināmetvā tassa nissandaphalamattaṃ kiñcideva labhitvā jīvikaṃ kappeti, taṃ pana uṭṭhānaṃ āgamma kiñci puññaphalaṃ nappaṭilabhati ^a^P3.0132^ea^, ayaṃ ^b^uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvī na kammaphalūpajīvī^eb^ nāma. cātumahārājike pana deve ādiṃ katvā sabbepi devā uṭṭhānavīriyena vinā puññaphalasseva upajīvanato ^b^kammaphalūpajīvino na uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino^eb^ nāma. rājarājamahāmattādayo ^b^uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino ca kammaphalūpajīvino ca^eb^. nerayikasattā ^b^neva uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino na kammaphalūpajīvino^eb^. imasmiṃ sutte puññaphalameva kammaphalanti adhippetaṃ, tañca tesaṃ natthi.

[03] 135^b^.^eb^ pañcame paṭhamo andhabālaputhujjano, dutiyo antarantarā kusalakārako lokiyaputhujjano, tatiyo sotāpanno, sakadāgāmianāgāminopi ^a^M2.0338^ea^ eteneva saṅgahitā. catuttho khīṇāsavo. so hi ekanteneva anavajjo.

[03] 136-137^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe paṭhamo lokiyamahājano, dutiyo sukkhavipassako sotāpanno ca sakadāgāmī ca, tatiyo anāgāmī. so hi yasmā taṅkhaṇikampi upapattinimittakaṃ jhānaṃ paṭilabhatiyeva, tasmā sukkhavipassakopi samādhismiṃ paripūrakārīyeva. catuttho khīṇāsavoyeva ^a^V2.0334^ea^. so hi sabbesaṃ sīlādipaccanīkānaṃ pahīnattā sabbattha paripūrakārī nāma. sattamepi chaṭṭhe vuttanayeneva puggalaparicchedo veditabbo.

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^nikaṭṭhakāyo^eb^ti niggatakāyo. ^b^anikaṭṭhacitto^eb^ti anupaviṭṭhacitto. kāyeneva gāmato nikkhanto, cittena araññe vasantopi gāmameva paviṭṭhoti vuttaṃ hoti. iminā nayena sabbattha attho veditabbo.

[03] 139^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^asahita^eb^nti atthena asaṃyuttaṃ. ^b^na kusalā hotī^eb^ti na chekā hoti. ^b^sahitāsahitassā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0133^ea^ atthanissitassa vā anissitassa vā. evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo.

[03] 140^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^atthato pariyādānaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti aṭṭhakathaṃ pucchito pariyādānaṃ parikkhayaṃ gacchati, kathetuṃ na sakkoti. ^b^no byañjanato^eb^ti byañjanaṃ panassa pavattati na pariyādiyati. eseva nayo sabbatthāti.
[06] puggalavaggo catuttho.
[03] 141^b^.^eb^ pañcamassa ^a^V2.0335^ea^ ^a^M2.0339^ea^ paṭhame ābhāsanavasena candova ^b^candābhā^eb^. sesapadesupi eseva nayo.

[03] 142-145^b^.^eb^ dutiyādīsupi pabhāsanavasena candova ^b^candappabhā^eb^. ālokanavasena candova ^b^candāloko^eb^. obhāsanavasena candova ^b^candobhāso^eb^. pajjotanavasena candova ^b^candapajjoto^eb^ti. evaṃ sabbapadesupi attho veditabbo.

[03] 146^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^kālā^eb^ti yuttappayuttakālā. ^b^kālena dhammassavana^eb^nti yuttappayuttakāle dhammassavanaṃ. ^b^dhammasākacchā^eb^ti pañhapucchanavissajjanavasena pavattā saṃsandanakathā.

[03] 147^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^kālā^eb^ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle dhammassavanādivasena pavattānaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. te bhāviyanti ceva anuparivattiyanti ca. ^b^āsavānaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0134^ea^ ^b^khaya^eb^nti arahattaṃ. aṭṭhamaṃ uttānatthameva.

[03] 149-150^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^V2.0336^ea^ ^b^saṇhā vācā^eb^ti mudukavācā. ^b^mantabhāsā^eb^ti mantasaṅkhātāya paññāya paricchinditvā kathitakathā. dasame ^b^sīlasāro^eb^ti sārasampāpakaṃ sīlaṃ. sesesupi eseva nayo.
[06] ābhāvaggo pañcamo.
[06] tatiyapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 151^b^.^eb^ catutthassa ^a^V2.0337^ea^ ^a^M2.0340^ea^ paṭhame saddhādhurena indaṭṭhaṃ karotīti ^b^saddhindriyaṃ^eb^. sesesupi eseva nayo. dutiye assaddhiye akampanaṭṭhena ^b^saddhābalaṃ^eb^. sesesupi eseva nayo. tatiye ^b^anavajjabala^eb^nti niddosabalaṃ. ^b^saṅgahabala^eb^nti saṅgaṇhitabbayuttakānaṃ saṅgaṇhanabalaṃ. catutthapañcamāni uttānāneva.

[03] 156^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^saṃvaṭṭatī^eb^ti ettha ^b^tayo saṃvaṭṭā^eb^ āposaṃvaṭṭo, tejosaṃvaṭṭo, vāyosaṃvaṭṭoti. ^b^tisso saṃvaṭṭasīmā^eb^ ābhassarā, subhakiṇhā, vehapphalāti. yadā kappo tejena saṃvaṭṭati, ābhassarato heṭṭhā agginā ḍayhati. yadā āpena saṃvaṭṭati, subhakiṇhato heṭṭhā udakena vilīyati. yadā vātena ^a^P3.0135^ea^ saṃvaṭṭati, vehapphalato heṭṭhā vātena viddhaṃsati. vitthārato pana sadāpi ekaṃ buddhakkhettaṃ vinassati. ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārakathā pana visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 2.403-404 ādayo) vuttanayeneva veditabbā.

[03] 157^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^vighātavā^eb^ti mahicchāpaccayena vighātena dukkhena samannāgato. ^b^asantuṭṭho^eb^ti catūsu paccayesu tīhi santosehi asantuṭṭho. ^b^anavaññappaṭilābhāyā^eb^ti parehi anavajānanassa paṭilābhatthāya. ^b^lābhasakkārasilokappaṭilābhāyā^eb^ti susaṅkhatacatupaccayasaṅkhātassa lābhasakkārassa ^a^V2.0338^ea^ ceva vaṇṇabhaṇanasaṅkhātassa silokassa ca paṭilābhatthāya. ^b^saṅkhāya kulāni upasaṅkamatī^eb^ti ``iti maṃ ete jānissantī''ti jānanatthāya kulāni upasaṅkamati. sesapadesupi eseva nayo.

[03] 158^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^M2.0341^ea^ ^b^gambhīresū^eb^ti atthagambhīresu. ^b^ṭhānāṭhānesū^eb^ti kāraṇākāraṇesu. ^b^na kamatī^eb^ti nāvagāhati nappavattati. ^b^paññācakkhū^eb^ti ettha uggahaparipucchāpaññāpi vaṭṭati, sammasanappaṭivedhapaññāpi vaṭṭatiyeva.

[03] 159^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^ehi tva^eb^nti there paṭibaddhacittā taṃ pahiṇituṃ evamāha. ^b^sasīsaṃ pārupitvā^eb^ti saha sīsena kāyaṃ pārupitvā. ^b^mañcake nipajjī^eb^ti vegena mañcakaṃ paññāpetvā tattha nipajji. ^b^etadavocā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0136^ea^ tassākāraṃ sallakkhetvā lobhappahānatthāya saṇheneva asubhakathaṃ kathetuṃ etaṃ avoca. ^b^āhārasambhūto^eb^ti āhārena sambhūto āhāraṃ nissāya vaḍḍhito. ^b^āhāraṃ nissāya āhāraṃ pajahatī^eb^ti paccuppannaṃ kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ nissāya taṃ evaṃ yoniso sevamāno pubbakammasaṅkhātaṃ āhāraṃ pajahati. paccuppannepi pana kabaḷīkārāhāre nikantitaṇhā pajahitabbā.

[03] ^b^taṇhaṃ pajahatī^eb^ti idāni evaṃ pavattaṃ paccuppannataṇhaṃ nissāya vaṭṭamūlikaṃ pubbataṇhaṃ pajahati. ayaṃ pana paccuppannataṇhā kusalā akusalāti? akusalā. sevitabbā na sevitabbāti? sevitabbā. paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhati nākaḍḍhatīti? nākaḍḍhati. etissāpi pana paccuppannāya sevitabbataṇhāya nikanti pajahitabbāyeva. ^b^so hi nāma āyasmā āsavānaṃ khayā upasampajja viharissati, kimaṅgaṃ panāha^eb^nti ettha ^b^kimaṅgaṃ panā^eb^ti kāraṇaparivitakkanametaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- so āyasmā arahattaphalaṃ sacchikatvā viharissati, ahaṃ kena kāraṇena na sacchikatvā viharissāmi. sopi hi āyasmā sammāsambuddhasseva putto, ahampi sammāsambuddhasseva putto, mayhampetaṃ uppajjissatīti. ^b^mānaṃ nissāyā^eb^ti idaṃ evaṃ uppannasevitabbamānaṃ ^a^V2.0339^ea^ nissāya. ^b^mānaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0137^ea^ ^b^pajahatī^eb^ti vaṭṭamūlakaṃ pubbamānaṃ pajahati. yaṃ nissāya panesa taṃ pajahati, sopi taṇhā viya akusalo ceva sevitabbo ca, no ca paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhati. nikanti pana tasmimpi pajahitabbāva.

[03] ^b^setughāto^eb^ ^a^M2.0342^ea^ ^b^vutto bhagavatā^eb^ti padaghāto paccayaghāto buddhena bhagavatā kathito. iti imehi catūhi aṅgehi there desanaṃ vinivaṭṭente tassā bhikkhuniyā theraṃ ārabbha uppanno chandarāgo apagañchi. sāpi theraṃ khamāpetuṃ accayaṃ desesi, theropissā paṭiggaṇhi. taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^atha kho sā bhikkhunī^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^duggahita^eb^nti uppaṭipāṭiyā gahitaṃ. ^b^pariyāpuṇantī^eb^ti vaḷañjenti kathenti. ^b^padabyañjanehī^eb^ti ettha padameva atthassa byañjanato byañjananti vuttaṃ. ^b^dunnikkhittassā^eb^ti duṭṭhu nikkhittassa uppaṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitassa. ^b^atthopi dunnayo hotī^eb^ti aṭṭhakathā nīharitvā kathetuṃ na sakkā hoti. ^b^chinnamūlako^eb^ti mūlabhūtānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ upacchinnattā chinnamūlako. ^b^appaṭisaraṇo^eb^ti appatiṭṭho. ^b^bāhulikā^eb^ti paccayabāhullāya paṭipannā. ^b^sāthalikā^eb^ti tisso sikkhā sithilaggahaṇena gaṇhanakā. ^b^okkamane^eb^ ^a^P3.0138^ea^ ^b^pubbaṅgamā^eb^ti pañca nīvaraṇāni avagamanato okkamananti vuccanti, tattha pubbaṅgamāti attho. ^b^paviveke^eb^ti tividhe viveke. ^b^nikkhittadhurā^eb^ti nibbīriyā. iminā nayena pana sabbattha attho veditabbo.
[06] indriyavaggo paṭhamo.

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ dutiyassa ^a^V2.0340^ea^ paṭhame sukhapaṭikkhepena dukkhā paṭipajjitabbato paṭipadā etissāti ^b^dukkhāpaṭipadā^eb^. asīghappavattitāya garubhāvena dandhā abhiññā etissāti ^b^dandhābhiññā^eb^. imināva nayena sabbapadesu attho veditabbo.

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^M2.0343^ea^ ^b^abhikkhaṇa^eb^nti abhiṇhaṃ. ^b^ānantariya^eb^nti anantaravipākadāyakaṃ maggasamādhiṃ. ^b^āsavānaṃ khayāyā^eb^ti arahattaphalatthāya. ^b^pañcindriyānī^eb^ti vipassanāpañcamakāni pañcindriyāni. ^b^paññindriya^eb^nti hi ettha vipassanāpaññāva paññindriyanti adhippetaṃ. sesamettha pāḷivasena uttānameva.

[03] imāsaṃ pana paṭipadānaṃ ayaṃ āvibhāvakathā -- idha bhikkhu pubbe akatābhiniveso pubbabhāge rūpapariggahe kilamati, arūpapariggahe kilamati, paccayapariggahe kilamati, tīsu addhāsu kilamati, maggāmagge kilamati. evaṃ pañcasu ^a^P3.0139^ea^ ṭhānesu kilamanto vipassanaṃ pāpuṇāti. vipassanaṃ patvāpi udayabbayānupassane, bhaṅgānupassane, bhayatupaṭṭhāne, ādīnavānupassane, nibbidānupassane, muccitukamyatāñāṇe, saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇe, anulomañāṇe, gotrabhuñāṇeti imesu navasu vipassanāñāṇesupi kilamitvāva lokuttaramaggaṃ pāpuṇāti. tassa so lokuttaramaggo evaṃ dukkhena garubhāvena sacchikatattā dukkhapaṭipado dandhābhiñño nāma jāto. yo pana pubbabhāge pañcasu ñāṇesu kilamanto aparabhāge navasu vipassanāñāṇesu akilamitvāva maggaṃ sacchikaroti, tassa so maggo evaṃ dukkhena agarubhāvena sacchikatattā dukkhapaṭipado khippābhiñño nāma jāto. iminā upāyena itarāpi dve veditabbā.

[03] goṇapariyesakaupamāhi ^a^V2.0341^ea^ cetā vibhāvetabbā -- ekassa hi purisassa cattāro goṇā palāyitvā aṭaviṃ paviṭṭhā. so sakaṇṭake sagahane vane te pariyesanto gahanamaggeneva kicchena kasirena gantvā gahanaṭṭhāneyeva nilīne goṇepi kicchena kasirena addasa. eko kicchena gantvā abbhokāse ṭhite khippameva addasa. aparo abbhokāsamaggena sukhena gantvā gahanaṭṭhāne nilīne kicchena kasirena addasa. aparo abbhokāsamaggeneva sukhena gantvā abbhokāse ṭhiteyeva khippaṃ addasa. tattha cattāro goṇā viya cattāro ariyamaggā daṭṭhabbā, goṇapariyesako puriso viya yogāvacaro, gahanamaggena kicchena kasirena ^a^P3.0140^ea^ gamanaṃ viya pubbabhāge pañcasu ñāṇesu kilamato dukkhāpaṭipadā. gahanaṭṭhāne nilīnānaṃ kiccheneva dassanaṃ viya aparabhāge navasu ñāṇesu kilamantassa ^a^M2.0344^ea^ ariyamaggānaṃ dassanaṃ. iminā upāyena sesaupamāpi yojetabbā.

[03] 163^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^asubhānupassī kāye viharatī^eb^ti attano karajakāye ``yathā etaṃ, tathā ida''nti iminā nayena bahiddhā diṭṭhānaṃ dasannaṃ asubhānaṃ upasaṃharaṇavasena asubhānupassī viharati, attano kāyaṃ asubhato paṭikūlato ñāṇena passatīti attho. ^b^āhāre paṭikūlasaññī^eb^ti navannaṃ pāṭikulyānaṃ vasena kabaḷīkārāhāre paṭikūlasaññī. ^b^sabbaloke anabhiratisaññī^eb^ti sabbasmimpi tedhātuke lokasannivāse anabhiratāya ukkaṇṭhitasaññāya samannāgato. ^b^sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassī^eb^ti sabbepi tebhūmakasaṅkhāre aniccato anupassanto. ^b^maraṇasaññā^eb^ti maraṇaṃ ārabbha uppannasaññā. ^b^ajjhattaṃ sūpaṭṭhitā hotī^eb^ti niyakajjhatte suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitā hoti. ettāvatā balavavipassanā kathitā. ^b^sekhabalānī^eb^ti sikkhanakānaṃ balāni. sesamettha pāḷivasena uttānameva. ``asubhānupassī''tiādīni pana dukkhāya paṭipadāya dassanatthaṃ vuttāni, paṭhamajjhānādīni sukhāya. asubhādīni hi paṭikūlārammaṇāni, tesu pana pakatiyāva sampiyāyamānaṃ cittaṃ allīyati. tasmā tāni bhāvento dukkhapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno nāma hoti. paṭhamajjhānādīni paṇītasukhāni ^a^P3.0141^ea^, tasmā tāni paṭipanno sukhapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno nāma hoti.

[03] ayaṃ panettha sabbasādhāraṇā upamā -- saṅgāmāvacarapuriso hi phalakakoṭṭhakaṃ katvā pañcāvudhāni ^a^V2.0342^ea^ sannayhitvā saṅgāmaṃ pavisati, so antarā vissamitukāmo phalakakoṭṭhakaṃ pavisitvā vissamati ceva pānabhojanādīni ca paṭisevati. tato puna saṅgāmaṃ pavisitvā kammaṃ karoti. tattha saṅgāmo viya kilesasaṅgāmo daṭṭhabbo, phalakakoṭṭhako viya pañcanissayabalāni, saṅgāmapavisanapuriso viya yogāvacaro, pañcāvudhasannāho viya vipassanāpañcamāni indriyāni, saṅgāmaṃ pavisanakālo viya vipassanāya kammakaraṇakālo, vissamitukāmassa phalakakoṭṭhakaṃ pavisitvā vissamanapānabhojanāni paṭisevanakālo viya ^a^M2.0345^ea^ vipassanāya kammaṃ karontassa cittuppādassa nirassādakkhaṇe pañca balāni nissāya cittaṃ sampahaṃsanakālo, vissamitvā khāditvā pivitvā ca puna saṅgāmassa pavisanakālo viya pañcahi balehi cittaṃ sampahaṃsetvā puna vipassanāya kammaṃ karontassa vivaṭṭetvā arahattaggahaṇakālo veditabbo. imasmiṃ pana sutte balāni ceva indriyāni ca missakāneva kathitānīti.

[03] 164^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^akkhamā^eb^ti anadhivāsikapaṭipadā. ^b^khamā^eb^ti adhivāsikapaṭipadā. ^b^damā^eb^ti indriyadamanapaṭipadā. ^b^samā^eb^ti akusalavitakkānaṃ vūpasamanapaṭipadā. ^b^rosantaṃ paṭirosatī^eb^ti ghaṭṭentaṃ paṭighaṭṭeti. ^b^bhaṇḍantaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0142^ea^ ^b^paṭibhaṇḍatī^eb^ti paharantaṃ paṭipaharati. pañcamachaṭṭhāni uttānatthāneva.

[03] 167^b^.^eb^ sattame mahāmoggallānattherassa heṭṭhimā tayo maggā sukhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā ahesuṃ, arahattamaggo dukkhapaṭipado khippābhiñño. tasmā evamāha -- ``yāyaṃ paṭipadā dukkhā khippābhiññā, imaṃ me paṭipadaṃ āgamma anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimutta''nti.

[03] 168^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame dhammasenāpatittherassa heṭṭhimā tayo maggā sukhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā, arahattamaggo ^a^V2.0343^ea^ sukhapaṭipado khippābhiñño. tasmā ``yāyaṃ paṭipadā sukhā khippābhiññā''ti āha. imesu pana dvīsupi suttesu missikāva paṭipadā kathitāti veditabbā.

[03] 169^b^.^eb^ navame paṭhamadutiyapuggalā sukkhavipassakā sasaṅkhārena sappayogena saṅkhāranimittaṃ upaṭṭhapenti. tesu eko vipassanindriyānaṃ balavattā idheva kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyati, eko indriyānaṃ dubbalatāya ^a^M2.0346^ea^ idha asakkonto anantare attabhāve tadeva mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ paṭilabhitvā sasaṅkhārena sappayogena saṅkhāranimittaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyati, tatiyacatutthā samathayānikā. tesaṃ eko asaṅkhārena appayogena indriyānaṃ balavattā idheva kilese khepeti, eko indriyānaṃ dubbalattā idha asakkonto anantare attabhāve tadeva mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ paṭilabhitvā asaṅkhārena appayogena kilese khepetīti veditabbo.

[03] 170^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^samathapubbaṅgama^eb^nti samathaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ purecārikaṃ katvā. ^b^maggo sañjāyatī^eb^ti paṭhamo lokuttaramaggo nibbattati. ^b^so^eb^ ^a^P3.0143^ea^ ^b^taṃ magga^eb^nti ekacittakkhaṇikamaggassa āsevanādīni nāma natthi, dutiyamaggādayo pana uppādento tameva āsevati bhāveti bahulīkarotīti vuccati. ^b^vipassanāpubbaṅgama^eb^nti vipassanaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ purecārikaṃ katvā samathaṃ bhāveti, pakatiyā vipassanālābhī vipassanāya ṭhatvā samādhiṃ uppādetīti attho.

[03] ^b^yuganaddhaṃ bhāvetī^eb^ti yuganaddhaṃ katvā bhāveti. tattha teneva cittena samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā teneva saṅkhāre sammasituṃ na sakkā. ayaṃ pana yāvatā samāpattiyo samāpajjati, tāvatā saṅkhāre sammasati. yāvatā saṅkhāre sammasati, tāvatā samāpattiyo samāpajjati. kathaṃ? paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjati, tato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasati, saṅkhāre sammasitvā dutiyajjhānaṃ samāpajjati. tato vuṭṭhāya puna saṅkhāre sammasati. saṅkhāre sammasitvā ^a^V2.0344^ea^ tatiyajjhānaṃ...pe0... nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati, tato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasati. evamayaṃ samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāveti nāma.

[03] ^b^dhammuddhaccaviggahita^eb^nti samathavipassanādhammesu dasavipassanupakkilesasaṅkhātena uddhaccena viggahitaṃ, suggahitanti attho. ^b^so, āvuso, samayo^eb^ti iminā sattannaṃ sappāyānaṃ paṭilābhakālo kathito. ^b^yaṃ taṃ citta^eb^nti yasmiṃ samaye taṃ vipassanāvīthiṃ okkamitvā pavattaṃ cittaṃ. ^b^ajjhattameva^eb^ ^a^M2.0347^ea^ ^b^santiṭṭhatī^eb^ti vipassanāvīthiṃ paccottharitvā ^a^P3.0144^ea^ tasmiṃyeva gocarajjhattasaṅkhāte ārammaṇe santiṭṭhati. ^b^sannisīdatī^eb^ti ārammaṇavasena sammā nisīdati. ^b^ekodi hotī^eb^ti ekaggaṃ hoti. ^b^samādhiyatī^eb^ti sammā ādhiyati suṭṭhapitaṃ hoti. sesamettha uttānatthameva.
[06] paṭipadāvaggo dutiyo.

[03] 171^b^.^eb^ tatiyassa ^a^V2.0345^ea^ paṭhame ^b^kāye^eb^ti kāyadvāre, kāyaviññattiyā satīti attho. ^b^kāyasañcetanāhetū^eb^tiādīsu kāyasañcetanā nāma kāyadvāre cetanā pakappanā. sā aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalavasena aṭṭhavidhā, akusalavasena dvādasavidhāti vīsatividhā. tathā vacīsañcetanā, tathā manosañcetanā. apicettha nava mahaggatacetanāpi labbhanti. ^b^kāyasañcetanāhetū^eb^ti kāyasañcetanāpaccayā. ^b^uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhadukkha^eb^nti aṭṭhakusalakammapaccayā niyakajjhatte sukhaṃ uppajjati, dvādasākusalakammapaccayā dukkhaṃ. sesadvāresupi eseva nayo. ^b^avijjāpaccayāvā^eb^ti avijjākāraṇeneva. sace hi avijjā chādayamānā paccayo hoti, evaṃ sante tīsu dvāresu sukhadukkhānaṃ paccayabhūtā cetanā uppajjati. iti mūlabhūtāya avijjāya vasenetaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^sāmaṃ vā^eb^tiādīsu parehi anāṇatto sayameva abhisaṅkharonto ^a^P3.0145^ea^ sāmaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti nāma. yaṃ pana pare samādapetvā āṇāpetvā kārenti, tassa taṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ pare abhisaṅkharonti nāma. yo pana kusalaṃ kusalanti akusalaṃ akusalanti kusalavipākaṃ kusalavipākoti akusalavipākaṃ akusalavipākoti jānanto kāyadvāre vīsatividhaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti, ayaṃ sampajāno abhisaṅkharoti nāma. yo evaṃ ajānanto abhisaṅkharoti, ayaṃ asampajāno abhisaṅkharoti nāma. sesadvāresupi eseva nayo.

[03] tattha ^a^M2.0348^ea^ asampajānakammaṃ evaṃ veditabbaṃ -- daharadārakā ``mātāpitūhi kataṃ karomā''ti cetiyaṃ vandanti, pupphapūjaṃ karonti, bhikkhusaṅghaṃ vandanti, tesaṃ kusalanti ajānantānampi taṃ kusalameva hoti. tathā migapakkhiādayo tiracchānā dhammaṃ suṇanti, saṅghaṃ vandanti, cetiyaṃ vandanti, tesaṃ jānantānampi ajānantānampi taṃ kusalameva hoti. daharadārakā pana mātāpitaro hatthapādehi paharanti, bhikkhūnaṃ talasattikaṃ uggiranti, daṇḍaṃ khipanti, akkosanti ^a^V2.0346^ea^. gāviyo bhikkhusaṅghaṃ anubandhanti, sunakhā anubandhanti, ḍaṃsanti, sīhabyagghādayo anubandhanti, jīvitā voropenti. tesaṃ jānantānampi ajānantānampi akusalakammaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.

[03] idāni tīsupi dvāresu āyūhanacetanā samodhānetabbā. seyyathidaṃ -- kāyadvāre sayaṃkatamūlikā vīsati cetanā, āṇattimūlikā vīsati, sampajānamūlikā vīsati, asampajānamūlikā vīsatīti asīti cetanā honti, tathā vacīdvāre. manodvāre ^a^P3.0146^ea^ pana ekekasmimpi vikappe ekūnatiṃsa katvā satañca soḷasa ca honti. iti sabbāpi tīsu dvāresu dve satāni chasattati ca cetanā. tā sabbāpi saṅkhārakkhandhoteva saṅkhaṃ gacchanti, taṃsampayutto vedayitākāro vedanākkhandho, sañjānanākāro saññākkhandho, cittaṃ viññāṇakkhandho, kāyo upādārūpaṃ, tassa paccayā catasso dhātuyo cattāri bhūtānīti ime pañcakkhandhā dukkhasaccaṃ nāma.

[03] ^b^imesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu avijjā anupatitā^eb^ti imesu vuttappabhedesu cetanādhammesu avijjā sahajātavasena ca upanissayavasena ca anupatitā. evaṃ vaṭṭañceva vaṭṭamūlikā ca avijjā dassitā hoti.

[03] ettāvatā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pattassa khīṇāsavassa idāni thutiṃ karonto ^b^avijjāyatveva asesavirāganirodhā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^asesavirāganirodhā^eb^ti asesavirāgena ceva asesanirodhena ca. ^b^so kāyo na hotī^eb^ti khīṇāsavassa kāyena karaṇakammaṃ paññāyati, cetiyaṅgaṇasammajjanaṃ bodhiyaṅgaṇasammajjanaṃ abhikkamanaṃ paṭikkamanaṃ vattānuvattakaraṇanti evamādi. kāyadvāre panassa vīsati cetanā avipākadhammataṃ ^a^M2.0349^ea^ āpajjanti. tena vuttaṃ -- ``so kāyo na hoti, yaṃ paccayāssa taṃ uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhadukkha''nti. kāyadvārappavattā hi cetanā idha kāyoti adhippetā. sesadvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^khetta^eb^ntiādīnipi ^a^P3.0147^ea^ kusalākusalakammasseva nāmāni. tañhi vipākassa viruhanaṭṭhānaṭṭhena khettaṃ, patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vatthu, kāraṇaṭṭhena āyatanaṃ, adhikaraṇaṭṭhena adhikaraṇanti vuccati.

[03] iti satthā ettakena ṭhānena tīhi dvārehi āyūhitakammaṃ dassetvā idāni tassa kammassa ^a^V2.0347^ea^ vipaccanaṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^cattārome bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^attabhāvappaṭilābhā^eb^ti paṭiladdhāttabhāvā. ^b^attasañcetanā kamatī^eb^ti attanā pakappitacetanā vahati pavattati.

[03] ^b^attasañcetanāhetu tesaṃ sattānaṃ tamhā kāyā cuti hotī^eb^tiādīsu khiḍḍāpadosikā devā ^b^attasañcetanāhetu^eb^ cavanti. tesañhi nandanavanacittalatāvanaphārusakavanādīsu dibbaratisamappitānaṃ kīḷantānaṃ pānabhojane sati sammussati, te āhārupacchedena ātape khittamālā viya milāyanti. manopadosikā devā ^b^parasañcetanāhetu^eb^ cavanti, ete cātumahārājikā devā. tesu kira eko devaputto ``nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmī''ti saparivāro rathena vīthiṃ paṭipajjati. athañño nikkhamanto taṃ purato gacchantaṃ disvā ``kiṃ, bho, ayaṃ kapaṇo adiṭṭhapubbaṃ viya etaṃ disvā pītiyā uddhumāto viya gajjamāno viya ca gacchatī''ti kujjhati. purato gacchantopi nivattitvā taṃ kuddhaṃ disvā kuddhā nāma suvijānā hontīti kuddhabhāvamassa ñatvā ``tvaṃ kuddho ^a^P3.0148^ea^ mayhaṃ kiṃ karissasi, ayaṃ sampatti mayā dānasīlādīnaṃ vasena laddhā, na tuyhaṃ vasenā''ti paṭikujjhati. ekasmiñhi kuddhe itaro akuddho rakkhati, ubhosu pana kuddhesu ekassa kodho itarassa paccayo hoti, tassapi kodho itarassa paccayo hotīti ubho kandantānaṃyeva orodhānaṃ cavanti. manussā ^b^attasañcetanā ca parasañcetanā ca hetu^eb^ cavanti, attasañcetanāya ca parasañcetanāya ca hetubhūtāya cavantīti attho. manussā hi kujjhitvā attanāva attānaṃ hatthehipi daṇḍehipi paharanti, rajjubandhanādīhipi bandhanti, asināpi sīsaṃ chindanti, visampi khādanti, papātepi patanti, udakampi pavisanti, aggimpi pavisanti, parepi daṇḍena vā satthane vā paharitvā mārenti. evaṃ tesu attasañcetanāpi parasañcetanāpi kamati.

[03] ^b^katame^eb^ ^a^M2.0350^ea^ ^b^tena devā daṭṭhabbā^eb^ti katame nāma te devā daṭṭhabbāti attho. tena vā attabhāvena katame devā daṭṭhabbātipi attho. kasmā pana thero imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchati, kiṃ attanā kathetuṃ nappahotīti? pahoti, idaṃ pana padaṃ attano sabhāvena buddhavisayaṃ pañhanti thero na kathesi. ^b^tena daṭṭhabbā^eb^ti tena attabhāvena daṭṭhabbā. ayaṃ pana pañho heṭṭhā kāmāvacarepi rūpāvacarepi labbhati, bhavaggena pana paricchinditvā kathito nippadesena kathito hotīti bhagavatā evaṃ kathito.

[03] ^b^āgantāro^eb^ ^a^V2.0348^ea^ ^b^itthatta^eb^nti itthabhāvaṃ kāmāvacarapañcakkhandhabhāvameva ^a^P3.0149^ea^ āgantāro, neva tatrūpapattikā na uparūpapattikā honti. ^b^anāgantāro itthatta^eb^nti imaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ anāgantāro, heṭṭhūpapattikā na honti, tatrūpapattikā vā uparūpapattikā vā tattheva vā parinibbāyino hontīti attho. ettha ca heṭṭhimabhave nibbattānaṃ vasena uparūpapattikā veditabbā. bhavagge panetaṃ natthi. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.

[03] 172^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^atthapaṭisambhidā^eb^ti pañcasu atthesu pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ. ^b^odhiso^eb^ti kāraṇaso. ^b^byañjanaso^eb^ti akkharaso. ^b^anekapariyāyenā^eb^ti anekehi kāraṇehi. ^b^ācikkhāmī^eb^ti kathemi. ^b^desemī^eb^ti pākaṭaṃ katvā kathemi. ^b^paññāpemī^eb^ti jānāpemi. ^b^paṭṭhapemī^eb^ti paṭṭhapetvā pavattetvā kathemi. ^b^vivarāmī^eb^ti vivaṭaṃ katvā kathemi. ^b^vibhajāmī^eb^ti vibhajitvā kathemi. ^b^uttānīkaromī^eb^ti gambhīraṃ uttānakaṃ katvā kathemi. ^b^so maṃ pañhenā^eb^ti so maṃ pañhena upagacchatu. ^b^ahaṃ veyyākaraṇenā^eb^ti ahamassa pañhakathanena cittaṃ ārādhessāmi. ^b^yo no dhammānaṃ sukusalo^eb^ti yo amhākaṃ adhigatadhammānaṃ ^a^P3.0150^ea^ sukusalo satthā, so esa sammukhībhūto. yadi mayā atthapaṭisambhidā na sacchikatā, ``sacchikarohi tāva sāriputtā''ti vatvā maṃ paṭibāhissatīti satthu purato nisinnakova sīhanādaṃ nadati. iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo. imāsu ca pana paṭisambhidāsu tisso paṭisambhidā lokiyā, atthapaṭisambhidā lokiyalokuttarāti.

[03] 173^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^M2.0351^ea^ ^b^phassāyatanāna^eb^nti phassākarānaṃ, phassassa uppattiṭṭhānānanti attho. ^b^atthaññaṃ kiñcī^eb^ti etesu asesato niruddhesu tato paraṃ koci appamattakopi kileso atthīti pucchati. ^b^natthaññaṃ kiñcī^eb^ti idhāpi ``appamattakopi kileso natthī''ti pucchati. sesadvayepi eseva nayo. ime pana cattāropi pañhe sassatucchedaekaccasassatāmarāvikkhepavasena pucchati. tenassa thero pucchitapucchitaṃ paṭibāhanto ^b^mā heva^eb^nti āha. ettha ^b^hi^eb^iti nipātamattaṃ, evaṃ mā bhaṇīti attho. attūpaladdhivaseneva ``atthaññaṃ kiñci añño ^a^V2.0349^ea^ koci attā nāma atthī''ti sassatādiākārena pucchati. kiṃ panesa attūpaladdhikoti? na attūpaladdhiko. evaṃladdhiko pana tattheko bhikkhu nisinno, so pucchituṃ na sakkoti. tassa laddhiṃ vissajjāpanatthaṃ evaṃ pucchati. yepi ca anāgate evaṃladdhikā bhavissanti, tesaṃ ``buddhakālepeso pañho mahāsāvakehi vissajjito''ti vacanokāsupacchedanatthaṃ pucchatiyeva.

[03] ^b^appapañcaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0151^ea^ ^b^papañcetī^eb^ti na papañcetabbaṭṭhāne papañcaṃ karoti, anācaritabbaṃ maggaṃ carati. ^b^tāvatā papañcassa gatī^eb^ti yattakā channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ gati, tattakāva taṇhādiṭṭhimānappabhedassa papañcassa gati. ^b^channaṃ, āvuso, phassāyatanānaṃ asesavirāganirodhā papañcanirodho papañcavūpasamo^eb^ti etesu chasu āyatanesu sabbaso niruddhesu papañcāpi niruddhāva honti, vūpasantāva hontīti attho. āruppe pana puthujjanadevatānaṃ kiñcāpi pañca phassāyatanāni niruddhāni, chaṭṭhassa pana aniruddhattā tayopi papañcā appahīnāva. apica pañcavokārabhavavaseneva pañho kathitoti. catutthe imināva nayena attho veditabbo.

[03] 175-176^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^vijjāyantakaro hotī^eb^ti vijjāya vaṭṭadukkhassa antakaro hoti, sakalaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ paricchinnaṃ parivaṭumaṃ katvā tiṭṭhatīti. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^saupādāno^eb^ti sagahaṇova hutvā. ^b^antakaro abhavissā^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ katvā ṭhito abhavissa. ^b^caraṇasampanno^eb^ti pannarasadhammabhedena caraṇena samannāgato. ^b^yathābhūtaṃ jānaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0352^ea^ ^b^passaṃ antakaro hotī^eb^ti yathāsabhāvaṃ maggapaññāya jānitvā passitvā vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ katvā ṭhito nāma hotīti arahattanikūṭena pañhaṃ niṭṭhapesi. chaṭṭhaṃ heṭṭhā ekakanipātavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] 177^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^P3.0152^ea^ ^b^ajjhattikā^eb^ti kesādīsu vīsatiyā koṭṭhāsesu thaddhākāralakkhaṇā pathavīdhātu. ^b^bāhirā^eb^ti bahiddhā anindriyabaddhesu pāsāṇapabbatādīsu thaddhākāralakkhaṇā pathavīdhātu ^a^V2.0350^ea^. imināva nayena sesāpi dhātuyo veditabbā. ^b^netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā^eb^ti idaṃ tayaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāhapaṭikkhepavasena vuttaṃ. ^b^sammappaññāya daṭṭhabba^eb^nti hetunā kāraṇena maggapaññāya passitabbaṃ. ^b^disvā^eb^ti sahavipassanāya maggapaññāya passitvā. ^b^acchecchi taṇha^eb^nti maggavajjhataṇhaṃ samūlakaṃ chindi. ^b^vivattayi saṃyojana^eb^nti dasavidhampi saṃyojanaṃ vivattayi ubbattetvā pajahi. ^b^sammā mānābhisamayā^eb^ti hetunā kāraṇena navavidhassa mānassa pahānābhisamayā. ^b^antamakāsi dukkhassā^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhaṃ paricchinnaṃ parivaṭumaṃ akāsi, katvā ṭhitoti attho. iti satthārā saṃyuttamahānikāye rāhulovāde (saṃ0 ni0 3.91 ādayo) vipassanā kathitā, cūḷarāhulovādepi (ma0 ni0 3.416 ādayo) vipassanā kathitā, ambalaṭṭhikarāhulovāde (ma0 ni0 2.107 ādayo) daharasseva sato musāvādā veramaṇī kathitā, mahārāhulovāde (ma0 ni0 2.113 ādayo) vipassanā kathitā. imasmiṃ aṅguttaramahānikāye ayaṃ catukoṭikasuññatā nāma kathitāti.

[03] 178^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^P3.0153^ea^ ^b^santaṃ cetovimutti^eb^nti aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ aññataraṃ samāpattiṃ. ^b^sakkāyanirodha^eb^nti tebhūmakavaṭṭasaṅkhātassa sakkāyassa nirodhaṃ, nibbānanti attho. ^b^na pakkhandatī^eb^ti ārammaṇavasena na pakkhandati. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^na pāṭikaṅkho^eb^ti na pāṭikaṅkhitabbo. ^b^lepagatenā^eb^ti lepamakkhitena.

[03] imasmiñca ^a^M2.0353^ea^ panatthe nadīpāraṃ gantukāmapurisopammaṃ āharitabbaṃ -- eko kira puriso caṇḍasotāya vāḷamacchākulāya nadiyā pāraṃ gantukāmo ``orimaṃ tīraṃ sāsaṅkaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ, pārimaṃ tīraṃ khemaṃ appaṭibhayaṃ, kiṃ nu kho katvā pāraṃ gamissāmī''ti paṭipāṭiyā ṭhite aṭṭha kakudharukkhe disvā ``sakkā imāya rukkhapaṭipāṭiyā gantu''nti manasikatvā ``kakudharukkhā nāma maṭṭhasākhā honti, sākhāya hatthā na saṇṭhaheyyu''nti nigrodhapilakkharukkhādīnaṃ aññatarassa lākhāya hatthapāde makkhetvā dakkhiṇahatthena ekaṃ sākhaṃ gaṇhi. hattho tattheva lagi. puna vāmahatthena dakkhiṇapādena vāmapādenāti cattāropi hatthapādā tattheva lagiṃsu. so adhosiro lambamāno uparinadiyaṃ deve vuṭṭhe puṇṇāya nadiyā sote nimuggo kumbhīlādīnaṃ bhakkho ahosi.

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0351^ea^ nadīsotaṃ viya saṃsārasotaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, sotassa pāraṃ gantukāmapuriso viya yogāvacaro, orimatīraṃ viya sakkāyo, pārimatīraṃ viya nibbānaṃ, paṭipāṭiyā ṭhitā aṭṭha kakudharukkhā viya aṭṭha samāpattiyo, lepamakkhitena ^a^P3.0154^ea^ hatthena sākhāgahaṇaṃ viya jhānavipassanānaṃ pāripanthike asodhetvā samāpattisamāpajjanaṃ, catūhi hatthapādehi sākhāya baddhassa olambanaṃ viya paṭhamajjhāne nikantiyā laggakālo, uparisote vuṭṭhi viya chasu dvāresu kilesānaṃ uppannakālo, nadiyā puṇṇāya sote nimuggassa kumbhīlādīnaṃ bhakkhabhūtakālo viya saṃsārasote nimuggassa catūsu apāyesu dukkhānubhavanakālo veditabbo.

[03] ^b^suddhena hatthenā^eb^ti sudhotena parisuddhahatthena. imasmimpi atthe tādisameva opammaṃ kātabbaṃ -- tatheva hi pāraṃ gantukāmo puriso ``kakudharukkhā nāma maṭṭhasākhā, kiliṭṭhahatthena gaṇhantassa hattho parigaleyyā''ti hatthapāde sudhote katvā ekaṃ sākhaṃ gaṇhitvā paṭhamaṃ rukkhaṃ āruḷho. tato otaritvā dutiyaṃ...pe0... tato otaritvā aṭṭhamaṃ, aṭṭhamarukkhato otaritvā pārimatīre khemantabhūmiṃ gato.

[03] tattha ``imehi rukkhehi pārimatīraṃ gamissāmī''ti tassa purisassa cintitakālo viya yogino ``aṭṭha samāpattiyo samāpajjitvā samāpattito ^a^M2.0354^ea^ vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ gamissāmī''ti cintitakālo, suddhena hatthena sākhāgahaṇaṃ viya jhānavipassanānaṃ pāripanthikadhamme sodhetvā samāpattisamāpajjanaṃ. tattha paṭhamarukkhārohaṇakālo viya paṭhamajjhānasamāpattikālo, paṭhamarukkhato oruyha dutiyaṃ ^a^P3.0155^ea^ āruḷhakālo viya paṭhamajjhāne nikantiyā abaddhassa tato vuṭṭhāya dutiyajjhānasamāpannakālo...pe0... sattamarukkhato oruyha aṭṭhamaṃ āruḷhakālo viya ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiyaṃ nikantiyā abaddhassa tato vuṭṭhāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpannakālo. aṭṭhamarukkhato oruyha pārimatīraṃ khemantabhūmiṃ gatakālo viya nevasaññānāsaññāyatane nikantiyā abaddhassa samāpattito vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasitvā arahattappattakālo veditabbo.

[03] ^b^avijjāppabhedaṃ manasi karotī^eb^ti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu aññāṇabhūtāya gaṇabahalamahāavijjāya pabhedasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ manasi karoti. ^b^na pakkhandatī^eb^ti ārammaṇavaseneva na pakkhandati. ^b^jambālī^eb^ti gāmato nikkhantassa mahāudakassa patiṭṭhānabhūto mahāāvāṭo. ^b^anekavassagaṇikā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0352^ea^ gāmassa vā nagarassa vā uppannakāleyeva uppannattā anekāni vassagaṇāni uppannāya etissāti anekavassagaṇikā. ^b^āyamukhānī^eb^ti catasso pavisanakandarā. ^b^apāyamukhānī^eb^ti apavāhanacchiddāni. ^b^na āḷippabhedo pāṭikaṅkho^eb^ti na pāḷippabhedo pāṭikaṅkhitabbo. na hi tato udakaṃ uṭṭhāya pāḷiṃ bhinditvā kacavaraṃ gahetvā mahāsamuddaṃ pāpuṇāti.

[03] imassa panatthassa vibhāvanatthaṃ uyyānagavesakaopammaṃ āharitabbaṃ. eko ^a^P3.0156^ea^ kira nagaravāsiko kulaputto uyyānaṃ gavesanto nagarato nātidūre naccāsanne mahantaṃ jambāliṃ addasa. so ``imasmiṃ ṭhāne ramaṇīyaṃ uyyānaṃ bhavissatī''ti sallakkhetvā kuddālaṃ ādāya cattāripi kandarāni pidhāya apavāhanacchiddāni vivaritvā aṭṭhāsi. devo na sammā vassi, avasesaudakaṃ apavāhanacchiddena parissavitvā gataṃ. cammakhaṇḍapilotikādīni tattheva pūtikāni jātāni, pāṇakā saṇṭhitā, samantā anupagamanīyā jātā. upagatānampi nāsāpuṭe pidhāya pakkamitabbaṃ hoti ^a^M2.0355^ea^. so katipāhena āgantvā paṭikkamma ṭhito oloketvā ``na sakkā upagantu''nti pakkāmi.

[03] tattha nagaravāsī kulaputto viya yogāvacaro daṭṭhabbo, uyyānaṃ gavesantena gāmadvāre jambāliyā diṭṭhakālo viya cātumahābhūtikakāyo, āyamukhānaṃ pihitakālo viya dhammassavanodakassa aladdhakālo, apāyamukhānaṃ vivaṭakālo viya chadvārikasaṃvarassa vissaṭṭhakālo, devassa sammā avuṭṭhakālo viya sappāyakammaṭṭhānassa aladdhakālo, avasesaudakassa apāyamukhehi parissavitvā gatakālo viya abbhantare guṇānaṃ parihīnakālo, udakassa uṭṭhāya pāḷiṃ bhinditvā kacavaraṃ ādāya mahāsamuddaṃ pāpuṇituṃ asamatthakālo viya arahattamaggena avijjāpāḷiṃ bhinditvā kilesarāsiṃ vidhamitvā nibbānaṃ sacchikātuṃ asamatthakālo, cammakhaṇḍapilotikādīnaṃ tattheva pūtibhāvo viya abbhantare rāgādikilesehi paripūritakālo, tassa āgantvā disvā ^a^P3.0157^ea^ vippaṭisārino gatakālo viya vaṭṭasamaṅgipuggalassa vaṭṭe abhiratakālo veditabbo.
[03] ^b^āḷippabhedo pāṭikaṅkho^eb^ti pāḷippabhedo pāṭikaṅkhitabbo. tato hi udakaṃ uṭṭhāya pāḷiṃ bhinditvā kacavaraṃ ādāya mahāsamuddaṃ pāpuṇituṃ sakkhissatīti attho.

[03] idhāpi ^a^V2.0353^ea^ tadeva opammaṃ āharitabbaṃ. tattha āyamukhānaṃ vivaṭakālo viya sappāyadhammassavanassa laddhakālo, apāyamukhānaṃ pihitakālo viya chasu dvāresu saṃvarassa paccupaṭṭhitakālo, devassa sammā vuṭṭhakālo viya sappāyakammaṭṭhānassa laddhakālo, udakassa uṭṭhāya pāḷiṃ bhinditvā kacavaraṃ ādāya mahāsamuddaṃ pattakālo viya arahattamaggena avijjaṃ bhinditvā akusalarāsiṃ vidhamitvā arahattaṃ sacchikatakālo, āyamukhehi paviṭṭhena udakena sarassa paripuṇṇakālo viya abbhantare lokuttaradhammehi paripuṇṇakālo, samantato vatiṃ katvā rukkhe ropetvā uyyānamajjhe pāsādaṃ māpetvā nāṭakāni paccupaṭṭhapetvā subhojanaṃ bhuñjantassa nisinnakālo viya dhammapāsādaṃ āruyha ^a^M2.0356^ea^ nibbānārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā nisinnakālo veditabbo. sesamettha uttānatthameva. desanā pana lokiyalokuttaramissikā kathitāti.

[03] 179^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^hānabhāgiyā saññā^eb^tiādīsu ``paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhiṃ kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti, hānabhāginī paññā''ti (vibha0 799) abhidhamme vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. ^b^yathābhūtaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0158^ea^ ^b^nappajānantī^eb^ti yathāsabhāvato maggañāṇena na jānanti.

[03] 180^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^bhoganagare viharatī^eb^ti parinibbānasamaye cārikaṃ caranto taṃ nagaraṃ patvā tattha viharati. ^b^ānandacetiye^eb^ti ānandayakkhassa bhavanaṭṭhāne patiṭṭhitavihāre. ^b^mahāpadese^eb^ti mahāokāse mahāapadese vā, buddhādayo mahante mahante apadisitvā vuttāni mahākāraṇānīti attho. ^b^neva abhinanditabba^eb^nti haṭṭhatuṭṭhehi sādhukāraṃ datvā pubbeva na sotabbaṃ. evaṃ kate hi pacchā ``idaṃ na sametī''ti vuccamānopi ``kiṃ pubbeva ayaṃ dhammo, idāni na dhammo''ti vatvā laddhiṃ na vissajjeti. ^b^nappaṭikkositabba^eb^nti ``kiṃ esa bālo vadatī''ti evaṃ pubbeva na vattabbaṃ. evaṃ vutte hi vattuṃ yuttampi na vakkhati. tenāha -- ^b^anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā^eb^ti. ^b^padabyañjanānī^eb^ti padasaṅkhātāni byañjanāni. ^b^sādhukaṃ uggahetvā^eb^ti ``imasmiṃ ṭhāne pāḷi vuttā, imasmiṃ ṭhāne attho vutto, imasmiṃ ṭhāne anusandhi kathitā ^a^V2.0354^ea^, imasmiṃ ṭhāne pubbāparaṃ kathita''nti suṭṭhu gahetvā. ^b^sutte otāretabbānī^eb^ti sutte otaritabbāni. ^b^vinaye sandassetabbānī^eb^ti vinaye saṃsandetabbāni.

[03] ettha ca ^b^sutta^eb^nti vinayo vutto. yathāha -- ``kattha paṭikkhittaṃ, sāvatthiyaṃ suttavibhaṅge''ti (cūḷava0 457) ^b^vinayo^eb^ti khandhako. yathāha -- ``vinayātisāre''ti. evaṃ vinayapiṭakampi na pariyādiyati. ubhatovibhaṅgā pana ^a^P3.0159^ea^ suttaṃ, khandhakaparivārā ^a^M2.0357^ea^ vinayoti evaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ pariyādiyati. atha vā suttantapiṭakaṃ suttaṃ, vinayapiṭakaṃ vinayoti evaṃ dveyeva piṭakāni pariyādiyanti. suttantābhidhammapiṭakāni vā suttaṃ, vinayapiṭakaṃ vinayoti evampi tīṇi piṭakāni na tāva pariyādiyanti. asuttanāmakañhi buddhavacanaṃ nāma atthi. seyyathidaṃ -- jātakaṃ paṭisambhidā niddeso suttanipāto dhammapadaṃ udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ vimānavatthu petavatthu theragāthā therīgāthā apadānanti.
[03] sudinnatthero pana ``asuttanāmakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ natthī''ti taṃ sabbaṃ paṭikkhipitvā ``tīṇi piṭakāni suttaṃ, vinayo pana kāraṇa''nti āha. tato taṃ kāraṇaṃ dassento idaṃ suttamāhari --

[02] ``ye kho tvaṃ, gotami, dhamme jāneyyāsi, ime dhammā sarāgāya saṃvattanti no virāgāya, saṃyogāya saṃvattanti no visaṃyogāya, saupādānāya saṃvattanti no anupādānāya, mahicchatāya saṃvattanti no appicchatāya, asantuṭṭhiyā saṃvattanti no santuṭṭhiyā, kosajjāya saṃvattanti no vīriyārambhāya, saṅgaṇikāya saṃvattanti no pavivekāya, ācayāya saṃvattanti no apacayāya. ekaṃsena, gotami, jāneyyāsi `neso dhammo neso vinayo netaṃ satthu sāsana'nti.

[02] ``ye ca kho tvaṃ, gotami, dhamme jāneyyāsi, ime dhammā virāgāya saṃvattanti no sarāgāya, visaṃyogāya saṃvattanti no saṃyogāya. anupādānāya saṃvattanti no saupādānāya, appicchatāya saṃvattanti no mahicchatāya, santuṭṭhiyā saṃvattanti no asantuṭṭhiyā, vīriyārambhāya saṃvattanti no kosajjāya, pavivekāya saṃvattanti no saṅgaṇikāya, apacayāya saṃvattanti no ācayāya. ekaṃsena, gotami ^a^P3.0160^ea^, jāneyyāsi `eso ^a^V2.0355^ea^ dhammo eso vinayo etaṃ satthu sāsana'''nti (cūḷava0 406; a0 ni0 8.53).

[03] tasmā ^b^sutte^eb^ti tepiṭakabuddhavacane otāretabbāni. ^b^vinaye^eb^ti etasmiṃ rāgādivinayakāraṇe saṃsandetabbānīti ayamettha attho. ^b^na ceva sutte otarantī^eb^ti suttapaṭipāṭiyā katthaci anāgantvā challiṃ uṭṭhapetvā ^a^M2.0358^ea^ guḷhavessantara-guḷhaummagga-guḷhavinayavedallapiṭakānaṃ aññatarato āgatāni paññāyantīti attho. evaṃ āgatāni hi rāgādivinaye ca apaññāyamānāni chaḍḍetabbāni honti. tena vuttaṃ -- ``iti hidaṃ, bhikkhave, chaḍḍeyyāthā''ti. etenupāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo. ^b^idaṃ, bhikkhave, catutthaṃ mahāpadesaṃ dhāreyyāthā^eb^ti imaṃ, bhikkhave, catutthaṃ dhammassa patiṭṭhānokāsaṃ dhāreyyāthāti.
[06] sañcetaniyavaggo tatiyo.
[03] 181^b^.^eb^ catutthassa ^a^V2.0356^ea^ paṭhame ^b^ṭhānakusalo^eb^ti yena ṭhānena ṭhito avirādhetvā vijjhituṃ sakkoti, tasmiṃ ṭhāne kusalo. sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
[03] 182^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^natthi koci pāṭibhogo^eb^ti ahaṃ te pāṭibhogoti evaṃ pāṭibhogo bhavituṃ samattho nāma natthi. ^b^jarādhamma^eb^nti jarāsabhāvaṃ. esa nayo sabbattha.
[03] 183^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^P3.0161^ea^ ^b^natthi tato doso^eb^ti tasmiṃ doso nāma natthīti attho.

[03] 184^b^.^eb^ catutthe kicchājīvitakāraṇaṭṭhena rogova ^b^rogātaṅko^eb^ nāma. ^b^phuṭṭhassā^eb^ti tena rogātaṅkena samannāgatassa. ^b^urattāḷiṃ kandatī^eb^ti uraṃ tāḷetvā rodati. ^b^akatakalyāṇo^eb^tiādīsu kalyāṇaṃ vuccati puññakammaṃ ^a^M2.0359^ea^, taṃ akataṃ etenāti akatakalyāṇo. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. puññakammameva hi kosallasambhūtattā ^b^kusalaṃ,^eb^ bhītassa parittāyakattā ^b^bhīruttāṇa^eb^nti vuccati. ^b^katapāpo^eb^tiādīsu pāpaṃ vuccati lāmakaṃ akusalakammaṃ. ^b^ludda^eb^nti kakkhaḷakammaṃ. ^b^kibbisa^eb^nti samalaṃ aparisuddhakammaṃ. ^b^kaṅkhī hotī^eb^ti buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇesu ceva sikkhāya ca pubbante ca aparante ca pubbantāparante ca paṭiccasamuppāde cāti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu kaṅkhāya samannāgato ^a^V2.0357^ea^ hoti. ^b^vicikicchī^eb^ti vicikicchāya samannāgato sāsanasaddhamme na niṭṭhaṃ gato, uggahaparipucchāvasena niṭṭhaṃ gantuṃ na sakkoti. iminā nayena sabbattha attho veditabbo.

[03] 185^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^brāhmaṇasaccānī^eb^ti brāhmaṇānaṃ saccāni tathāni. ^b^so tena na samaṇoti maññatī^eb^ti so khīṇāsavo tena saccena ``ahaṃ samaṇo''ti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi na maññati. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^yadeva tattha saccaṃ, tadabhiññāyā^eb^ti yaṃ tattha ``sabbe pāṇā ^a^P3.0162^ea^ avajjhā''ti paṭipattiyā saccaṃ tathaṃ aviparītaṃ. iminā vacīsaccaṃ abbhantaraṃ katvā paramatthasaccaṃ nibbānaṃ dasseti. ^b^tadabhiññāyā^eb^ti taṃ ubhayampi abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya jānitvā. ^b^anuddayāya anukampāya paṭipanno hotī^eb^ti anuddayatthāya ca anukampatthāya ca yā paṭipadā, taṃ paṭipanno hoti, pūretvā ṭhitoti attho. sesapaṭipadāsupi eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^sabbe kāmā^eb^ti sabbe vatthukāmakilesakāmā. ^b^iti vadaṃ brāhmaṇo saccamāhā^eb^ti evampi vadanto khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo saccameva āha. ^b^sabbe bhavā^eb^ti kāmabhavādayo tayopi. ^b^nāhaṃ kvacanī^eb^ti ettha pana catukkoṭikasuññatā kathitā. ayañhi ``nāhaṃ kvacanī''ti kvaci attānaṃ na passati, ^b^kassaci kiñcanatasmi^eb^nti attano attānaṃ kassaci parassa kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ na passati, bhātiṭṭhāne bhātaraṃ, sahāyaṭṭhāne sahāyaṃ, parikkhāraṭṭhāne vā parikkhāraṃ maññitvā upanetabbaṃ na passatīti attho. ^b^na ca mama kvacanī^eb^ti ettha mamasaddaṃ tāva ṭhapetvā ``na ca kvacani parassa ca attānaṃ kvaci na passatī''ti ayamattho. idāni ``mamasaddaṃ āharitvā ^a^M2.0360^ea^ mama kismiñci kiñcanaṃ natthī''ti so parassa attā mama kismiñci kiñcanabhāve atthīti na passati, attano bhātiṭṭhāne bhātaraṃ, sahāyaṭṭhāne ^a^P3.0163^ea^ sahāyaṃ, parikkhāraṭṭhāne vā parikkhāranti kismiñci ṭhāne parassa attānaṃ iminā kiñcanabhāvena upanetabbaṃ na passatīti attho. evamayaṃ yasmā neva katthaci attānaṃ passati, na taṃ parassa kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ passati, na parassa attānaṃ passati, na parassa attānaṃ attano kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ passatīti. ^b^iti vadaṃ brāhmaṇo^eb^ti evaṃ catukkoṭikaṃ suññataṃ vadantopi khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo tassā paṭipadāya sammā paṭividdhattā saccameva āha, na musāti sabbesupi vāresu maññanānaṃ pahīnattāyeva na maññatīti ca attho veditabbo. ^b^ākiñcaññaṃyeva^eb^ ^a^V2.0358^ea^ ^b^paṭipada^eb^nti kiñcanabhāvavirahitaṃ nippalibodhaṃ niggahaṇameva paṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti pūretvā ṭhito.

[03] ^b^imāni kho paribbājakā cattāri brāhmaṇasaccāni mayā sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā paveditānī^eb^ti yāni tumhe bhovādibrāhmaṇānaṃ saccāni vadetha, tehi aññāni mayā imāni bāhitapāpabrāhmaṇassa cattāri saccāni catūhi maggehi soḷasavidhena kiccena jānitvā paccakkhaṃ katvā paveditāni desitāni jotitānīti attho. iti imasmiṃ sutte catūsupi ṭhānesu khīṇāsavassa vacīsaccameva kathitanti.

[03] 186^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^parikassatī^eb^ti ākaḍḍhiyati. ^b^ummaggo^eb^ti ummujjanaṃ, paññāgamananti attho. paññā eva vā ummujjanaṭṭhena ummaggoti vuccati. sāva paṭibhānaṭṭhena ^b^paṭibhānaṃ. cittassa^eb^ ^a^P3.0164^ea^ ^b^uppannassa vasaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti ye cittassa vasaṃ gacchanti, tesaṃyevettha gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.^b^ atthamaññāya dhammamaññāyā^eb^ti atthañca pāḷiñca jānitvā. ^b^dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hotī^eb^ti lokuttaradhammassa anucchavikadhammaṃ saha sīlena pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti. ^b^nibbedhikapañño^eb^ti nibbijjhanakapañño. ^b^idaṃ dukkha^eb^nti ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ sesaṃ tebhūmakakkhandhapañcakaṃ dukkhanti sutaṃ hoti. ^b^paññāyā^eb^ti maggapaññāya. ^b^ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo^eb^ti vaṭṭamūlakataṇhā tassa dukkhassa samudayoti sutaṃ ^a^M2.0361^ea^ hoti. iminā upāyena sesadvayepi attho veditabbo. catutthapañhavissajjanena arahattaphalaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] 187^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^todeyyassā^eb^ti tudigāmavāsikassa. ^b^parisatī^eb^ti sannipatitāya parisāya. ^b^parūpārambhaṃ vattentī^eb^ti paragarahaṃ pavattenti kathenti. ^b^bālo ayaṃ rājā^eb^tiādi yaṃ te upārambhaṃ vattenti, tassa dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^samaṇe rāmaputte^eb^ti udake rāmaputte. ^b^abhippasanno^eb^ti atikkamma pasanno. ^b^paramanipaccakāra^eb^nti uttamanipātakiriyaṃ nīcavuttiṃ. ^b^parihārakā^eb^ti paricārakā. ^b^yamako^eb^tiādīni ^a^P3.0165^ea^ tesaṃ nāmāni. tesu hi eko yamako nāma, eko moggallo nāma, eko uggo ^a^V2.0359^ea^ nāma, eko nāvindakī nāma, eko gandhabbo nāma, eko aggivesso nāma. ^b^tyāssuda^eb^nti ettha ^b^assuda^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ, te attano parisati nisinneti attho. ^b^iminā nayena netī^eb^ti iminā kāraṇena anuneti jānāpeti. ^b^karaṇīyādhikaraṇīyesū^eb^ti paṇḍitehi kattabbakiccesu ca atirekakattabbakiccesu ca. ^b^vacanīyādhivacanīyesū^eb^ti vattabbesu ca atirekavattabbesu ca. ^b^alamatthadasatarehī^eb^ti ettha atthe passituṃ samatthā alamatthadasā, te atisitvā ṭhitā alamatthadasatarā, tehi alamatthadasatarehi. ^b^alamatthadasataro^eb^ti alamatthadasatāya uttaritaro, chekehi chekataro paṇḍitehi paṇḍitataroti pucchanto evamāha. athassa te paṭipucchantā ^b^evaṃ bho^eb^tiādimāhaṃsu. iti brāhmaṇo attano sappurisatāya taṃ eḷeyyarājānampi tassa parivārikepi udakampi rāmaputtaṃ pasaṃsi. andho viya hi asappuriso, cakkhumā viya sappuriso. yathā andho neva anandhaṃ na andhaṃ passati, evaṃ asappuriso neva sappurisaṃ na asappurisaṃ jānāti. yathā cakkhumā andhampi anandhampi passati, evaṃ sappuriso sappurisampi asappurisampi jānāti. todeyyopi sappurisatāya ^a^P3.0166^ea^ asappurise aññāsīti imamatthavasaṃ paṭicca tuṭṭhamānaso brāhmaṇo ^b^acchariyaṃ bho, gotamā^eb^tiādīni vatvā tathāgatassa bhāsitaṃ anumoditvā pakkāmi.

[03] 188^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^M2.0362^ea^ ^b^upako^eb^ti tassa nāmaṃ. ^b^maṇḍikāputto^eb^ti maṇḍikāya putto. ^b^upasaṅkamī^eb^ti so kira devadattassa upaṭṭhāko, ``kiṃ nu kho satthā mayi attano santikaṃ upagate vaṇṇaṃ kathessati, udāhu avaṇṇa''nti pariggaṇhanatthaṃ upasaṅkami. ``nerayiko devadatto kappaṭṭho atekiccho''ti (cūḷava0 348) vacanaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ ghaṭṭetukāmo upasaṅkamītipi vadanti. ^b^parūpārambhaṃ vattetī^eb^ti paragarahaṃ katheti. ^b^sabbo so na upapādetī^eb^ti sabbopi so kusaladhammaṃ na uppādeti, attano vā vacanaṃ upapādetuṃ anucchavikaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti. ^b^anupapādento gārayho hotī^eb^ti kusalaṃ dhammaṃ uppādetuṃ asakkonto attano ca vacanaṃ upapannaṃ anucchavikaṃ kātuṃ asakkonto gārayho hoti. ^b^upavajjo^eb^ti upavaditabbo ca hoti, vajjena vā upeto hoti, sadoso hotīti attho.

[03] atha bhagavā tassa vādaṃ gahetvā tasseva gīvāya paṭimuñcanto ^b^parūpārambha^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^ummujjamānakaṃyevā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0360^ea^ udakato sīsaṃ ukkhipantaṃyeva. ^b^tattha aparimāṇā padā^eb^tiādīsu tasmiṃ akusalanti paññāpane padānipi akkharānipi dhammadesanāpi aparimāṇāyeva. ^b^itipidaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0167^ea^ ^b^akusala^eb^nti idampi akusalaṃ idampi akusalaṃ imināpi kāraṇena imināpi kāraṇena akusalanti evaṃ akusalapaññattiyaṃ āgatānipi aparimāṇāni. athāpi aññenākārena tathāgato taṃ dhammaṃ deseyya, evampissa desanā aparimāṇā bhaveyya. yathāha -- ``apariyādinnāvassa tathāgatassa dhammadesanā, apariyādinnaṃ dhammapadabyañjana''nti (ma0 ni0 1.161). iminā upāyena sabbavāresu attho veditabbo. ^b^yāva dhaṃsī vatāya^eb^nti yāva guṇadhaṃsī vata ayaṃ. ^b^loṇakāradārako^eb^ti loṇakāragāmadārako. ^b^yatra hi nāmā^eb^ti yo hi nāma. ^b^āsādetabbaṃ maññissatī^eb^ti ghaṭṭetabbaṃ maññissati. ^b^apehī^eb^ti apagaccha, mā me purato aṭṭhāsi. evañca pana vatvā gīvāya gaṇhāpetvā nikkaḍḍhāpesiyevāti.

[03] 189^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^M2.0363^ea^ ^b^kāyenā^eb^ti nāmakāyena. ^b^sacchikaraṇīyā^eb^ti paccakkhaṃ kātabbā. ^b^satiyā^eb^ti pubbenivāsānussatiyā. ^b^cakkhunā^eb^ti dibbacakkhunā. ^b^paññāyā^eb^ti jhānapaññāya vipassanāpaññā sacchikātabbā, vipassanāpaññāya maggapaññā, maggapaññāya phalapaññā, phalapaññāya paccavekkhaṇapaññā sacchikātabbā, pattabbāti attho. āsavānaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ pana arahattaṃ ^a^P3.0168^ea^ paccavekkhaṇavasena paccavekkhaṇapaññāya sacchikaraṇīyaṃ nāmāti.

[03] 190^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūta^eb^nti yato yato anuviloketi, tato tato tuṇhībhūtameva. ^b^bhikkhū āmantesī^eb^ti paṭipattisampanne bhikkhū pasannehi cakkhūhi anuviloketvā uppannadhammapāmojjo thometukāmatāya āmantesi. ^b^apalāpā^eb^ti palāparahitā. itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^suddhā^eb^ti nimmalā. ^b^sāre patiṭṭhitā^eb^ti sīlādisāre patiṭṭhitā. ^b^ala^eb^nti yuttaṃ. ^b^yojanagaṇanānī^eb^ti ekaṃ yojanaṃ yojanameva, dasapi yojanāni yojanāneva. tato uddhaṃ ``yojanagaṇanānī''ti vuccati. idha pana yojanasatampi yojanasahassampi adhippetaṃ. ^b^puṭosenāpī^eb^ti puṭosaṃ vuccati pātheyyaṃ, pātheyyaṃ gahetvāpi upasaṅkamituṃ yuttamevāti attho. puṭaṃsenātipi ^a^V2.0361^ea^ pāṭho. tassattho -- puṭo aṃse assāti puṭaṃso, tena puṭaṃsena, aṃsena pātheyyapuṭaṃ vahantenāpīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] idāni evarūpehi evarūpehi ca guṇehi samannāgatā ettha bhikkhū atthīti dassetuṃ ^b^santi bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^devappattā^eb^ti upapattidevanibbattakaṃ dibbavihāraṃ dibbavihārena ca arahattaṃ pattā. ^b^brahmappattā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0169^ea^ niddosaṭṭhena brahmabhāvasādhakaṃ brahmavihāraṃ brahmavihārena ca arahattaṃ pattā. ^b^āneñjappattā^eb^ti aniñjanabhāvasādhakaṃ āneñjaṃ āneñjena ca arahattaṃ pattā. ^b^ariyappattā^eb^ti puthujjanabhāvaṃ atikkamma ariyabhāvaṃ pattā. ^b^evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu devappatto hotī^eb^tiādīsu evaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhāne ṭhatvā cittaṃ vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ patto devappatto nāma hoti ^a^M2.0364^ea^, catūsu brahmavihāresu ṭhatvā cittaṃ vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ patto brahmappatto nāma, catūsu arūpajjhānesu ṭhatvā cittaṃ vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ patto āneñjappatto nāma. ^b^idaṃ dukkha^eb^ntiādīhi catūhi saccehi cattāro maggā tīṇi ca phalāni kathitāni. tasmā imaṃ ariyadhammaṃ patto bhikkhu ariyappatto nāma hotīti.
[06] brāhmaṇavaggo catuttho.

[03] 191^b^.^eb^ pañcamassa ^a^V2.0362^ea^ paṭhame ^b^sotānugatāna^eb^nti pasādasotaṃ odahitvā ñāṇasotena vavatthapitānaṃ. ^b^cattāro ānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhā^eb^ti cattāro guṇānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā. idaṃ pana bhagavatā atthuppattivasena āraddhaṃ. katarātthuppattivasenāti? bhikkhūnaṃ dhammassavanāya anupasaṅkamanātthuppattivasena. pañcasatā kira brāhmaṇapabbajitā ``sammāsambuddho liṅgavacanavibhattipadabyañjanādīhi kathento amhehi ñātameva kathessati, aññātaṃ kiṃ kathessatī''ti dhammassavanatthaṃ na gacchanti. satthā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā te pakkosāpetvā ^a^P3.0170^ea^ ``kasmā evaṃ karotha, sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ suṇātha, sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ suṇantānañca sajjhāyantānañca ime ettakā ānisaṃsā''ti dassento imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.

[03] tattha ^b^dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇātī^eb^ti suttaṃ geyyantiādikaṃ navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanabhūtaṃ tantidhammaṃ vaḷañjeti. ^b^sotānugatā hontī^eb^ti sotaṃ anuppattā anupaviṭṭhā honti. ^b^manasānupekkhitā^eb^ti cittena olokitā. ^b^diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā^eb^ti atthato ca kāraṇato ca paññāya suṭṭhu paṭividdhā paccakkhaṃ katā. ^b^muṭṭhassati kālaṃ kurumāno^eb^ti nayidaṃ buddhavacanaṃ anussaraṇasatiyā abhāvena vuttaṃ, puthujjanakālakiriyaṃ pana sandhāya vuttaṃ. puthujjano hi muṭṭhassati kālaṃ karoti nāma. ^b^upapajjatī^eb^ti suddhasīle patiṭṭhito devaloke nibbattati. ^b^dhammapadā plavantī^eb^ti antarābhave nibbattamuṭṭhassatino, yepi pubbe sajjhāyamūlikā vācāparicitabuddhavacanadhammā, te sabbe pasanne ^a^M2.0365^ea^ ādāse chāyā viya plavanti, pākaṭā hutvā paññāyanti. ^b^dandho, bhikkhave, satuppādo^eb^ti buddhavacanānussaraṇasatiyā uppādo dandho garu. atha so satto khippaṃyeva visesagāmī hoti, nibbānagāmī hotīti attho.

[03] ^b^iddhimā cetovasippatto^eb^ti iddhisampanno cittassa vasibhāvapatto khīṇāsavo. ^b^ayaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0171^ea^ ^b^vā so dhammavinayo^eb^ti ettha vibhāvanattho vā-saddo. ^b^yatthā^eb^ti yasmiṃ dhammavinaye. ^b^brahmacariyaṃ acari^eb^nti ^a^V2.0363^ea^ brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasiṃ. idampi buddhavacanaṃ mayā pubbe vaḷañjitanti buddhavacanānussaraṇavasenetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^devaputto^eb^ti pañcālacaṇḍo viya hatthakamahābrahmā viya sanaṅkumārabrahmā viya ca eko dhammakathikadevaputto. ^b^opapātiko opapātikaṃ sāretī^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ uppanno devaputto pacchā uppannaṃ sāreti. ^b^sahapaṃsukīḷikā^eb^ti etena nesaṃ dīgharattaṃ kataparicayabhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^samāgaccheyyu^eb^nti sālāya vā rukkhamūle vā sammukhībhāvaṃ gaccheyyuṃ. ^b^evaṃ vadeyyā^eb^ti sālāya vā rukkhamūle vā paṭhamataraṃ nisinno pacchā āgataṃ evaṃ vadeyya. sesamettha pāḷinayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] 192^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^ṭhānānī^eb^ti kāraṇāni. ^b^ṭhānehī^eb^ti kāraṇehi. ^b^soceyya^eb^nti sucibhāvo. ^b^saṃvasamāno^eb^ti ekato vasamāno. ^b^na santatakārī^eb^ti na satatakārī. ^b^na santatavutti sīlesū^eb^ti satataṃ sabbakālaṃ sīlajīvitaṃ na jīvatīti attho. ^b^saṃvohāramāno^eb^ti ^a^P3.0172^ea^ kathento. ^b^ekena eko voharatī^eb^ti ekena saddhiṃ eko hutvā katheti. ^b^vokkamatī^eb^ti okkamati. ^b^purimavohārā pacchimavohāra^eb^nti purimakathāya pacchimakathaṃ, purimakathāya ca pacchimakathā, pacchimakathāya ca purimakathā na sametīti attho.

[03] ^b^ñātibyasanenā^eb^tiādīsu ñātīnaṃ byasanaṃ ñātibyasanaṃ, ñātivināsoti attho. dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. ^b^rogabyasane^eb^ pana rogoyeva ārogyavināsanato byasanaṃ rogabyasanaṃ. ^b^anuparivattantī^eb^ti anubandhanti. ^b^lābho cā^eb^tiādīsu ekaṃ attabhāvaṃ lābho anuparivattati, ekaṃ alābhoti evaṃ nayo netabbo. ^b^sākacchāyamāno^eb^ti pañhapucchanavissajjanavasena sākacchaṃ karonto. ^b^yathā^eb^ti yenākārena ^a^M2.0366^ea^. ^b^ummaggo^eb^ti pañhummaggo. ^b^abhinīhāro^eb^ti pañhābhisaṅkharaṇavasena cittassa abhinīhāro. ^b^samudāhāro^eb^ti pañhapucchanaṃ. ^b^santa^eb^nti paccanīkasantatāya santaṃ katvā na kathetīti attho. ^b^paṇīta^eb^nti atappakaṃ. ^b^atakkāvacara^eb^nti ^a^P3.0173^ea^ yathā takkena nayaggāhena gahetuṃ sakkā hoti, evaṃ na kathetīti attho. ^b^nipuṇa^eb^nti saṇhaṃ. ^b^paṇḍitavedanīya^eb^nti paṇḍitehi jānitabbakaṃ. sesaṃ sabbattha vuttānusāreneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] 193^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^V2.0364^ea^ ^b^upasaṅkamī^eb^ti bhuttapātarāso hutvā mālāgandhavilepanaṃ gahetvā bhagavantaṃ vandissāmīti upasaṅkami. ^b^mā anussavenā^eb^tiādīsu anussavavacanena mama kathaṃ mā gaṇhathāti iminā nayena attho veditabbo. ^b^sārambho^eb^ti karaṇuttariyalakkhaṇo sārambho. ^b^alobhā^eb^dayo lobhādipaṭipakkhavasena veditabbā. ^b^kusaladhammūpasampadāyā^eb^ti kusaladhammānaṃ sampādanatthāya, paṭilābhatthāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^ime cepi, bhaddiya, mahāsālā^eb^ti purato ṭhite sālarukkhe dassento evamāha. sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthattā ca suviññeyyameva. satthari pana desanaṃ vinivaṭṭente bhaddiyo sotāpanno jātoti.

[03] 194^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^sāmugiyā^eb^ti sāmuganigamavāsino. ^b^byagghapajjā^eb^ti te ālapanto evamāha. kolanagarassa hi kolarukkhe hāretvā katattā kolanagaranti ca byagghapathe māpitattā byagghapajjanti ca dve nāmāni. etesañca pubbapurisā tattha vasiṃsūti byagghapajjavāsitāya byagghapajjavāsino byagghapajjāti vuccanti. te ālapanto evamāha. ^b^pārisuddhipadhāniyaṅgānī^eb^ti ^a^P3.0174^ea^ pārisuddhiatthāya padhāniyaṅgāni padahitabbavīriyassa aṅgāni, koṭṭhāsāti attho. ^b^sīlapārisuddhipadhāniyaṅga^eb^nti sīlaparisodhanavīriyassetaṃ nāmaṃ. tañhi sīlapārisuddhiparipūraṇatthāya padhāniyaṅganti sīlapārisuddhipadhāniyaṅgaṃ. sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmī^eb^ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne vipassanāpaññāya anuggahessāmi ^a^M2.0367^ea^. ^b^yo tattha chando^eb^tiādīsu yo tasmiṃ anuggaṇhane kattukāmatāchandoti iminā nayena attho veditabbo. satisampajaññaṃ panettha satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā vīriyapaggahanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^rajanīyesu dhammesu cittaṃ virājetī^eb^ti rāgapaccayesu iṭṭhārammaṇesu yathā cittaṃ virajjati, evaṃ karoti. ^b^vimocanīyesu dhammesu cittaṃ vimocetī^eb^ti yehi ārammaṇehi cittaṃ vimocetabbaṃ, tesu yathā vimuccati, evaṃ karoti. ^b^virājetvā^eb^ti ettha maggakkhaṇe virājeti nāma, phalakkhaṇe virattaṃ nāma hoti. dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. ^b^sammāvimuttiṃ phusatī^eb^ti hetunā nayena arahattaphalavimuttiṃ ñāṇaphassena phusatīti.

[03] 195^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^V2.0365^ea^ ^b^vappo^eb^ti dasabalassa cūḷapitā sakyarājā. ^b^nigaṇṭhasāvako^eb^ti vesāliyaṃ sīhasenāpati viya nāḷandāyaṃ upāligahapati viya ca nigaṇṭhassa nāṭaputtassa upaṭṭhāko. ^b^kāyena saṃvuto^eb^ti kāyadvārassa saṃvutattā pihitattā kāyena saṃvuto nāma. sesadvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^avijjāvirāgā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0175^ea^ avijjāya khayavirāgena. ^b^vijjuppādā^eb^ti maggavijjāya uppādena. ^b^taṃ ṭhāna^eb^nti taṃ kāraṇaṃ. ^b^avipakkavipāka^eb^nti aladdhavipākavāraṃ. ^b^tatonidāna^eb^nti taṃhetu tappaccayā. ^b^dukkhavedaniyā āsavā assaveyyu^eb^nti dukkhavedanāya paccayabhūtā kilesā assaveyyuṃ, tassa purisassa uppajjeyyunti attho. ^b^abhisamparāya^eb^nti dutiye attabhāve. ^b^kāyasamārambhapaccayā^eb^ti kāyakammapaccayena. ^b^āsavā^eb^ti kilesā. ^b^vighātapariḷāhā^eb^ti ettha ^b^vighāto^eb^ti dukkhaṃ. ^b^pariḷāho^eb^ti kāyikacetasiko pariḷāho. ^b^phussa phussa byantīkarotī^eb^ti ñāṇavajjhaṃ kammaṃ ñāṇaphassena phusitvā phusitvā khayaṃ gameti, vipākavajjhaṃ kammaṃ vipākaphassena phusitvā phusitvā khayaṃ gameti. ^b^nijjarā^eb^ti kilesajīraṇakapaṭipadā. sesavāresupi eseva nayo. idha ṭhatvā ayaṃ bhikkhu khīṇāsavo kātabbo, cattāri mahābhūtāni nīharitvā catusaccavavatthānaṃ dassetvā yāva arahattaphalaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetabbaṃ.

[03] idāni pana tassa khīṇāsavassa satatavihāre dassetuṃ ^b^evaṃ sammā vimuttacittassā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^sammā vimuttacittassā^eb^ti hetunā kāraṇena ^a^M2.0368^ea^ sammā vimuttassa. ^b^satatavihārā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0176^ea^ niccavihārā nibaddhavihārā. ^b^neva sumano hotī^eb^ti iṭṭhārammaṇe rāgavasena na somanassajāto hoti. ^b^na dummano^eb^ti aniṭṭhārammaṇe paṭighavasena na domanassajāto hoti. ^b^upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno^eb^ti satisampajaññapariggahitāya majjhattākāralakkhaṇāya upekkhāya tesu ārammaṇesu upekkhako majjhatto hutvā viharati.

[03] ^b^kāyapariyantika^eb^nti kāyantikaṃ kāyaparicchinnaṃ, yāva pañcadvārakāyo pavattati, tāva pavattaṃ pañcadvārikavedananti attho. ^b^jīvitapariyantika^eb^nti jīvitantikaṃ jīvitaparicchinnaṃ, yāva jīvitaṃ pavattati, tāva pavattaṃ manodvārikavedananti attho. tattha pañcadvārikavedanā pacchā uppajjitvā paṭhamaṃ nirujjhati, manodvārikavedanā paṭhamaṃ uppajjitvā pacchā nirujjhati. sā hi paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthurūpasmiṃyeva patiṭṭhāti. pañcadvārikā pavatte pañcadvāravasena pavattamānā paṭhamavaye ^a^V2.0366^ea^ vīsativassakāle rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena adhimattā balavatī hoti, paṇṇāsavassakāle ṭhitā hoti, saṭṭhivassakālato paṭṭhāya parihāyamānā, asītinavutivassakāle mandā hoti. tadā hi sattā ``cirarattaṃ ekato nisīdimhā nipajjimhā''ti vadantepi na ^a^P3.0177^ea^ jānāmāti vadanti. adhimattānipi rūpādiārammaṇāni na passāma, sugandhaduggandhaṃ vā sāduasāduṃ vā thaddhamudukaṃ vāti na jānāmātipi vadanti. iti nesaṃ pañcadvārikavedanā bhaggā hoti, manodvārikā pavattati. sāpi anupubbena parihāyamānā maraṇasamaye hadayakoṭiṃyeva nissāya pavattati. yāva panesā pavattati, tāva satto jīvatīti vuccati. yadā nappavattati, tadā ``mato niruddho''ti vuccati.

[03] svāyamattho vāpiyā dīpetabbo -- yathā hi puriso pañcaudakamaggasampannaṃ vāpiṃ kareyya. paṭhamaṃ deve vuṭṭhe pañcahi udakamaggehi udakaṃ pavisitvā antovāpiyaṃ āvāṭe pūreyya. punappunaṃ deve vassante udakamagge pūretvā gāvutaḍḍhayojanamattaṃ ottharitvā udakaṃ tiṭṭheyya tato tato vissandamānaṃ. atha niddhamanatumbe vivaritvā khettesu kamme kayiramāne udakaṃ nikkhamantaṃ, sassapākakāle udakaṃ nikkhantaṃ udakaṃ parihīnaṃ, ``macche gaṇhāmā''ti vattabbataṃ āpajjeyya. tato katipāhena āvāṭesuyeva ^a^M2.0369^ea^ udakaṃ saṇṭhaheya. yāva pana taṃ āvāṭesu hoti, tāva mahāvāpiyaṃ udakaṃ atthīti saṅkhaṃ gacchati. yadā pana tattha chijjati, tadā ``vāpiyaṃ udakaṃ natthī''ti vuccati. evaṃ sampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03] paṭhamaṃ ^a^P3.0178^ea^ deve vassante pañcahi maggehi udake pavisante āvāṭānaṃ pūraṇakālo viya hi paṭhamameva paṭisandhikkhaṇe manodvārikavedanāya vatthurūpe patiṭṭhitakālo, punappunaṃ deve vassante pañcamaggānaṃ pūraṇakālo viya pavatte pañcadvārikavedanāya pavatti, gāvutaḍḍhayojanamattaṃ ajjhottharaṇaṃ viya paṭhamavaye vīsativassakāle rajjanādivasena tassa adhimattabalavabhāvo, yāva vāpito udakaṃ na niggacchati, tāva pūrāya vāpiyā ṭhitakālo viya paññāsavassakāle tassa ṭhitakālo, niddhamanatumbesu vivaṭesu kamme kayiramāne udakassa nikkhamanakālo viya saṭṭhivassakālato paṭṭhāya tassa parihāni, udake bhaṭṭhe udakamaggesu parittaudakassa ṭhitakālo viya asītinavutikāle pañcadvārikavedanāya mandakālo, āvāṭesuyeva udakassa patiṭṭhitakālo viya hadayavatthukoṭiṃ nissāya manodvāre vedanāya pavattikālo, āvāṭesu parittepi udake sati ``vāpiyaṃ udakaṃ atthī''ti vattabbakālo viya yāva ^a^V2.0367^ea^ sā pavattati, tāva ``satto jīvatī''ti vuccati. yathā pana āvāṭesu udake chinne ``natthi vāpiyaṃ udaka''nti vuccati, evaṃ manodvārikavedanāya appavattamānāya satto matoti vuccati. imaṃ vedanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ -- ``jīvitapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vediyamāno''ti.

[03] ^b^kāyassa bhedā^eb^ti kāyassa bhedena. ^b^uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā^eb^ti jīvitakkhayato uddhaṃ. ^b^idhevā^eb^ti paṭisandhivasena parato agantvā idheva. ^b^sītī^eb^ ^a^P3.0179^ea^ ^b^bhavissantī^eb^ti pavattivipphandanadaratharahitāni sītāni appavattanadhammāni bhavissanti.

[03] ^b^thūṇaṃ paṭiccā^eb^ti rukkhaṃ paṭicca. ^b^kuddālapiṭakaṃ ādāyā^eb^ti kuddālañca khaṇittiñca pacchiñca gahetvāti attho. desanā pana kuddālavaseneva katā. ^b^mūle chindeyyā^eb^ti mūlamhi kuddālena chindeyya. ^b^palikhaṇeyyā^eb^ti khaṇittiyā samantā khaṇeyya.

[03] ^b^evameva^eb^ ^a^M2.0370^ea^ ^b^kho^eb^ti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ -- rukkho viya hi attabhāvo daṭṭhabbo, rukkhaṃ paṭicca chāyā viya kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ, chāyaṃ appavattaṃ kātukāmo puriso viya yogāvacaro, kuddālo viya paññā, piṭakaṃ viya samādhi, khaṇitti viya vipassanā, khaṇittiyā mūlānaṃ palikhaṇanakālo viya arahattamaggena avijjāya chedanakālo, khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ karaṇakālo viya khandhavasena diṭṭhakālo, phālanakālo viya āyatanavasena diṭṭhakālo, sakalīkaraṇakālo viya dhātuvasena diṭṭhakālo, vātātapena visosanakālo viya kāyikacetasikassa vīriyassa karaṇakālo, agginā ḍahanakālo viya ñāṇena kilesānaṃ ḍahanakālo, masikaraṇakālo viya vattamānaka-pañcakkhandhakālo, mahāvāte ophunanakālo viya nadīsote pavāhanakālo viya ca chinnamūlakānaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ appaṭisandhikanirodho, ophunanappavāhanehi ^a^P3.0180^ea^ apaññattikabhāvūpagamo viya punabbhave vipākakkhandhānaṃ anuppādena apaṇṇattikabhāvo veditabbo.

[03] ^b^bhagavantaṃ etadavocā^eb^ti satthari desanaṃ vinivaṭṭente sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā etaṃ ``seyyathāpi, bhante''tiādivacanaṃ avoca. tattha ^b^udayatthiko^eb^ti vaḍḍhiatthiko. ^b^assapaṇiyaṃ poseyyā^eb^ti pañca assapotasatāni kiṇitvā pacchā vikkiṇissāmīti poseyya. sahassagghanakassa assassa pañcasatamattaṃ upakaraṇaṃ gandhamālādivasena posāvanikaṃyeva agamāsi. athassa te assā ekadivaseneva ^a^V2.0368^ea^ rogaṃ phusitvā sabbe jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇeyyunti iminā adhippāyena evamāha. ^b^udayañceva nādhigaccheyyā^eb^ti vaḍḍhiñca gehato nīharitvā dinnamūlañca kiñci na labheyya. ^b^payirupāsi^eb^nti catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahiṃ. ^b^svāhaṃ udayañceva nādhigacchi^eb^nti so ahaṃ neva udayaṃ na gehato dinnadhanaṃ adhigacchiṃ, paṇiyāssajagganako nāma jātosmīti dasseti. sesamettha uttānamevāti.

[03] 196^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^dvayenā^eb^ti dvīhi koṭṭhāsehi. ^b^oghassa^eb^ ^a^P3.0181^ea^ ^b^nittharaṇa^eb^nti caturoghanittharaṇaṃ. ^b^tapojigucchāhetū^eb^ti dukkarakārikasaṅkhātena tapena pāpajigucchanahetu ^a^M2.0371^ea^. ^b^aññataraṃ sāmaññaṅga^eb^nti ekaṃ samaṇadhammakoṭṭhāsaṃ. ^b^aparisuddhakāyasamācārā^eb^tiādīsu purimehi tīhi padehi kāyikavācasikacetasikasīlānaṃ aparisuddhataṃ dassetvā pacchimena padena aparisuddhājīvataṃ dasseti. ^b^ñāṇadassanāyā^eb^ti maggañāṇasaṅkhātāya dassanāya. ^b^anuttarāya sambodhāyā^eb^ti arahattāya, arahattañāṇaphassena phusituṃ abhabbāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^sālalaṭṭhi^eb^nti sālarukkhaṃ. ^b^nava^eb^nti taruṇaṃ. ^b^akukkuccakajāta^eb^nti ``bhaveyya nu kho, na bhaveyyā''ti ajanetabbakukkuccaṃ. ^b^lekhaṇiyā likheyyā^eb^ti avalekhanamattakena avalikheyya. ^b^dhoveyyā^eb^ti ghaṃseyya. ^b^anto avisuddhā^eb^ti abbhantare asuddhā apanītasārā.

[03] ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ -- sālalaṭṭhi viya hi attabhāvo daṭṭhabbo, nadīsotaṃ viya saṃsārasotaṃ, pāraṃ gantukāmapuriso viya dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo gahetvā ṭhitapuriso, sālalaṭṭhiyā bahiddhā suparikammakatakālo viya bahiddhā tapacaraṇaṃ gāḷhaṃ katvā gahitakālo, anto asuddhakālo ^a^P3.0182^ea^ viya abbhantare sīlānaṃ aparisuddhakālo, sālalaṭṭhiyā saṃsīditvā adhogamanaṃ viya diṭṭhigatikassa saṃsārasote saṃsīdanaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^phiyārittaṃ bandheyyā^eb^ti phiyañca arittañca yojeyya. ^b^evamevā^eb^ti etthāpi idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ -- sālalaṭṭhi viya attabhāvo, nadīsotaṃ viya saṃsārasotaṃ, pāraṃ gantukāmapuriso viya yogāvacaro, bahiddhā suparikammakatakālo viya chasu dvāresu saṃvarassa paccupaṭṭhitakālo, anto suvisodhitabhāvo viya abbhantare parisuddhasīlabhāvo, phiyārittabandhanaṃ viya ^a^V2.0369^ea^ kāyikacetasikavīriyakaraṇaṃ, sotthinā pārimatīragamanaṃ viya anupubbena sīlaṃ pūretvā samādhiṃ pūretvā paññaṃ pūretvā nibbānagamanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^kaṇḍacitrakānī^eb^ti saralaṭṭhisararajjusarapāsādasarasāṇisarapokkharaṇisarapadumānīti anekāni kaṇḍehi kattabbacitrāni. ^b^atha kho so tīhi ṭhānehī^eb^ti so evaṃ bahūni kaṇḍacitrakāni jānantopi na rājāraho hoti, tīhiyeva pana ṭhānehi hotīti attho. ^b^sammāsamādhi^eb^ ^a^M2.0372^ea^ ^b^hotī^eb^ti maggasamādhinā ca phalasamādhinā ca samāhito hotīti ayamettha attho. ^b^sammādiṭṭhī^eb^ti maggasammādiṭṭhiyā samannāgato. ^b^idaṃ dukkha^eb^ntiādīhi catūhi saccehi cattāro maggā tīṇi ca phalāni kathitāni. ayaṃ pana maggeneva avirādhitaṃ vijjhati nāmāti veditabbo. ^b^sammāvimuttī^eb^ti arahattaphalavimuttiyā samannāgato. ^b^avijjākkhandhaṃ padāletī^eb^ti arahattamaggena padāleti nāmāti vuccati. iminā hi heṭṭhā arahattamaggena avijjākkhandho padālito ^a^P3.0183^ea^, idha pana padālitaṃ upādāya padāletīti vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti.

[03] 197^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^mallikā devī^eb^ti pasenadirañño devī. ^b^yena midhekacco mātugāmo^eb^ti yena idhekaccā itthī. ^b^dubbaṇṇā^eb^ti bībhacchavaṇṇā. ^b^durūpā^eb^ti dussaṇṭhitā. ^b^supāpikā^eb^ti suṭṭhu pāpikā suṭṭhu lāmikā. ^b^dassanāyā^eb^ti passituṃ. ^b^daliddā^eb^ti dhanadaliddā. ^b^appassakā^eb^ti sakena dhanena rahitā. ^b^appabhogā^eb^ti upabhogaparibhogabhaṇḍakarahitā. ^b^appesakkhā^eb^ti appaparivārā. ^b^aḍḍhā^eb^ti issarā. ^b^mahaddhanā^eb^ti vaḷañjanakadhanena mahaddhanā. ^b^mahābhogā^eb^ti upabhogaparibhogabhaṇḍabhogena mahābhogā. ^b^mahesakkhā^eb^ti mahāparivārā. ^b^abhirūpā^eb^ti uttamarūpā. ^b^dassanīyā^eb^ti dassanayuttā. ^b^pāsādikā^eb^ti dassanena pāsādikā. ^b^vaṇṇapokkharatāyā^eb^ti vaṇṇena ceva sarīrasaṇṭhānena ca.

[03] ^b^abhisajjatī^eb^ti laggati. ^b^byāpajjatī^eb^ti pakatiṃ pajahati. ^b^patitthīyatī^eb^ti kodhavasena thinabhāvaṃ thaddhabhāvaṃ āpajjati. ^b^na^eb^ ^a^P3.0184^ea^ ^b^dātā hotī^eb^ti na dāyikā hoti. ^b^seyyāvasathapadīpeyya^eb^nti ettha ^b^seyyā^eb^ti mañcapallaṅkādisayanaṃ. ^b^āvasatho^eb^ti āvasathāgāraṃ. ^b^padīpeyyaṃ^eb^ vuccati vaṭṭitelādipadīpūpakaraṇaṃ. issāmanikāti issāya sampayuttacittā. iminā nayena sabbattha attho veditabbo ^a^V2.0370^ea^. ^b^kodhanā ahosi^eb^nti kodhamanā ahosiṃ. ^b^anissāmanikā ahosi^eb^nti issāvirahitacittā ahosiṃ. sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.

[03] 198^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^M2.0373^ea^ attantapādīsu attānaṃ tapati dukkhāpetīti ^b^attantapo^eb^. attano paritāpanānuyogaṃ ^b^attaparitāpanānuyogaṃ^eb^. paraṃ tapatīti ^b^parantapo^eb^. paresaṃ paritāpanānuyogaṃ ^b^paraparitāpanānuyogaṃ. diṭṭheva dhamme^eb^ti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve. ^b^nicchāto^eb^ti chātaṃ vuccati taṇhā, sā assa natthīti nicchāto. sabbakilesānaṃ nibbutattā ^b^nibbuto^eb^. anto tāpanakilesānaṃ abhāvā sītalo jātoti ^b^sītībhūto^eb^. jhānamaggaphalanibbānasukhāni paṭisaṃvedetīti ^b^sukhappaṭisaṃvedī. brahmabhūtena attanā^eb^ti seṭṭhabhūtena attanā.

[03] ^b^acelako^eb^tiādīni vuttatthāneva. ^b^orabbhikā^eb^dīsu urabbhā vuccanti eḷakā, urabbhe hanatīti ^b^orabbhiko. sūkarikā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^luddo^eb^ti dāruṇo kakkhaḷo. ^b^macchaghātako^eb^ti macchabandho kevaṭṭo. ^b^bandhanāgāriko^eb^ti bandhanāgāragopako. ^b^kurūrakammantā^eb^ti dāruṇakammantā.

[03] ^b^muddhāvasitto^eb^ti ^a^P3.0185^ea^ khattiyābhisekena muddhani abhisitto. ^b^puratthimena nagarassā^eb^ti nagarato puratthimāya disāya. ^b^santhāgāra^eb^nti yaññasālaṃ. ^b^kharājinaṃ nivāsetvā^eb^ti sakhuraṃ ajinacammaṃ nivāsetvā. ^b^sappitelenā^eb^ti sappinā ceva telena ca. ṭhapetvā hi sappiṃ avaseso yo koci sneho telanti vuccati. ^b^kaṇḍuvamāno^eb^ti nakhānaṃ chinnattā kaṇḍuvitabbakāle tena kaṇḍuvamāno. ^b^anantarahitāyā^eb^ti asanthatāya. ^b^sarūpavacchāyā^eb^ti sadisavacchāya. sace gāvī setā hoti, vacchopi setakova. sace kapilā vā rattā vā, vacchakopi tādisovāti evaṃ sarūpavacchāya. ^b^so evamāhā^eb^ti so rājā evaṃ vadeti. ^b^vacchatarā^eb^ti taruṇavacchakabhāvaṃ atikkantā balavavacchā. ^b^vacchatarīsu^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^barihisatthāyā^eb^ti parikkhepakaraṇatthāya ceva yaññabhūmiyaṃ attharaṇatthāya ca.

[03] catutthapuggalaṃ buddhuppādato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ ^b^idha, bhikkhave, tathāgato^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^tathāgato^eb^tiādīni ^a^V2.0371^ea^ vuttatthāneva. ^b^taṃ dhamma^eb^nti taṃ vuttappakārasampadaṃ dhammaṃ. ^b^suṇāti, gahapati, vā^eb^ti kasmā paṭhamaṃ gahapatiṃ ^a^M2.0374^ea^ niddisati? nihatamānattā ussannattā ca. yebhuyyena hi khattiyakulato pabbajitā jātiṃ nissāya mānaṃ karonti. brāhmaṇakulā ^a^P3.0186^ea^ pabbajitā mante nissāya mānaṃ karonti, hīnajaccakulā pabbajitā attano vijātitāya patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkonti. gahapatidārakā pana kacchehi sedaṃ muñcantehi piṭṭhiyā loṇaṃ pupphamānāya bhūmiṃ kasitvā tādisassa mānassa abhāvato nihatamānadappā honti. te pabbajitvā mānaṃ vā dappaṃ vā akatvā yathābalaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karontā sakkonti arahatte patiṭṭhātuṃ. itarehi ca kulehi nikkhamitvā pabbajitā na bahukā, gahapatikāva bahukā. iti nihatamānattā ussannattā ca paṭhamaṃ gahapatiṃ niddisatīti.

[03] ^b^aññatarasmiṃ vā^eb^ti itaresaṃ vā kulānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ. ^b^paccājāto^eb^ti patijāto. ^b^tathāgate saddhaṃ paṭilabhatī^eb^ti parisuddhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā dhammasāmimhi tathāgate ``sammāsambuddho vata bhagavā''ti saddhaṃ paṭilabhati. ^b^iti paṭisañcikkhatī^eb^ti evaṃ paccavekkhati. ^b^sambādho gharāvāso^eb^ti sacepi saṭṭhihatthe ghare yojanasatantarepi vā dve jāyampatikā vasanti, tathāpi nesaṃ sakiñcanasapalibodhaṭṭhena gharāvāso sambādhova. ^b^rajāpatho^eb^ti rāgarajādīnaṃ uṭṭhānaṭṭhānanti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. āgamanapathotipi vaṭṭati. alagganaṭṭhena ^a^P3.0187^ea^ abbhokāso viyāti ^b^abbhokāso^eb^. pabbajito hi kūṭāgāraratanapāsādadevavimānādīsu pihitadvāravātapānesu paṭicchannesu vasantopi neva laggati na sajjati na bajjhati. tena vuttaṃ -- ``abbhokāso pabbajjā''ti. apica ^b^sambādho gharāvāso^eb^ kusalakiriyāya yathāsukhaṃ okāsābhāvato, ^b^rajāpatho^eb^ asaṃvutasaṅkāraṭṭhānaṃ viya rajānaṃ, kilesarajānaṃ sannipātaṭṭhānato. ^b^abbhokāso pabbajjā^eb^ kusalakiriyāya yathāsukhaṃ okāsasabbhāvato.

[03] ^b^nayidaṃ sukaraṃ...pe0... pabbajeyya^eb^nti ettha ayaṃ saṅkhepakathā -- yadetaṃ sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ ekampi divasaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ^b^ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ,^eb^ ekadivasampi ca kilesamalena amalinaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ ^a^M2.0375^ea^ pāpetabbatāya ^b^ekantaparisuddhaṃ, saṅkhalikhitaṃ^eb^ likhitasaṅkhasadisaṃ dhotasaṅkhasappaṭibhāgaṃ caritabbaṃ. idaṃ na sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe vasantena ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ...pe0... carituṃ. yaṃnūnāhaṃ kese ca massuñca ohāretvā kasāyarasapītatāya kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikāni vatthāni acchādetvā paridahitvā ^a^V2.0372^ea^ agārasmā nikkhamitvā anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyyanti. ettha ca yasmā agārassa hitaṃ kasivaṇijjādikammaṃ agāriyanti vuccati, tañca pabbajjāya natthi, tasmā pabbajjā anagāriyāti ñātabbā, taṃ anagāriyaṃ. ^b^pabbajeyya^eb^nti ^a^P3.0188^ea^ paṭipajjeyyaṃ.

[03] ^b^appaṃ vā^eb^ti sahassato heṭṭhā bhogakkhandho appo nāma hoti, sahassato paṭṭhāya mahā. ābandhanaṭṭhena ñātiyeva ^b^ñātiparivaṭṭo^eb^. so vīsatiyā heṭṭhā appo nāma hoti, vīsatiyā paṭṭhāya mahā. ^b^bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno^eb^ti yā bhikkhūnaṃ adhisīlasaṅkhātā sikkhā, tañca, yattha cete saha jīvanti, ekajīvikā sabhāgavuttino honti, taṃ bhagavatā paññattasikkhāpadasaṅkhātaṃ sājīvañca tattha sikkhanabhāvena samāpannoti bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno. ^b^samāpanno^eb^ti sikkhaṃ paripūrento sājīvañca avītikkamanto hutvā tadubhayaṃ upagatoti attho.

[03] ^b^pāṇātipātaṃ pahāyā^eb^tiādīni vuttatthāneva. ^b^imesaṃ bhedāyā^eb^ti yesaṃ itoti vuttānaṃ santike sutaṃ, tesaṃ bhedāya. ^b^bhinnānaṃ vā sandhātā^eb^ti dvinnaṃ mittānaṃ vā samānupajjhāyakādīnaṃ vā kenacideva kāraṇena bhinnānaṃ ekamekaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ``tumhākaṃ īdise kule jātānaṃ evaṃ bahussutānaṃ idaṃ na yutta''ntiādīni vatvā sandhānaṃ kattā. ^b^anuppadātā^eb^ti sandhānānuppadātā, dve jane samagge disvā ``tumhākaṃ evarūpe kule jātānaṃ evarūpehi guṇehi samannāgatānaṃ anucchavikameta''ntiādīni vatvā daḷhīkammaṃ kattāti attho. samaggo ārāmo assāti ^b^samaggārāmo^eb^. yattha samaggā natthi, tattha vasitumpi na icchatīti attho. samaggarāmotipi pāḷi, ayameva attho. ^b^samaggarato^eb^ti ^a^P3.0189^ea^ samaggesu rato, te pahāya aññattha gantuṃ na icchatīti attho. samagge disvāpi sutvāpi nandatīti ^b^samagganandī. samaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā^eb^ti yā ^a^M2.0376^ea^ vācā satte samaggeyeva karoti, taṃ sāmaggiguṇaparidīpikameva vācaṃ bhāsati, na itaranti.

[03] ^b^nelā^eb^ti elaṃ vuccati doso, nāssā elanti nelā, niddosāti attho ``nelaṅgo setapacchādo''ti (udā0 65) ettha vuttanelaṃ viya. ^b^kaṇṇasukhā^eb^ti byañjanamadhuratāya kaṇṇānaṃ sukhā, sūcivijjhanaṃ viya kaṇṇasūlaṃ na janeti. atthamadhuratāya sakalasarīre kopaṃ ajanetvā pemaṃ janetīti ^b^pemanīyā^eb^. hadayaṃ gacchati appaṭihaññamānā sukhena cittaṃ pavisatīti ^b^hadayaṅgamā^eb^ ^a^V2.0373^ea^. guṇaparipuṇṇatāya pure bhavāti ^b^porī^eb^. pure saṃvaḍḍhanārī viya sukumārātipi ^b^porī^eb^. purassa esātipi ^b^porī,^eb^ nagaravāsīnaṃ kathāti attho. nagaravāsino hi yuttakathā honti, pitimattaṃ pitāti, bhātimattaṃ bhātāti vadanti. evarūpī kathā bahuno janassa kantā hotīti ^b^bahujanakantā^eb^. kantabhāveneva bahujanassa manāpā cittavuḍḍhikarāti ^b^bahujanamanāpā^eb^.

[03] kāle ^a^P3.0190^ea^ vadatīti ^b^kālavādī,^eb^ vattabbayuttakālaṃ sallakkhetvā vadatīti attho. bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ sabhāvameva vadatīti ^b^bhūtavādī^eb^. diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikātthasannissitameva katvā vadatīti ^b^atthavādī^eb^. navalokuttaradhammasannissitaṃ katvā vadatīti ^b^dhammavādī^eb^. saṃvaravinayapahānavinayasannissitaṃ katvā vadatīti ^b^vinayavādī^eb^. nidhānaṃ vuccati ṭhapanokāso, nidhānamassā atthīti ^b^nidhānavatī^eb^. hadaye nidhetabbayuttakaṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāti attho. ^b^kālenā^eb^ti evarūpiṃ bhāsamānopi ca ``ahaṃ nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsissāmī''ti na akālena bhāsati, yuttakālaṃ pana avekkhitvāva bhāsatīti attho. ^b^sāpadesa^eb^nti saupamaṃ, sakāraṇanti attho. ^b^pariyantavati^eb^nti paricchedaṃ dassetvā, yathāssā paricchedo paññāyati, evaṃ bhāsatīti attho. ^b^atthasaṃhita^eb^nti anekehipi nayehi vibhajantena pariyādātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya atthasampannaṃ bhāsati. yaṃ vā so atthavādī atthaṃ vadati, tena atthena saṃhitattā atthasaṃhitaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati, na aññaṃ nikkhipitvā aññaṃ bhāsatīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0377^ea^ mūlabījaṃ khandhabījaṃ phaḷubījaṃ aggabījaṃ bījabījanti pañcavidhassa bījagāmassa ^a^P3.0191^ea^ ceva yassa kassaci nīlatiṇarukkhādikassa bhūtagāmassa ca samārambhā, chedanabhedanapacanādibhāvena vikopanā paṭiviratoti attho.

[03] ^b^ekabhattiko^eb^ti pātarāsabhattaṃ sāyamāsabhattanti dve bhattāni. tesu pātarāsabhattaṃ antomajjhanhikena paricchinnaṃ, itaraṃ majjhanhikato uddhaṃ antoaruṇena. tasmā antomajjhanhike dasakkhattuṃ bhuñjamānopi ekabhattikova hoti. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``ekabhattiko''ti. rattiyā bhojanaṃ ratti, tato uparatoti ^b^rattūparato^eb^. atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ nāma, tato viratattā ^b^virato vikālabhojanā^eb^.

[03] ^b^jātarūpa^eb^nti suvaṇṇaṃ. ^b^rajata^eb^nti kahāpaṇo lohamāsako jatumāsako dārumāsakoti ye vohāraṃ ^a^V2.0374^ea^ gacchanti. tassa ubhayassāpi paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato, neva taṃ uggaṇhāti, na uggaṇhāpeti, na upanikkhittaṃ sādiyatīti attho.

[03] ^b^āmakadhaññapaṭiggahaṇā^eb^ti sālivīhiyavagodhūmakaṅguvarakakudrūsakasaṅkhātassa sattavidhassapi āmakadhaññassa paṭiggahaṇā. na kevalañca etesaṃ paṭiggahaṇameva, āmasanampi bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭatiyeva. ^b^āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇā^eb^ti ettha aññatra odissa anuññātā āmakamaṃsamacchānaṃ paṭiggahaṇameva bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭati, no āmasananti.

[03] ^b^itthikumārikapaṭiggahaṇā^eb^ti ettha ^b^itthī^eb^ti purisantaragatā, itarā kumārikā nāma, tāsaṃ paṭiggahaṇampi āmasanampi akappiyameva. ^b^dāsidāsapaṭiggahaṇā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0192^ea^ ettha dāsidāsavaseneva tesaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati, ``kappiyakārakaṃ dammi, ārāmikaṃ dammī''ti evaṃ vutte pana vaṭṭati. ^b^ajeḷakā^eb^dīsupi ^b^khettavatthu^eb^pariyosānesu kappiyākappiyanayo vinayavasena upaparikkhitabbo. tattha ^b^khettaṃ^eb^ nāma yasmiṃ pubbaṇṇaṃ ruhati. ^b^vatthu^eb^ nāma yasmiṃ aparaṇṇaṃ ruhati. yattha vā ubhayampi ruhati, taṃ khettaṃ. tadatthāya akatabhūmibhāgo vatthu. khettavatthusīsena cettha vāpi-taḷākādīnipi saṅgahitāneva.

[03] ^b^dūteyyaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0378^ea^ vuccati dūtakammaṃ gihīnaṃ paṇṇaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā gahetvā tattha tattha gamanaṃ. ^b^pahiṇagamanaṃ^eb^ vuccati gharā gharaṃ pesitassa khuddakagamanaṃ. ^b^anuyogo^eb^ nāma tadubhayakaraṇaṃ. tasmā duteyyapahiṇagamanānaṃ anuyogoti evamettha attho veditabbo. ^b^kayavikkayā^eb^ti kayā ca vikkayā ca. ^b^tulākūṭā^eb^dīsu ^b^kūṭa^eb^nti vañcanaṃ. tattha tulākūṭaṃ tāva rūpakūṭaṃ, aṅgakūṭaṃ, gahaṇakūṭaṃ, paṭicchannakūṭanti catubbidhaṃ hoti. tattha ^b^rūpakūṭaṃ^eb^ nāma dve tulā samarūpā katvā gaṇhanto mahatiyā gaṇhāti, dadanto khuddikāya deti. ^b^aṅgakūṭaṃ^eb^ nāma gaṇhanto pacchābhāge hatthena tulaṃ akkamati, dadanto pubbabhāge. ^b^gahaṇakūṭaṃ^eb^ nāma gaṇhanto mūle rajjuṃ gaṇhāti ^a^P3.0193^ea^, dadanto agge. ^b^paṭicchannakūṭaṃ^eb^ nāma tulaṃ susiraṃ katvā anto ayacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā gaṇhanto taṃ pacchābhāge karoti, dadanto aggabhāge.

[03] ^b^kaṃso^eb^ vuccati suvaṇṇapāti, tāya vañcanaṃ ^b^kaṃsakūṭaṃ^eb^. kathaṃ? ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ katvā aññā dve tisso lohapātiyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇā karoti. tato janapadaṃ gantvā kiñcideva aḍḍhakulaṃ ^a^V2.0375^ea^ pavisitvā ``suvaṇṇabhājanāni kiṇathā''ti vatvā agghe pucchite samagghataraṃ dātukāmā honti. tato tehi ``kathaṃ imesaṃ suvaṇṇabhāvo jānitabbo''ti vutte ``vīmaṃsitvā gaṇhathā''ti suvaṇṇapātiṃ pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā sabbapātiyo datvā gacchati.

[03] ^b^mānakūṭaṃ^eb^ nāma hadayabheda-sikhābheda-rajjubhedavasena tividhaṃ hoti. tattha ^b^hadayabhedo^eb^ sappitelādiminanakāle labbhati. tāni hi gaṇhanto heṭṭhāchiddena mānena ``saṇikaṃ āsiñcā''ti vatvā attano bhājane bahuṃ paggharāpetvā gaṇhāti, dadanto chiddaṃ pidhāya sīghaṃ pūretvā deti. ^b^sikhābhedo^eb^ tilataṇḍulādiminanakāle labbhati. tāni hi gaṇhanto saṇikaṃ sikhaṃ ussāpetvā gaṇhāti, dadanto vegena pūretvā sikhaṃ chindanto deti. ^b^rajjubhedo^eb^ khettavatthuminanakāle labbhati. lañjaṃ alabhantā hi khettaṃ amahantampi mahantaṃ katvā minanti.

[03] ^b^ukkoṭanā^eb^dīsu ^b^ukkoṭana^eb^nti sāmike assāmike kātuṃ lañjaggahaṇaṃ. ^b^vañcana^eb^nti tehi tehi upāyehi paresaṃ vañcanaṃ. tatridamekaṃ vatthu ^a^M2.0379^ea^ -- eko ^a^P3.0194^ea^ kira luddako migañca migapotakañca gahetvā āgacchati. tameko dhutto ``kiṃ bho migo agghati, kiṃ migapotako''ti āha. ``migo dve kahāpaṇe, migapotako eka''nti ca vutte ekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ datvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā thokaṃ gantvā nivatto ``na me bho migapotakenattho, migaṃ me dehī''ti āha. tena hi dve kahāpaṇe dehīti. so āha -- ``nanu te bho mayā paṭhamaṃ eko kahāpaṇo dinno''ti? āma dinnoti. imampi migapotakaṃ gaṇha, evaṃ so ca kahāpaṇo ayañca kahāpaṇagghanako migapotako''ti dve kahāpaṇā bhavissantīti. so ``kāraṇaṃ vadatī''ti sallakkhetvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā migaṃ adāsīti. ^b^nikatī^eb^ti yogavasena vā māyāvasena vā apāmaṅgaṃ pāmaṅganti, amaṇiṃ maṇinti, asuvaṇṇaṃ suvaṇṇanti katvā patirūpakena vañcanaṃ. ^b^sāciyogo^eb^ti kuṭilayogo. etesaṃyeva ukkoṭanādīnametaṃ nāmaṃ. tasmā ukkoṭanasāciyogo vañcanasāciyogo nikatisāciyogoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. keci aññaṃ dassetvā aññassa parivattanaṃ sāciyogoti vadanti, taṃ pana vañcaneneva saṅgahitaṃ.

[03] chedanādīsu ^b^chedana^eb^nti hatthacchedanādi. ^b^vadho^eb^ti māraṇaṃ. ^b^bandho^eb^ti rajjubandhanādīhi bandhanaṃ. ^b^viparāmoso^eb^ti himaviparāmoso, gumbaviparāmosoti duvidho. yaṃ himapātasamaye himena paṭicchannā hutvā maggappaṭipannaṃ janaṃ musanti, ayaṃ himaviparāmoso. yaṃ gumbādīhi paṭicchannā ^a^V2.0376^ea^ musanti, ayaṃ gumbaviparāmoso. ^b^ālopo^eb^ vuccati gāmanigamādīnaṃ vilopakaraṇaṃ. ^b^sahasākāro^eb^ti ^a^P3.0195^ea^ sāhasikakiriyā, gehaṃ pavisitvā manussānaṃ ure satthaṃ ṭhapetvā icchitabhaṇḍaggahaṇaṃ. evametasmā chedana...pe0... sahasākārā paṭivirato hoti.
