[03] ^b^so santuṭṭho hotī^eb^ti svāyaṃ bhikkhu heṭṭhā vuttena catūsu paccayesu dvādasavidhena itarītarapaccayasantosena samannāgato hoti. iminā pana dvādasavidhena itarītarapaccayasantosena samannāgatassa bhikkhuno aṭṭha parikkhārā vaṭṭanti -- tīṇi cīvarāni, patto, dantakaṭṭhacchedanavāsi, ekā sūci, kāyabandhanaṃ parissāvananti. vuttampi cetaṃ --
[21] ``ticīvarañca ^a^M2.0380^ea^ patto ca, vāsi sūci ca bandhanaṃ.
[22] parissāvanena aṭṭhete, yuttayogassa bhikkhuno''ti..

[03] te sabbe kāyaparihārikāpi honti, kucchiparihārikāpi. kathaṃ? ticīvaraṃ tāva nivāsetvā pārupitvā ca vicaraṇakāle kāyaṃ pariharati posetīti kāyaparihārikaṃ hoti. cīvarakaṇṇena udakaṃ parissāvetvā pivanakāle, khāditabbaphalāphalaṃ gahaṇakāle ca kucchiṃ pariharati posetīti kucchiparihārikaṃ hoti. pattopi tena udakaṃ uddharitvā nhānakāle kuṭiparibhaṇḍakaraṇakāle ca kāyaparihāriko hoti, āhāraṃ gahetvā bhuñjanakāle kucchiparihāriko. vāsipi tāya dantakaṭṭhacchedanakāle mañcapīṭhānaṃ aṅgapādacīvarakuṭidaṇḍakasajjanakāle ca kāyaparihārikā hoti, ucchucchedananāḷikerāditacchanakāle ^a^P3.0196^ea^ kucchiparihārikā. sūcipi cīvarasibbanakāle kāyaparihārikā hoti, pūvaṃ vā phalaṃ vā vijjhitvā khādanakāle kucchiparihārikā. kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā vicaraṇakāle kāyaparihārikaṃ, ucchuādīni bandhitvā gahaṇakāle kucchiparihārikaṃ. parissāvanaṃ tena udakaṃ parissāvetvā nhānakāle senāsanaparibhaṇḍakaraṇakāle ca kāyaparihārikaṃ, pānīyapānakaparissāvanakāle teneva tilataṇḍulaputhukādīni gahetvā khādanakāle ca kucchiparihārikaṃ. ayaṃ tāva aṭṭhaparikkhārikassa parikkhāramattā.

[03] navaparikkhārikassa pana seyyaṃ pavisantassa tatraṭṭhakapaccattharaṇaṃ vā kuñcikā vā vaṭṭati. dasaparikkhārikassa nisīdanaṃ vā cammakhaṇḍaṃ vā vaṭṭati. ekādasaparikkhārikassa kattarayaṭṭhi ^a^V2.0377^ea^ vā telanāḷikā vā vaṭṭati. dvādasaparikkhārikassa chattaṃ vā upāhanaṃ vā vaṭṭati. etesu ca aṭṭhaparikkhārikova santuṭṭho, itare asantuṭṭhā mahicchā mahābhārāti na vattabbā. etepi appicchāva santuṭṭhāva subharāva sallahukavuttinova. bhagavā pana na imaṃ suttaṃ tesaṃ vasena kathesi, aṭṭhaparikkhārikassa vasena kathesi. so hi khuddakavāsiñca sūciñca parissāvane pakkhipitvā pattassa anto ṭhapetvā pattaṃ aṃsakūṭe laggetvā ticīvaraṃ kāyappaṭibaddhaṃ katvā yenicchakaṃ sukhaṃ pakkamati, paṭinivattitvā gahetabbaṃ nāmassa ^a^P3.0197^ea^ na hoti. iti imassa bhikkhuno ^a^M2.0381^ea^ sallahukavuttitaṃ dassento bhagavā ^b^santuṭṭho hoti kāyaparihārikena cīvarenā^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^b^kāyaparihārikenā^eb^ti kāyapariharaṇamattakena. ^b^kucchiparihārikenā^eb^ti kucchipariharaṇamattakena. ^b^samādāyeva pakkamatī^eb^ti taṃ aṭṭhaparikkhāramattakaṃ sabbaṃ gahetvāva kāyappaṭibaddhaṃ katvāva gacchati, ``mama vihāro pariveṇaṃ upaṭṭhāko''tissa saṅgo vā bandho vā na hoti. so jiyā mutto saro viya, yūthā apakkanto mattahatthī viya icchiticchitaṃ senāsanaṃ, vanasaṇḍaṃ, rukkhamūlaṃ, navaṃ pabbhāraṃ paribhuñjanto eko tiṭṭhati, eko nisīdati, sabbiriyāpathesu eko adutiyo.
[21] ``cātuddiso appaṭigho ca hoti,
[27] santussamāno itarītarena.
[26] parissayānaṃ sahitā achambhī,
[22] eko care khaggavisāṇakappo''ti.. (su0 ni0 42; cūḷani0 khaggavisāṇasuttaniddeso 128) --
[25] evaṃ vaṇṇitaṃ khaggavisāṇakappataṃ āpajjati.

[03] idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya sādhento ^b^seyyathāpī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^pakkhī sakuṇo^eb^ti pakkhayutto sakuṇo. ^b^ḍetī^eb^ti uppatati. ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho -- sakuṇā nāma ``asukasmiṃ padese rukkho paripakkaphalo''ti ñatvā nānādisāhi āgantvā nakhapakkhatuṇḍādīhi ^a^P3.0198^ea^ tassa phalāni vijjhantā vidhunantā khādanti, ``idaṃ ajjatanāya, idaṃ svātanāya bhavissatī''ti nesaṃ ^a^V2.0378^ea^ na hoti. phale pana khīṇe neva rukkhassa ārakkhaṃ ṭhapenti, na tattha pakkhaṃ vā pattaṃ vā nakhaṃ vā tuṇḍaṃ vā ṭhapenti, atha kho tasmiṃ rukkhe anapekkhā hutvā yo yaṃ disābhāgaṃ icchati, so tena sapattabhārova uppatitvā gacchati. evameva ayaṃ bhikkhu nissaṅgo nirapekkhoyeva pakkamati, samādāyeva pakkamati. ^b^ariyenā^eb^ti niddosena. ^b^ajjhatta^eb^nti sake attabhāve. ^b^anavajjasukha^eb^nti niddosasukhaṃ.

[03] ^b^so cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā^eb^ti so iminā ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato bhikkhu cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ passitvāti attho. sesapadesupi ^a^M2.0382^ea^ yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.15) vuttaṃ. ^b^abyāsekasukha^eb^nti kilesehi anāsittasukhaṃ, avikiṇṇasukhantipi vuttaṃ. indriyasaṃvarasukhaṃ hi diṭṭhādīsu diṭṭhamattādivasena pavattatāya avikiṇṇaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^so abhikkante paṭikkante^eb^ti so manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ saṃvarena samannāgato bhikkhu imesu abhikkantapaṭikkantādīsu sattasu ṭhānesu satisampajaññavasena sampajānakārī hoti. tattha ^b^abhikkanta^eb^nti purato gamanaṃ. ^b^paṭikkanta^eb^nti pacchāgamanaṃ.

[03] ^b^sampajānakārī^eb^ ^a^P3.0199^ea^ ^b^hotī^eb^ti sātthakasampajaññaṃ, sappāyasampajaññaṃ, gocarasampajaññaṃ, asammohasampajaññanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ satisampayuttānaṃ sampajaññānaṃ vasena satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā ñāṇena paricchinditvāyeva tāni abhikkantapaṭikkantāni karoti. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana icchantena dīghanikāye sāmaññaphalavaṇṇanāto vā majjhimanikāye satipaṭṭhānavaṇṇanāto vā gahetabbo.

[03] ^b^so iminā cā^eb^tiādinā kiṃ dasseti? araññavāsassa paccayasampattiṃ dasseti. yassa hi ime cattāro paccayā natthi, tassa araññavāso na ijjhati, tiracchānagatehi vā vanacarakehi vā saddhiṃ vatthabbataṃ āpajjati. araññe adhivatthā devatā ``kiṃ evarūpassa pāpabhikkhuno araññavāsenā''ti bheravasaddaṃ sāventi, hatthehi sīsaṃ paharitvā palāyanākāraṃ karonti. ``asuko bhikkhu araññaṃ pavisitvā idañcidañca pāpakammamakāsī''ti ayaso pattharati. yassa panete cattāro paccayā atthi, tassa araññavāso ijjhati. so hi attano sīlaṃ ^a^V2.0379^ea^ paccavekkhanto kiñci kāḷakaṃ vā tilakaṃ vā apassanto pītiṃ uppādetvā taṃ khayato vayato sammasanto ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati. araññe adhivatthā devatā attamanā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti. itissa udake pakkhittatelabindu viya yaso vitthāriko hoti.

[03] tattha ^b^vivitta^eb^nti suññaṃ, appasaddaṃ, appanigghosanti attho. etadeva hi sandhāya vibhaṅge ``vivittanti santike cepi ^a^P3.0200^ea^ senāsanaṃ hoti, tañca anākiṇṇaṃ gahaṭṭhehi pabbajitehi, tena taṃ vivitta''nti (vibha0 526) vuttaṃ. seti ceva āsati ca etthāti ^b^senāsanaṃ^eb^. mañcapīṭhānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. tenāha -- ``senāsananti ^a^M2.0383^ea^ mañcopi senāsanaṃ, pīṭhampi, bhisipi, bimbohanampi, vihāropi, aḍḍhayogopi, pāsādopi, hammiyampi, guhāpi, aṭṭopi, māḷopi, leṇampi, veḷugumbopi, rukkhamūlampi, maṇḍapopi senāsanaṃ, yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamanti, sabbametaṃ senāsana''nti (vibha0 527). apica vihāro, aḍḍhayogo, pāsādo, hammiyaṃ, guhāti idaṃ vihārasenāsanaṃ nāma. mañco, pīṭhaṃ, bhisi, bimbohananti idaṃ mañcapīṭhasenāsanaṃ nāma. cimilikā, cammakhaṇḍo, tiṇasanthāro, paṇṇasanthāroti idaṃ santhatasenāsanaṃ nāma. yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamantīti etaṃ okāsasenāsanaṃ nāmāti evaṃ catubbidhaṃ senāsanaṃ hoti. taṃ sabbampi senāsanaggahaṇena gahitameva.

[03] imassa pana sakuṇasadisassa cātuddisassa bhikkhuno anucchavikaṃ dassento ^b^araññaṃ rukkhamūla^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^arañña^eb^nti ``nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā sabbametaṃ arañña''nti (vibha0 529) ``idaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vasena āgataṃ araññaṃ. ``āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima''nti (pārā0 654) idaṃ pana imassa bhikkhuno anurūpaṃ. tassa lakkhaṇaṃ visuddhimagge dhutaṅganiddese vuttaṃ. ^b^rukkhamūla^eb^nti ^a^P3.0201^ea^ yaṃkiñci sītacchāyaṃ vivittaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ. ^b^pabbata^eb^nti selaṃ. tattha hi udakasoṇḍīsu udakakiccaṃ katvā sītāya rukkhacchāyāya nisinnassa nānādisāsu khāyamānāsu sītena vātena bījiyamānassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti. ^b^kandara^eb^nti kaṃ vuccati udakaṃ, tena dāritaṃ udakabhinnaṃ pabbatapadesaṃ, yaṃ nitambantipi nadīnikuñjantipi vadanti. tattha hi rajatapaṭṭasadisā vālikā hoti, matthake maṇivitānaṃ viya vanagahanaṃ, maṇikkhandhasadisaṃ udakaṃ sandati. evarūpaṃ kandaraṃ oruyha pānīyaṃ pivitvā gattāni sītāni katvā vālikaṃ ussāpetvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ paññāpetvā nisinnassa samaṇadhammaṃ karoto cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti. ^b^giriguha^eb^nti dvinnaṃ pabbatānaṃ antaraṃ, ekasmiṃyeva ^a^V2.0380^ea^ vā umaṅgasadisaṃ mahāvivaraṃ. ^b^susāna^eb^lakkhaṇaṃ visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.34) vuttaṃ. ^b^vanapattha^eb^nti gāmantaṃ atikkamitvā manussānaṃ anupacāraṭṭhānaṃ, yattha na kasanti na vapanti. tenevāha -- ``vanapatthanti dūrānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacana''ntiādi. ^b^abbhokāsa^eb^nti acchannaṃ. ākaṅkhamāno panettha cīvarakuṭiṃ katvā vasati. ^b^palālapuñja^eb^nti ^a^P3.0202^ea^ palālarāsiṃ ^a^M2.0384^ea^. mahāpalālapuñjato hi palālaṃ nikkaḍḍhitvā pabbhāraleṇasadise ālaye karonti, gacchagumbādīnampi upari palālaṃ pakkhipitvā heṭṭhā nisinnā samaṇadhammaṃ karonti. taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^pacchābhatta^eb^nti bhattassa pacchato. ^b^piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto^eb^ti piṇḍapātapariyesanato paṭikkanto. ^b^pallaṅka^eb^nti samantato ūrubaddhāsanaṃ. ^b^ābhujitvā^eb^ti bandhitvā. ^b^ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyā^eb^ti uparimasarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādetvā. evañhi nisinnassa cammamaṃsanhārūni na paṇamanti. athassa yā tesaṃ paṇamanapaccayā khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjeyyuṃ, tā na uppajjanti. tāsu na uppajjamānāsu cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ na paripatati, vuddhiṃ phātiṃ upagacchati. ^b^parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ ṭhapayitvā, mukhasamīpe vā katvāti attho. teneva vibhaṅge vuttaṃ -- ``ayaṃ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti sūpaṭṭhitā nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte vā. tena vuccati parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā''ti (vibha0 537). atha vā ^b^``parī^eb^ti pariggahaṭṭho. ^b^mukha^eb^nti niyyānaṭṭho. ^b^satī^eb^ti upaṭṭhānaṭṭho. tena vuccati -- `parimukhaṃ sati'''nti evaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ (paṭi0 ma0 1.164) vuttanayena panettha attho daṭṭhabbo. tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepo ``pariggahitaniyyānaṃ satiṃ katvā''ti.

[03] ^b^abhijjhaṃ loke^eb^ti ettha lujjana-palujjanaṭṭhena pañcupādānakkhandhā ^a^P3.0203^ea^ loko. tasmā pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu rāgaṃ pahāya kāmacchandaṃ vikkhambhetvāti ayamettha attho. ^b^vigatābhijjhenā^eb^ti vikkhambhanavasena pahīnattā vigatābhijjhena, na cakkhuviññāṇasadisenāti attho. ^b^abhijjhāya cittaṃ parisodhetī^eb^ti abhijjhāto cittaṃ parimoceti, yathā naṃ sā muñcati ceva muñcitvā ca na puna gaṇhāti, evaṃ karotīti attho. ^b^byāpādapadosaṃ pahāyā^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. byāpajjati iminā cittaṃ pūtikummāsādayo viya purimapakatiṃ pajahatīti ^b^byāpādo^eb^. vikārappattiyā padussati, paraṃ vā padūseti vināsetīti ^b^padoso^eb^. ubhayampetaṃ kodhasseva adhivacanaṃ ^a^V2.0381^ea^. thinaṃ cittagelaññaṃ, middhaṃ cetasikagelaññaṃ. thinañca middhañca ^b^thinamiddhaṃ. ālokasaññī^eb^ti rattimpi divāpi diṭṭhāalokasañjānanasamatthāya vigatanīvaraṇāya parisuddhāya saññāya samannāgato ^a^M2.0385^ea^. ^b^sato sampajāno^eb^ti satiyā ca ñāṇena ca samannāgato. idaṃ ubhayaṃ ālokasaññāya upakārakattā vuttaṃ. uddhaccañca kukkuccañca ^b^uddhaccakukkuccaṃ. tiṇṇavicikiccho^eb^ti vicikicchaṃ taritvā atikkamitvā ṭhito. ``kathamidaṃ kathamida''nti evaṃ nappavattatīti ^b^akathaṃkathī. kusalesu dhammesū^eb^ti anavajjesu dhammesu. ``ime nu kho kusalā, kathamime kusalā''ti evaṃ na vicikicchati na kaṅkhatīti attho. ayamettha ^a^P3.0204^ea^ saṅkhepo. imesu pana nīvaraṇesu vacanatthalakkhaṇādibhedato yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.71-72) vuttaṃ. ^b^paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe^eb^ti yasmā ime pañca nīvaraṇā uppajjamānā anuppannāya lokiyalokuttarāya paññāya uppajjituṃ na denti, uppannāpi aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca vā abhiññā ucchinditvā pātenti. tasmā paññāya dubbalīkaraṇāti vuccanti. ^b^vivicceva kāmehī^eb^tiādīni visuddhimagge vitthāritāni.

[03] ^b^ime āsavā^eb^tiādi aparenāpi pariyāyena catusaccappakāsanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānātī^eb^ti ettāvatā heṭṭhā tīhi aṅgehi bāhirasamayassa nipphalabhāvaṃ dassetvā catutthena aṅgena attano sāsanassa gambhīrabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā desanāya arahattena kūṭaṃ gaṇhi. idāni desanaṃ appento ^b^evaṃ kho, bhikkhave^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] 199^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^jālini^eb^nti jālasadisaṃ. yathā hi jālaṃ samantato saṃsibbitaṃ ākulabyākulaṃ, evaṃ taṇhāpīti jālasadisattā jālinīti vuttā. tayo vā bhave ajjhottharitvā ṭhitāya etissā tattha tattha attano koṭṭhāsabhūtaṃ jālaṃ atthītipi jālinī. ^b^sarita^eb^nti tattha tattha saritvā saṃsaritvā ṭhitaṃ. ^b^visaṭa^eb^nti patthaṭaṃ vikkhittaṃ. ^b^visattika^eb^nti tattha tattha visattaṃ laggaṃ lagitaṃ. apica ^a^P3.0205^ea^ ^b^``visamūlā^eb^ti visattikā. ^b^visaphalā^eb^ti visattikā''tiādināpi (mahāni0 3; cūḷani0 mettagūmāṇavapucchāniddeso 22) nayenettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^uddhasto^eb^ti upari dhaṃsito. ^b^pariyonaddho^eb^ti samantā veṭhito. ^b^tantākulakajāto^eb^ti tantaṃ viya ākulajāto. yathā nāma dunnikkhittaṃ mūsikacchinnaṃ pesakārānaṃ tantaṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ ākulaṃ ^a^V2.0382^ea^ hoti, ``idaṃ aggaṃ idaṃ mūla''nti aggena vā aggaṃ, mūlena vā mūlaṃ samānetuṃ dukkaraṃ hoti, evaṃ sattā imāya taṇhāya ^a^M2.0386^ea^ pariyonaddhā ākulabyākulā na sakkonti attano nissaraṇamaggaṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ. ^b^gulāguṇṭhikajāto^eb^ti gulāguṇṭhikaṃ vuccati pesakārakañjiyasuttaṃ. gulā nāma sakuṇikā, tassā kulāvakotipi eke. yathā tadubhayampi ākulaṃ aggena vā aggaṃ, mūlena vā mūlaṃ samānetuṃ dukkaranti purimanayeneva yojetabbaṃ. ^b^muñjapabbajabhūto^eb^ti muñjatiṇaṃ viya pabbajatiṇaṃ viya ca bhūto, tādiso jāto. yathā tāni tiṇāni koṭṭetvā katarajjuṃ jiṇṇakāle katthaci patitaṃ gahetvā tesaṃ tiṇānaṃ ``idaṃ aggaṃ idaṃ mūla''nti aggena vā aggaṃ, mūlena vā mūlaṃ samānetuṃ dukkaraṃ. tampi ca paccattapurisakāre ṭhatvā sakkā bhaveyya ujuṃ kātuṃ, ṭhapetvā pana bodhisatte añño satto attano dhammatāya taṇhājālaṃ padāletvā attano nissaraṇamaggaṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ samattho nāma natthi. evamayaṃ loko taṇhājālena pariyonaddho apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ saṃsāraṃ nātivattati. tattha ^a^P3.0206^ea^ ^b^apāyo^eb^ti niraya-tiracchānayoni-pettivisaya-asurakāyā. sabbepi hi te vaḍḍhisaṅkhātassa āyassa abhāvato apāyāti vuccanti. tathā dukkhassa gatibhāvato ^b^duggati^eb^. sukhasamussayato vinipatitattā ^b^vinipāto^eb^. itaro pana --
[21] ``khandhānañca paṭipāṭi, dhātuāyatanāna ca.
[22] abbocchinnaṃ vattamānā, saṃsāroti pavuccati..

[03] taṃ sabbaṃ nātivattati nātikkamati, atha kho cutito paṭisandhiṃ paṭisandhito cutinti evaṃ punappunaṃ cutipaṭisandhiyo gaṇhamāno tīsu bhavesu catūsu yonīsu pañcasu gatīsu sattasu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu navasu sattāvāsesu mahāsamudde vātakkhittanāvā viya yante yuttagoṇo viya ca paribbhamatiyeva.

[03] ^b^ajjhattikassa upādāyā^eb^ti ajjhattikaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ upādāya. idañhi upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^bāhirassa upādāyā^eb^ti bāhiraṃ khandhapañcakaṃ upādāya, idampi upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^asmīti, bhikkhave, satī^eb^ti, bhikkhave, yadetaṃ ajjhattaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ upādāya taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena samūhaggāhato asmīti hoti, tasmiṃ satīti attho. ^b^itthasmīti hotī^eb^tiādīsu pana evaṃ samūhato ahanti gahaṇe sati tato anupanidhāya ^a^M2.0387^ea^ ca upanidhāya cāti ^a^V2.0383^ea^ dvidhā gahaṇaṃ hoti. tattha ^b^anupanidhāyā^eb^ti aññaṃ ākāraṃ anupagamma ^a^P3.0207^ea^ sakabhāvameva ārammaṇaṃ katvā itthasmīti hoti, khattiyādīsu idaṃpakāro ahanti evaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena hotīti attho. idaṃ tāva anupanidhāya gahaṇaṃ. ^b^upanidhāya gahaṇaṃ^eb^ pana duvidhaṃ hoti samato ca asamato ca. taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^evaṃsmīti aññathāsmī^eb^ti ca vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^evaṃsmī^eb^ti idaṃ samato upanidhāya gahaṇaṃ, yathāyaṃ khattiyo yathāyaṃ brāhmaṇo, evamahampīti attho. ^b^aññathāsmī^eb^ti idaṃ pana asamato gahaṇaṃ, yathāyaṃ khattiyo yathāyaṃ brāhmaṇo, tato aññathā ahaṃ, hīno vā adhiko vāti attho. imāni tāva paccuppannavasena cattāri taṇhāvicaritāni.

[03] ^b^asasmīti satasmī^eb^ti imāni pana dve yasmā atthīti asaṃ, niccassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. sīdatīti sataṃ, aniccassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. tasmā sassatucchedavasena vuttānīti veditabbāni. ito parāni ^b^sa^eb^nti evamādīni cattāri saṃsayaparivitakkavasena vuttāni. ^b^santi hotī^eb^ti evamādīsu ahaṃ siyanti hotīti evamattho veditabbo. adhippāyo panettha purimacatukke vuttanayeneva gahetabbo. ^b^apihaṃ sa^eb^ntiādīni pana cattāri api nāma ahaṃ bhaveyyanti evaṃ patthanākappanavasena vuttāni. tānipi purimacatukke vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. ^b^bhavissa^eb^ntiādīni ^a^P3.0208^ea^ pana cattāri anāgatavasena vuttāni. tesampi purimacatukke vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. evamete --
[21] ``dve diṭṭhisīsā sīsaññe, cattāro sīsamūlakā.
[22] tayo tayoti etāni, aṭṭhārasa vibhāvaye..

[03] etesu hi asasmi, satasmīti ete dve diṭṭhisīsā nāma. asmi, santi, apihaṃ santi, bhavissanti ete cattāro suddhasīsā eva. itthasmītiādayo tayo tayoti dvādasa sīsamūlakā nāmāti evamete dve diṭṭhisīsā cattāro suddhasīsā dvādasa sīsamūlakāti aṭṭhārasa taṇhāvicaritadhammā veditabbā. imāni tāva ajjhattikassa upādāya aṭṭhārasa taṇhāvicaritāni. bāhirassa upādāya taṇhāvicaritesupi eseva ^a^M2.0388^ea^ nayo. ^b^iminā^eb^ti iminā rūpena vā...pe0... viññāṇena vāti esa viseso veditabbo. sesaṃ tādisameva.

[03] ^b^iti evarūpāni atītāni chattiṃsā^eb^ti ekamekassa puggalassa atīte addhani chattiṃsa. ^b^anāgatāni^eb^ ^a^V2.0384^ea^ ^b^chattiṃsā^eb^ti ekamekasseva puggalassa ca anāgate addhani chattiṃsa. ^b^paccuppannāni chattiṃsā^eb^ti ekassa vā puggalassa yathāsambhavato bahūnaṃ vā paccuppanne addhani chattiṃsāva. sabbasattānaṃ pana niyameneva atīte addhani chattiṃsa, anāgate chattiṃsa, paccuppanne chattiṃsa. anantā hi asadisataṇhāmānadiṭṭhibhedā sattā. ^b^aṭṭhasataṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0209^ea^ ^b^taṇhāvicaritaṃ hontī^eb^ti ettha pana aṭṭhasatasaṅkhātaṃ taṇhāvicaritaṃ hotīti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.

[03] 200^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^na ussenetī^eb^ti diṭṭhivasena na ukkhipati. ^b^na paṭisenetī^eb^ti paṭiviruddho hutvā kalahabhaṇḍanavasena na ukkhipati. ^b^na dhūpāyatī^eb^ti ajjhattikassa upādāya taṇhāvicaritavasena na dhūpāyati. ^b^na pajjalatī^eb^ti bāhirassa upādāya taṇhāvicaritavasena na pajjalati. ^b^na sampajjhāyatī^eb^ti asmimānavasena na sampajjhāyati. sesaṃ pāḷinayeneva veditabbaṃ. imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti.
[06] mahāvaggo pañcamo.
[06] catutthapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 201^b^.^eb^ pañcamassa ^a^V2.0385^ea^ ^a^M2.0389^ea^ paṭhame ^b^asappurisa^eb^nti lāmakapurisaṃ tucchapurisaṃ mūḷhapurisaṃ avijjāya andhīkataṃ bālaṃ. ^b^asappurisatara^eb^nti atirekena asappurisaṃ. itare dve vuttapaṭipakkhavasena veditabbā. sesamettha uttānatthameva. yathā cettha, evaṃ ito paresu pañcasu. etesu hi paṭhamaṃ pañcaveravasena desitaṃ, dutiyaṃ assaddhammavasena, tatiyaṃ kāyavacīdvāravasena, catutthaṃ manodvāravasena, pañcamaṃ aṭṭhamicchattavasena, chaṭṭhaṃ dasamicchattavasena.

[03] 207-210^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^P3.0210^ea^ ^b^pāpa^eb^nti lāmakaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhapuggalaṃ. ^b^kalyāṇa^eb^nti bhaddakaṃ anavajjapuggalaṃ. sesamettha uttānatthameva. aṭṭhamepi eseva nayo. navame ^b^pāpadhamma^eb^nti lāmakadhammaṃ. ^b^kalyāṇadhamma^eb^nti anavajjadhammaṃ. sesamettha uttānatthameva. dasamepi eseva nayo. imasmiṃ vagge dasasupi suttesu agāriyappaṭipadā kathitā. sacepi sotāpannasakadāgāmino honti, vaṭṭatiyevāti.
[06] sappurisavaggo paṭhamo.
[03] 211^b^.^eb^ dutiyassa ^a^V2.0386^ea^ paṭhame parisaṃ dūsentīti ^b^parisadūsanā^eb^. parisaṃ sobhentīti ^b^parisasobhanā^eb^.
[03] 212^b^.^eb^ dutiye manoduccarite pariyāpannāpi micchādiṭṭhi mahāsāvajjatāya visuṃ vuttā, tassā ca paṭipakkhavasena sammādiṭṭhi.
[03] 213^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^M2.0390^ea^ ^b^akataññutā akataveditā^eb^ti akataññutāya akataveditāya. ubhayampetaṃ atthato ekameva. sukkapakkhepi eseva nayo.

[03] 214-217^b^.^eb^ catutthaṃ catunnaṃ kammakilesānaṃ tappaṭipakkhassa ca vasena vuttaṃ, pañcamaṃ sukkapakkhānaṃ ādito catunnaṃ micchattānaṃ vasena, chaṭṭhaṃ avasesānaṃ catunnaṃ, sattamaṃ anariyavohārāriyavohārānaṃ. tathā ^a^P3.0211^ea^ aṭṭhamanavamadasamāni sappaṭipakkhānaṃ assaddhammānaṃ vasena vuttāni. sabbasuttesu pana sukkapakkhadhammā lokiyalokuttaramissakāva kathitā. navasu suttesu kiñcāpi ``sagge''ti vuttaṃ, tayo pana maggā tīṇi ca phalāni labbhantiyevāti.
[06] parisāvaggo dutiyo.

[03] 221-231^b^.^eb^ tatiyassa ^a^V2.0387^ea^ paṭhamādīni uttānatthāneva. dasame yo cintetvā kabyaṃ karoti, ayaṃ ^b^cintākavi^eb^ nāma. yo sutvā karoti, ayaṃ ^b^sutakavi^eb^ nāma. yo ekaṃ atthaṃ nissāya karoti, ayaṃ ^b^atthakavi^eb^ nāma. yo taṅkhaṇaññeva vaṅgīsatthero viya attano paṭibhānena karoti, ayaṃ ^b^paṭibhānakavi^eb^ nāmāti.
[06] duccaritavaggo tatiyo.

[03] 232^b^.^eb^ catutthassa ^a^V2.0388^ea^ paṭhame ^b^kaṇha^eb^nti kāḷakaṃ dasākusalakammapathakammaṃ. ^b^kaṇhavipāka^eb^nti apāye nibbattanato kāḷakavipākaṃ. ^b^sukka^eb^nti paṇḍarakaṃ kusalakammapathakammaṃ ^a^M2.0391^ea^. ^b^sukkavipāka^eb^nti sagge nibbattanato paṇḍarakavipākaṃ. ^b^kaṇhasukka^eb^nti missakakammaṃ. ^b^kaṇhasukkavipāka^eb^nti ^a^P3.0212^ea^ sukhadukkhavipākaṃ. missakakammañhi katvā akusalena tiracchānayoniyaṃ maṅgalahatthiṭṭhānādīsu uppanno kusalena pavatte sukhaṃ vediyati. kusalena rājakulepi nibbatto akusalena pavatte dukkhaṃ vediyati. ^b^akaṇhaṃ asukka^eb^nti kammakkhayakaraṃ catumaggañāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ. tañhi yadi kaṇhaṃ bhaveyya, kaṇhavipākaṃ dadeyya. yadi sukkaṃ bhaveyya, sukkavipākaṃ dadeyya. ubhayavipākassa pana appadānato akaṇhaṃ asukkanti ayamettha attho.

[03] 233^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^sabyābajjha^eb^nti sadosaṃ. ^b^kāyasaṅkhāra^eb^nti kāyadvāracetanaṃ. ^b^abhisaṅkharotī^eb^ti āyūhati sampiṇḍeti. sesadvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^sabyābajjhaṃ loka^eb^nti sadukkhaṃ lokaṃ. ^b^sabyābajjhā phassā^eb^ti sadukkhā vipākaphassā. ^b^sabyābajjhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyatī^eb^ti sābādhaṃ vipākavedanaṃ vediyati. ^b^ekantadukkha^eb^nti ekanteneva dukkhaṃ, na sukhasammissaṃ. ^b^seyyathāpi sattā nerayikā^eb^ti ettha ^b^seyyathāpī^eb^ti nidassanatthe nipāto. tena kevalaṃ nerayikasatte dasseti, aññe pana taṃsarikkhakā nāma natthi. iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo. ^b^seyyathāpi manussā^eb^tiādīsu pana manussānaṃ tāva kālena sukhā vedanā uppajjati, kālena dukkhā vedanā. ^b^ekacce^eb^ ^a^P3.0213^ea^ ^b^ca devā^eb^ti ettha pana kāmāvacaradevā daṭṭhabbā. tesañhi mahesakkhatarā devatā disvā nisinnāsanato vuṭṭhānaṃ, pārutauttarāsaṅgassa otāraṇaṃ, añjalipaggaṇhanantiādīnaṃ vasena kālena dukkhaṃ uppajjati, dibbasampattiṃ anubhavantānaṃ kālena sukhaṃ. ^b^ekacce ca vinipātikā^eb^ti ettha vemānikapetā daṭṭhabbā. te nirantarameva ekasmiṃ kāle sukhaṃ, ekasmiṃ kāle ^a^V2.0389^ea^ dukkhaṃ vediyanti. nāgasupaṇṇahatthiassādayo pana manussā viya vokiṇṇasukhadukkhāva honti. ^b^pahānāya yā cetanā^eb^ti ettha vivaṭṭagāminī maggacetanā veditabbā. sā hi kammakkhayāya saṃvattatīti.

[03] 234^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^M2.0392^ea^ ^b^sikhāmoggallāno^eb^ti sīsamajjhe ṭhitāya mahatiyā sikhāya samannāgato moggallānagotto brāhmaṇo. ^b^purimānī^eb^ti atītānantaradivasato paṭṭhāya purimāni, dutiyādito paṭṭhāya ^b^purimatarāni^eb^ veditabbāni. ^b^soṇakāyano^eb^ti tasseva antevāsiko. ^b^kammasaccāyaṃ bho loko^eb^ti bho ayaṃ loko kammasabhāvo. ^b^kammasamārambhaṭṭhāyī^eb^ti kammasamārambhena tiṭṭhati. kammaṃ āyūhantova tiṭṭhati, anāyūhanto ucchijjatīti dīpeti. sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.

[03] 235^b^.^eb^ catutthādīnipi uttānatthāneva. maggaṅgesu pana yasmā satiyā upaṭṭhapetvā paññāya paricchindati, tasmā ubhayameva kammaṃ. sesā aṅgāneva honti, no kammanti ^a^P3.0214^ea^ vuttaṃ. bojjhaṅgesupi eseva nayo. abhidhamme pana sabbampetaṃ avisesena cetanāsampayuttakammanteva vaṇṇitaṃ.

[03] 241^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^idhevā^eb^ti imasmiṃyeva sāsane. ayaṃ pana niyamo sesapadesupi veditabbo. dutiyādayopi hi samaṇā idheva, na aññattha. ^b^suññā^eb^ti rittā tucchā. ^b^parappavādā^eb^ti cattāro sassatavādā, cattāro ekaccasassatikā, cattāro antānantikā, cattāro amarāvikkhepikā, dve adhiccasamuppannikā, soḷasa saññivādā, aṭṭha asaññivādā, aṭṭha nevasaññināsaññivādā, satta ucchedavādā, pañca diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti ime sabbepi brahmajāle āgatadvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiyo ito bāhirānaṃ paresaṃ pavādā parappavādā nāma. te sabbepi imehi catūhi phalaṭṭhakasamaṇehi suññā. na hi te ettha santi. na kevalañca eteheva suññā ^a^V2.0390^ea^, catūhi pana maggaṭṭhakasamaṇehipi, catunnaṃ maggānaṃ atthāya āraddhavipassakehipīti dvādasahipi samaṇehi suññā eva. idameva atthaṃ sandhāya bhagavatā mahāparinibbāne (dī0 ni0 2.214) vuttaṃ --
[21] ``ekūnatiṃso ^a^M2.0393^ea^ vayasā subhadda,
[27] yaṃ pabbajiṃ kiṃkusalānuesī.
[26] vassāni paññāsa samādhikāni,
[27] yato ahaṃ pabbajito subhadda.
[26] ñāyassa dhammassa padesavattī,
[22] ito bahiddhā samaṇopi natthi''..

[03] ``dutiyopi samaṇo natthi, tatiyopi samaṇo natthi, catutthopi samaṇo natthi, suññā parappavādā samaṇehi aññehī''ti ^a^P3.0215^ea^. ettha hi padesavattīti āraddhavipassako adhippeto. tasmā sotāpattimaggassa āraddhavipassakaṃ maggaṭṭhaṃ phalaṭṭhanti tayopi ekato katvā ``samaṇopi natthī''ti āha, sakadāgāmimaggassa āraddhavipassakaṃ maggaṭṭhaṃ phalaṭṭhanti tayopi ekato katvā ``dutiyopi samaṇo natthī''ti āha. itaresupi dvīsu eseva nayo. ekādasamaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
[06] kammavaggo catuttho.

[03] 243^b^.^eb^ pañcamassa ^a^V2.0391^ea^ paṭhame ^b^api nu taṃ, ānanda, adhikaraṇa^eb^nti vivādādhikaraṇādīsu aññataraṃ adhikaraṇaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa uppajji, satthā tassa vūpasantabhāvaṃ pucchanto evamāha. ^b^kuto taṃ, bhante^eb^ti, bhante, kuto kinti kena kāraṇena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamissatīti vadati. ^b^kevalakappa^eb^nti sakalaṃ samantato. ^b^saṅghabhedāya ṭhito^eb^ti saṅghena saddhiṃ vādatthāya kathitaṃ paṭikathentova ṭhito. ^b^tatrāyasmā^eb^ti tasmiṃ evaṃ ṭhite āyasmā anuruddho. ^b^na ekavācikampi bhaṇitabbaṃ maññatī^eb^ti ``mā, āvuso, saṅghena saddhiṃ evaṃ avacā''ti ekavacanampi vattabbaṃ na maññati. ^b^voyuñjatī^eb^ti anuyuñjati anuyogaṃ āpajjati. ^b^atthavase^eb^ti kāraṇavase. ^b^nāsessantī^eb^ti ^a^P3.0216^ea^ uposathappavāraṇaṃ upagantuṃ adatvā nikkaḍḍhissanti. sesaṃ pāḷivaseneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] 244^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^M2.0394^ea^ ^b^khuramuṇḍaṃ karitvā^eb^ti pañca sikhaṇḍake ṭhapetvā khurena muṇḍaṃ karitvā. ^b^kharassarenā^eb^ti kakkhaḷasaddena. ^b^paṇavenā^eb^ti vajjhabheriyā. ^b^thalaṭṭhassā^eb^ti ekamante ṭhitassa. ^b^sīsacchejja^eb^nti sīsacchedārahaṃ. ^b^yatra hi nāmā^eb^ti yaṃ nāma. ^b^so vatassāha^eb^nti so vata ahaṃ assaṃ, yaṃ evarūpaṃ pāpaṃ na kareyyanti attho. ^b^yathādhammaṃ paṭikarissatī^eb^ti dhammānurūpaṃ paṭikarissati, sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhassatīti attho. ^b^kāḷavatthaṃ paridhāyā^eb^ti kāḷapilotikaṃ nivāsetvā. ^b^mosalla^eb^nti musalābhipātārahaṃ. ^b^yathādhamma^eb^nti idha āpattito vuṭṭhāya suddhante patiṭṭhahanto yathādhammaṃ karoti nāma. ^b^bhasmapuṭa^eb^nti chārikābhaṇḍikaṃ. ^b^gārayhaṃ bhasmapuṭa^eb^nti garahitabbachārikāpuṭena matthake abhighātārahaṃ. ^b^yathādhamma^eb^nti idha āpattiṃ desento yathādhammaṃ paṭikaroti nāma. ^b^upavajja^eb^nti upavādārahaṃ. ^b^pāṭidesanīyesū^eb^ti paṭidesetabbesu. iminā ^a^P3.0217^ea^ sabbāpi ^a^V2.0392^ea^ sesāpattiyo saṅgahitā. ^b^imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri āpattibhayānī^eb^ti, bhikkhave, imāni cattāri āpattiṃ nissāya uppajjanakabhayāni nāmāti.

[03] 245^b^.^eb^ tatiye sikkhā ānisaṃsā etthāti ^b^sikkhānisaṃsaṃ^eb^. paññā uttarā etthāti ^b^paññuttaraṃ^eb^. vimutti sāro etthāti ^b^vimuttisāraṃ^eb^. sati ādhipateyyā etthāti ^b^satādhipateyyaṃ^eb^. etesaṃ hi sikkhādisaṅkhātānaṃ ānisaṃsādīnaṃ atthāya vussatīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^ābhisamācārikā^eb^ti uttamasamācārikā. vattavasena paññattasīlassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^tathā tathā so tassā sikkhāyā^eb^ti tathā tathā so sikkhākāmo bhikkhu tasmiṃ sikkhāpade.

[03] ^b^ādibrahmacariyikā^eb^ti maggabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtānaṃ catunnaṃ mahāsīlānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^sabbaso^eb^ti sabbākārena. ^b^dhammā^eb^ti catusaccadhammā. ^b^paññāya samavekkhitā hontī^eb^ti sahavipassanāya maggapaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti. ^b^vimuttiyā phusitā hontī^eb^ti arahattaphalavimuttiyā ñāṇaphassena phuṭṭhā honti. ^b^ajjhattaṃyeva sati sūpaṭṭhitā hotī^eb^ti niyakajjhatteyeva sati suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitā hoti. ^b^paññāya anuggahessāmī^eb^ti vipassanāpaññāya ^a^M2.0395^ea^ anuggahessāmi. ^b^paññāya^eb^ ^a^P3.0218^ea^ ^b^samavekkhissāmī^eb^ti idhāpi vipassanāpaññā adhippetā. ^b^phusitaṃ vā dhammaṃ tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmī^eb^ti ettha pana maggapaññāva adhippetā.

[03] 246^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^petā^eb^ti kālakatā vuccanti. ^b^uttānā sentī^eb^ti te yebhuyyena uttānakāva sayanti. atha vā pettivisaye nibbattā ^b^petā^eb^ nāma, te appamaṃsalohitattā aṭṭhisaṅghātajaṭitā ekena passena sayituṃ na sakkonti, uttānāva senti. ^b^anattamano hotī^eb^ti tejussadattā sīho migarājā dve purimapāde ekasmiṃ, pacchimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapetvā naṅguṭṭhaṃ antarasatthimhi pakkhipitvā purimapādapacchimapādanaṅguṭṭhānaṃ ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkhetvā dvinnaṃ purimapādānaṃ matthake sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā sayati. divasampi sayitvā pabujjhamāno na uttasanto pabujjhati, sīsaṃ pana ukkhipitvā purimapādādīnaṃ ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkhetvā sace kiñci ṭhānaṃ ^a^V2.0393^ea^ vijahitvā ṭhitaṃ hoti, ``nayidaṃ tuyhaṃ jātiyā, na sūrabhāvassa anurūpa''nti anattamano hutvā tattheva sayati, na gocarāya pakkamati. idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ -- ``anattamano hotī''ti. avijahitvā ṭhite pana ``tuyhaṃ jātiyā ca sūrabhāvassa ca anurūpamida''nti haṭṭhatuṭṭho uṭṭhāya sīhavijambhanaṃ vijambhitvā kesarabhāraṃ vidhunitvā tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ ^a^P3.0219^ea^ naditvā gocarāya pakkamati. tena vuttaṃ -- ``attamano hotī''ti.

[03] 247^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^rājā cakkavattī^eb^ti ettha kasmā bhagavā agāramajjhe vasitvā kālakatassa rañño thūpakaraṇaṃ anujānāti, na sīlavato puthujjanabhikkhussāti? anacchariyattā. puthujjanabhikkhūnañhi thūpe anuññāyamāne tambapaṇṇidīpe tāva thūpānaṃ okāso na bhaveyya, tathā aññesu ṭhānesu. tasmā ``anacchariyā te bhavissantī''ti nānujānāti. cakkavattī rājā ekova nibbattati, tenassa thūpo acchariyo hoti. puthujjanasīlavato pana parinibbutabhikkhuno viya mahantampi sakkāraṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. chaṭṭhasattamāni uttānatthāneva.
[03] 250^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^M2.0396^ea^ ^b^anariyavohārā^eb^ti anariyānaṃ kathā. sesesupi eseva nayo.
[06] āpattibhayavaggo pañcamo.
[06] pañcamapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 254-256^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhassa ^a^V2.0394^ea^ paṭhame ^b^abhiññāyā^eb^ti jānitvā. ^b^samatho ca vipassanā cā^eb^ti cittekaggatā ca saṅkhārapariggahavipassanāñāṇañca. ^b^vijjā ca vimutti cā^eb^ti maggañāṇavijjā ca sesā sampayuttakadhammā ca. dutiye ^a^P3.0220^ea^ ^b^anariyapariyesanā^eb^ti anariyānaṃ esanā gavesanā. ^b^jarādhamma^eb^nti jarāsabhāvaṃ. sesesupi eseva nayo. tatiyaṃ uttānameva.

[03] 257^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^mālukyaputto^eb^ti mālukyabrāhmaṇiyā putto. ^b^etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ tava ovādayācane. iminā theraṃ apasādetipi ussādetipi. kathaṃ? ayaṃ kira daharakāle paccayesu laggo hutvā pacchā mahallakakāle araññavāsaṃ patthento kammaṭṭhānaṃ yācati. atha bhagavā ``ettha dahare kiṃ vakkhāma, mālukyaputto viya tumhepi taruṇakāle paccayesu laggitvā mahallakakāle araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ kareyyāthā''ti iminā adhippāyena bhaṇanto theraṃ apasādeti nāma. yasmā pana thero mahallakakāleva araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātukāmo, tasmā bhagavā ``ettha dahare kiṃ vakkhāma, ayaṃ amhākaṃ mālukyaputto mahallakakālepi araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātukāmo ^a^M2.0397^ea^ kammaṭṭhānaṃ yācati. tumhe tāva taruṇakālepi vīriyaṃ na karothā''ti iminā adhippāyena bhaṇanto theraṃ ussādeti nāmāti yojanā.

[03] 258-263^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^V2.0395^ea^ ^a^P3.0221^ea^ ^b^ādhipacce ṭhapentī^eb^ti bhaṇḍāgārikaṭṭhāne ṭhapenti. chaṭṭhe ^b^vaṇṇasampanno^eb^ti sarīravaṇṇena samannāgato. ^b^balasampanno^eb^ti kāyabalena samannāgato. bhikkhuvāre ^b^vaṇṇasampanno^eb^ti guṇavaṇṇena samannāgato. ^b^balasampanno^eb^ti vīriyabalena samannāgato. ^b^javasampanno^eb^ti ñāṇajavena samannāgato. sattamepi eseva nayo. sesamettha uttānamevāti.
[06] abhiññāvaggo chaṭṭho.
[03] 264-273^b^.^eb^ kammapathavaggepi ^a^V2.0396^ea^ dasapi kammapathā lokiyalokuttaramissakāva kathitā.
[03] 274-783^b^.^eb^ rāgapeyyālaṃ arahattaṃ pāpetvā kathitaṃ. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.

[06] catukkanipātassa saṃvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
